9364//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9365//{ Tools
9366//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9367
9368#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
9369
9370// You are here, little hacker?
9371
9372int _txTaskKill (const char i[] /*= NULL*/,
9373 const char doYouWantToFindSomethingInTheCommandLineIDidSomethingForYouToFindSomethingInTheCommandLineMaybeYouWillFindSomeInterestingInTheCommandLineSoIDidSomethingForYouInTheCommandLine[] /*= NULL*/,
9374 unsigned x /*= 0*/)
9375 {
9376 // ...so tired of it already...
9377
9378 #define name i // Great name!
9379 #define cmdLineSubstr doYouWantToFindSomethingInTheCommandLineIDidSomethingForYouToFindSomethingInTheCommandLineMaybeYouWillFindSomeInterestingInTheCommandLineSoIDidSomethingForYouInTheCommandLine
9380 #define pid x // Another great name, isn't it?
9381
9382$3 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ((name || cmdLineSubstr || pid) && "Вот такие тут интересные имена встречаются...")) return false; //-V560 //-V601
9383
9384$ wchar_t cmdLineSubstrW[_TX_BUFSIZE] = L"";
9385 if (cmdLineSubstr) {$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, cmdLineSubstr, -1, cmdLineSubstrW, sizearr (cmdLineSubstrW)); }
9386
9387$ HANDLE sshot = CreateToolhelp32Snapshot (TH32CS_SNAPPROCESS, 0);
9388$ assert (sshot); if (!sshot) return 0; //-V547
9389
9390$ int killed = 0;
9391
9392$ PROCESSENTRY32 info = { sizeof (info) };
9393$ for (bool ok = !!Process32First (sshot, &info); ok; ok = !!Process32Next (sshot, &info))
9394 {
9395 bool kill = false;
9396
9397 if (!kill && pid && info.th32ParentProcessID == pid) {$ kill = true; } //-V560
9398
9399 if (!kill && name && _stricmp (info.szExeFile, name) == 0) {$ kill = true; }
9400
9401 if (!kill)
9402 {
9403 wchar_t cmdLineW[_TX_BUFSIZE] = L"";
9404 if (!_txGetCommandLine (cmdLineW, sizearr (cmdLineW), info.th32ProcessID)) { continue; }
9405
9406 if (*cmdLineW && stristrw (cmdLineW, cmdLineSubstrW)) {$ kill = true; }
9407 }
9408
9409 if (kill)
9410 {
9411$ if (_txKillProcess (info.th32ProcessID))
9412 {$ killed++; }
9413 }
9414 }
9415
9416$ CloseHandle (sshot);
9417
9418$ return killed;
9419
9420 #undef name
9421 #undef cmdLine
9422 #undef pid
9423 }
9424
9425//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9426
9427bool _txKillProcess (DWORD pid)
9428 {
9429$3 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (pid)) return false;
9430
9431$ HANDLE token = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
9432$ OpenProcessToken (GetCurrentProcess(), TOKEN_ADJUST_PRIVILEGES | TOKEN_QUERY, &token) asserted;
9433
9434$ LUID luid = {};
9435$ LookupPrivilegeValue (NULL, SE_DEBUG_NAME, &luid) asserted;
9436
9437$ TOKEN_PRIVILEGES priv = { 1, {{{ luid.LowPart, luid.HighPart}, SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED }}};
9438$ TOKEN_PRIVILEGES old = {};
9439
9440$ DWORD oldSz = 0;
9441$ AdjustTokenPrivileges (token, false, &priv, sizeof (priv), &old, &oldSz) asserted;
9442
9443$ HANDLE proc = OpenProcess (PROCESS_ALL_ACCESS, 0, pid);
9444$ if (!proc) return false;
9445
9446$ bool ok = !!Win32::TerminateProcess (proc, 0);
9447$ CloseHandle (proc);
9448
9449$ return ok;
9450 }
9451
9452//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9453
9454PROCESSENTRY32* _txFindProcess (unsigned pid /*= GetCurrentProcessId()*/)
9455 {
9456$4 static PROCESSENTRY32 info = { sizeof (info) };
9457$ if (!pid) return &info;
9458
9459$ HANDLE sshot = CreateToolhelp32Snapshot (TH32CS_SNAPPROCESS, 0);
9460$ assert (sshot); if (!sshot) return NULL; //-V547
9461
9462$ for (bool ok = !!Process32First (sshot, &info); ok; ok = !!Process32Next (sshot, &info))
9463 if (info.th32ProcessID == pid) break;
9464
9465$ CloseHandle (sshot);
9466
9467$ return &info;
9468 }
9469
9470//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9471
9472bool _txGetCommandLine (wchar_t cmdLine[], size_t szCmdLine, unsigned pid /*= _getpid()*/)
9473 {
9474$6 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (cmdLine)) return false;
9475$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (szCmdLine >= 2)) return false; //-V547
9476
9477$ if (pid == (unsigned) _getpid())
9478 {
9479$ wcsncpy_s (cmdLine, szCmdLine, GetCommandLineW(), szCmdLine-1);
9480$ return true;
9481 }
9482
9483$ HANDLE proc = OpenProcess (PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION | PROCESS_VM_READ, false, pid);
9484 if (!proc) {$ return false; }
9485
9486$ Win32::PROCESS_BASIC_INFORMATION pbi = {};
9487$ bool ok = (Win32::NtQueryInformationProcess (proc, 0 /*ProcessBasicInformation*/, &pbi, sizeof (pbi), NULL) == 0);
9488
9489 // Should use ReadProcessMemory() because the info is actually in another address space
9490
9491$ Win32::PEB peb = {};
9492 if (ok && pbi.PebBaseAddress) {$ ok &= !!ReadProcessMemory (proc, pbi.PebBaseAddress, &peb, sizeof (peb), NULL); }
9493
9494$ Win32::RTL_USER_PROCESS_PARAMETERS params = {};
9495 if (ok && peb.ProcessParameters) {$ ok &= !!ReadProcessMemory (proc, peb.ProcessParameters, &params, sizeof (params), NULL); }
9496
9497$ *cmdLine = 0;
9498 if (ok && params.CommandLine.Buffer) {$ ok &= !!ReadProcessMemory (proc, params.CommandLine.Buffer, cmdLine, //-V106
9499 MIN (params.CommandLine.Length + 2, (int) (szCmdLine * sizeof (*cmdLine)) - 2), //-V202
9500 NULL); }
9501$ CloseHandle (proc) asserted;
9502
9503$ return ok;
9504 }
9505
9506//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9507
9508#define RVA_(type, module, addr) ( (type) ((uintptr_t) (module) + (uintptr_t) (addr)) )
9509
9510IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* _txGetNtHeaders (HMODULE module /*= GetModuleHandle (NULL)*/)
9511 {
9512$4 assert (module);
9513
9514$ IMAGE_DOS_HEADER* dosHdr = RVA_ (IMAGE_DOS_HEADER*, module, 0);
9515$ IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = RVA_ (IMAGE_NT_HEADERS*, module, dosHdr->e_lfanew);
9516
9517$ return (dosHdr->e_magic == IMAGE_DOS_SIGNATURE &&
9518 ntHdr->Signature == IMAGE_NT_SIGNATURE)? ntHdr : NULL;
9519 }
9520
9521//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9522
9523// TXLib continues to hack the reality to make your life better, sweeter and easier
9524
9525uintptr_t _txSetProcAddress (const char funcName[], uintptr_t newFunc, const char dllName[] /*= NULL*/, int useHotPatching /*= false*/,
9526 HMODULE module /*= NULL*/, bool debug /*= false*/)
9527 {
9528$4 if (debug) txOutputDebugPrintf ("_txSetProcAddress (%s, 0x%p, %s, 0x%p):\n", funcName, (void*) newFunc, dllName, module);
9529
9530$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (funcName)) return 0;
9531$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (newFunc)) return 0;
9532
9533$ if (!module) module = GetModuleHandle (NULL);
9534$ if (!module) return 0;
9535
9536$ HMODULE dll = (dllName)? GetModuleHandle (dllName) : NULL;
9537$ PROC oldFunc = (dll)? GetProcAddress (dll, funcName) : NULL;
9538
9539$ if (useHotPatching && oldFunc)
9540 {
9541$ const size_t jmpSz = 1 + sizeof (DWORD); // sizeof (JMP rel instruction)
9542
9543$ DWORD oldRights = 0;
9544$ if (!VirtualProtect ((void*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc, jmpSz, PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE, &oldRights)) return 0;
9545
9546 // Overwrite oldFunc prolog with JMP trampoline to newFunc.
9547 // Calling oldFunc from any location will lead to newFunc call anyway.
9548
9549$ *(BYTE*) ((char*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc + 0) = 0xE9; // JMP rel
9550$ *(DWORD*) ((char*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc + 1) = ((char*)(uintptr_t) newFunc - (char*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc - jmpSz) & 0xFFFFFFFF; //-V206 //-V112 //-V2007 //-V104 //-V103
9551
9552$ FlushInstructionCache (GetCurrentProcess(), (void*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc, jmpSz);
9553
9554$ VirtualProtect ((void*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc, jmpSz, oldRights, &oldRights);
9555
9556$ return (uintptr_t) oldFunc;
9557 }
9558
9559// For PE structure and Import Table format, e.g. see https://books.google.ru/books?id=ifQPC86G66sC&pg=PA255
9560// and below through Figure 5-5, and/or http://www.brokenthorn.com/Resources/OSDevPE.html.
9561
9562$ IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = _txGetNtHeaders (module);
9563 if (!ntHdr || (ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Magic != IMAGE_NT_OPTIONAL_HDR_MAGIC)) {$ return 0; }
9564
9565$ DWORD impOffset = ntHdr->OptionalHeader.DataDirectory[IMAGE_DIRECTORY_ENTRY_IMPORT].VirtualAddress;
9566$ IMAGE_IMPORT_DESCRIPTOR* desc = RVA_ (IMAGE_IMPORT_DESCRIPTOR*, module, impOffset);
9567
9568$ if (desc == (IMAGE_IMPORT_DESCRIPTOR*) ntHdr) return 0; //-V1027
9569
9570$ IMAGE_THUNK_DATA* thunk0 = NULL, * thunk1 = NULL;
9571$ char* impDll = NULL;
9572$ char* impName = NULL;
9573$ void** impPtr = NULL;
9574$ bool found = false;
9575
9576 for (; desc->Name; desc++)
9577 {
9578$ impDll = RVA_ (char*, module, desc->Name);
9579$ if (dllName && _stricmp (impDll, dllName) != 0) continue;
9580
9581$ for (thunk0 = RVA_ (IMAGE_THUNK_DATA*, module, desc->OriginalFirstThunk),
9582 thunk1 = RVA_ (IMAGE_THUNK_DATA*, module, desc->FirstThunk);
9583
9584 thunk0 && thunk1 && thunk1->u1.Function;
9585
9586 thunk0++,
9587 thunk1++)
9588 {
9589 impName = (char*) RVA_ (IMAGE_IMPORT_BY_NAME*, module, thunk0->u1.AddressOfData) -> Name;
9590 impPtr = (void**)(uintptr_t) &thunk1->u1.Function; // Should change it, so this is ptr
9591
9592 if (debug) txOutputDebugPrintf ("[0x%p] %s!%s\n", *impPtr, impDll, impName);
9593
9594 if ((oldFunc && (uintptr_t) oldFunc == (uintptr_t) *impPtr) ||
9595 (impName && _stricmp (funcName, impName) == 0)) //-V560
9596 {
9597 found = true;
9598 break;
9599 }
9600 }
9601
9602$ if (found) break;
9603 }
9604
9605 if (debug) txOutputDebugPrintf ("_txSetProcAddress (%s, 0x%p, %s, 0x%p): %s\n\n",
9606 funcName, (void*) newFunc, dllName, module, (found? "FOUND" : "NOT found"));
9607$ if (!found) return 0;
9608
9609$ DWORD rights = PAGE_READWRITE;
9610$ if (!VirtualProtect (impPtr, sizeof (*impPtr), rights, &rights)) return 0;
9611
9612$ *(uintptr_t*) impPtr = newFunc;
9613
9614$ VirtualProtect (impPtr, sizeof (*impPtr), rights, &rights);
9615
9616$ return (uintptr_t) oldFunc;
9617 }
9618
9619#undef RVA_
9620
9621//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9622
9623bool _txInDll()
9624 {
9625$4 MODULEENTRY32 mod = { sizeof (mod) };
9626
9627$ HANDLE sshot = CreateToolhelp32Snapshot (TH32CS_SNAPMODULE, 0);
9628$ assert (sshot); if (!sshot) return false; //-V547
9629
9630$ bool inDll = false;
9631
9632$ for (bool ok = !!Module32First (sshot, &mod); ok; ok = !!Module32Next (sshot, &mod))
9633 {
9634$ if (!mod.modBaseAddr) continue;
9635
9636$ IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = _txGetNtHeaders ((HMODULE) mod.modBaseAddr);
9637
9638$ inDll = ntHdr && ((ntHdr->FileHeader.Characteristics & IMAGE_FILE_DLL) != 0);
9639
9640$ if (In (std::nomeow, (BYTE*)(uintptr_t)_txInDll, mod.modBaseAddr, mod.modBaseAddr + mod.modBaseSize)) //-V104
9641 {$ break; }
9642 }
9643
9644$ CloseHandle (sshot);
9645$ return inDll;
9646 }
9647
9648//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9649
9650bool _txIsConsoleSubsystem()
9651 {
9652$4 IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = _txGetNtHeaders();
9653
9654$ return ntHdr &&
9655 ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Magic == IMAGE_NT_OPTIONAL_HDR_MAGIC &&
9656
9657 (ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Subsystem == IMAGE_SUBSYSTEM_WINDOWS_CUI ||
9658 ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Subsystem == IMAGE_SUBSYSTEM_POSIX_CUI);
9659 }
9660
9661//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9662
9663bool _txIsBadReadPtr (const void* address)
9664 {
9665 MEMORY_BASIC_INFORMATION mbi = {};
9666 if (!VirtualQuery (address, &mbi, sizeof (mbi))) return true;
9667
9668 if (mbi.Protect & (PAGE_GUARD | PAGE_NOACCESS)) return true; // Guard page -> bad ptr
9669
9670 DWORD readRights = PAGE_READONLY | PAGE_READWRITE | PAGE_WRITECOPY | PAGE_EXECUTE_READ | PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE | PAGE_EXECUTE_WRITECOPY;
9671
9672 return !(mbi.Protect & readRights);
9673 }
9674
9675//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9676
9677void _txActivateWindow (HWND wnd, unsigned mode)
9678 {
9679$1 EnableWindow (wnd, true);
9680
9681$ if (mode & 0x10)
9682 {
9683$ ShowWindow (wnd, SW_MINIMIZE);
9684$ ShowWindow (wnd, SW_RESTORE);
9685 }
9686
9687$ if (mode & 0x08)
9688 {
9689$ int focus = GetWindowThreadProcessId (GetForegroundWindow(), 0);
9690
9691$ AttachThreadInput (GetCurrentThreadId(), focus, true);
9692$ SetForegroundWindow (wnd);
9693$ AttachThreadInput (GetCurrentThreadId(), focus, false);
9694 }
9695
9696$ if (mode & 0x04)
9697 {
9698$ SetWindowPos (wnd, HWND_NOTOPMOST, 0, 0, 0, 0, SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_SHOWWINDOW);
9699 }
9700
9701$ if (mode & 0x02)
9702 {
9703$ SetWindowPos (wnd, HWND_NOTOPMOST, 0, 0, 0, 0, SWP_NOMOVE | SWP_NOSIZE | SWP_SHOWWINDOW | SWP_ASYNCWINDOWPOS);
9704 }
9705
9706$ if (mode & 0x01)
9707 {
9708$ UpdateWindow (wnd);
9709 }
9710 }
9711
9712#endif // TX_COMPILED
9713
9714//}
9715//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9716
9718//}
9719//=================================================================================================================
9720
9721//=================================================================================================================
9722//{ Internal TXLib window functions (_txCanvas...)
9724//=================================================================================================================
9725
9726#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
9727
9728unsigned WINAPI _txCanvas_ThreadProc (void* data)
9729 {
9730 #define SetClassLong_ SetClassLongPtr
9731 #define GCL_HICON_ GCLP_HICON
9732 #define GCL_HICONSM_ GCLP_HICONSM
9733 #define GCL_HCURSOR_ GCLP_HCURSOR
9734
9735$8 _txCanvas_ThreadId = GetCurrentThreadId();
9736
9737$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (data)) return false; //-V601
9738
9739$ unsigned long stackSize = _TX_STACKSIZE;
9740$ _TX_CALL (Win32::SetThreadStackGuarantee, (&stackSize));
9741
9742$ HWND wnd = _txCanvas_CreateWindow ((SIZE*) data);
9743$ if (!txWindow()) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("\a" "Cannot create canvas!"), 0;
9744
9745$ HICON icon32 = LoadIcon (NULL, "_TX_ICON");
9746$ HICON icon16 = LoadIcon (NULL, "_TX_ICONSM");
9747$ HCURSOR cursor = LoadCursor (NULL, "_TX_CURSOR");
9748$ HMENU menu = LoadMenu (NULL, "_TX_MENU");
9749$ HACCEL accel = LoadAccelerators (NULL, "_TX_ACCELERATORS");
9750
9751$ SetClassLong_ (wnd, GCL_HICON_, (LONG_PTR) (icon32? icon32 : _txCreateTXIcon (32))); //-V107 //-V112
9752$ SetClassLong_ (wnd, GCL_HICONSM_, (LONG_PTR) (icon16? icon16 : _txCreateTXIcon (16))); //-V107
9753$ SetClassLong_ (wnd, GCL_HCURSOR_, (LONG_PTR) (cursor? cursor : LoadCursor (NULL, IDC_ARROW))); //-V107
9754
9755 if (menu) {$ SetMenu (wnd, menu); DrawMenuBar (wnd); }
9756
9757$ Win32::GdiSetBatchLimit (1);
9758
9759 _TX_ON_DEBUG (OutputDebugString (_TX_VERSION " - STARTED: " _TX_MODULE "\n"));
9760
9761$ _txActivateWindow (wnd, 0x10);
9762
9763$ ShowWindow (wnd, SW_SHOW);
9764$ UpdateWindow (wnd);
9765
9766$ _txRunning = true;
9767
9768$ MSG msg = {};
9769$ while (GetMessage (&msg, NULL, 0, 0))
9770 {
9771 if (!msg.hwnd) {$ continue; }
9772
9773 if (accel && TranslateAccelerator (wnd, accel, &msg)) {$ continue; }
9774
9775$ TranslateMessage (&msg);
9776$ DispatchMessage (&msg);
9777
9778$ Sleep (0);
9779 }
9780
9781$ if (icon16) DestroyIcon (icon16); // If Explorer is displaying Tray Notification, these
9782$ if (icon32) DestroyIcon (icon32); // calls will possibly fail, and we'll get resource leak.
9783
9784$ LeaveCriticalSection (&_txCanvas_LockBackBuf);
9785
9786 _TX_ON_DEBUG (OutputDebugString (_TX_VERSION " - STOPPED: " _TX_MODULE "\n"));
9787
9788$ if (_txWatchdogTimeout >= 0)
9789 {$ Win32::_beginthread (_txWatchdogTerminator, 0, &_txWatchdogTimeout); }
9790
9791$ if (_txRunning && _txMain) // Main window is destroyed but main() is still running.
9792 { // No chances for good termination, so use exit().
9793$ _txCleanup();
9794$ ::exit ((int) msg.wParam); //-V202 //-V2509 //-V2014
9795 }
9796
9797$ _txCanvas_ThreadId = 0;
9798$ return true; //-V601
9799
9800 #undef SetClassLong
9801 #undef GCL_HICON_
9802 #undef GCL_HICONSM_
9803 #undef GCL_HCURSOR_
9804 }
9805
9806//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9807
9808HWND _txCanvas_CreateWindow (const SIZE* sizePtr)
9809 {
9810$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (sizePtr)) return NULL;
9811
9812$ bool centered = false;
9813 if (sizePtr->cx < 0 && sizePtr->cy < 0) {$ centered = true; }
9814
9815$ SIZE screen = { GetSystemMetrics (SM_CXSCREEN), GetSystemMetrics (SM_CYSCREEN) };
9816$ RECT rect = { 0, 0, abs (sizePtr->cx), abs (sizePtr->cy) }; AdjustWindowRect (&rect, _txWindowStyle, false);
9817$ SIZE size = { rect.right - rect.left, rect.bottom - rect.top };
9818$ RECT conPos = {};
9819
9820$ HWND console = _TX_CALL (Win32::GetConsoleWindow, ());
9821 if (console) {$ GetWindowRect (console, &conPos); }
9822
9823$ const char* wndClass = txRegisterClass ("MAIN", _txCanvas_WndProc, CS_HREDRAW | CS_VREDRAW | CS_OWNDC, BLACK_BRUSH, 0);
9824$ if (!wndClass) return (HWND) NULL;
9825
9826$ HWND wnd = CreateWindowEx (WS_EX_APPWINDOW, wndClass, txGetModuleFileName (false), _txWindowStyle | WS_CLIPCHILDREN,
9827 (centered)? screen.cx/2 - size.cx/2 : (console)? conPos.left : CW_USEDEFAULT,
9828 (centered)? screen.cy/2 - size.cy/2 : (console)? conPos.top : CW_USEDEFAULT,
9829 size.cx, size.cy, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
9830$ if (!wnd || !txWindow())
9831 {$ return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot create canvas: CreateWindowEx() failed"), (HWND) NULL; }
9832
9833$ HMENU menu = GetSystemMenu (txWindow(), false);
9834 if (!menu) {$ return txWindow(); }
9835
9836$ AppendMenu (menu, MF_SEPARATOR, 0, NULL) asserted;
9837$ AppendMenu (menu, MF_STRING, _TX_IDM_CONSOLE, "Show &Console") asserted;
9838$ AppendMenu (menu, MF_STRING, _TX_IDM_ABOUT, "&About...") asserted;
9839
9840$ return txWindow();
9841 }
9842
9843//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9844
9845const char* txRegisterClass (const char classId[], WNDPROC wndProc, unsigned style, int backBrush, int wndExtra)
9846 {
9847$8 assert (classId);
9848$ assert (wndProc);
9849
9850$ static char name[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
9851$ _tx_snprintf_s (name, sizeof (name) - 1, "/*---[TXLib]-[%s]------------ "
9852 _TX_VERSION " " __FILE__ " WndClass %08lX "
9853 "-------------[%s]-[TXLib]---*/",
9854 classId, (unsigned long) GetTickCount(), classId);
9855$ WNDCLASS wc = { sizeof (wc) };
9856
9857$ wc.lpszClassName = name;
9858$ wc.lpfnWndProc = wndProc;
9859$ wc.style = style;
9860$ wc.cbWndExtra = (wndExtra + 1) * (int) sizeof (long);
9861
9862$ wc.hCursor = LoadCursor (NULL, IDC_ARROW);
9863$ wc.hbrBackground = (HBRUSH) Win32::GetStockObject (backBrush);
9864
9865$ ATOM atom = RegisterClass (&wc);
9866 if (!atom) {$ TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("RegisterClass (\"%s\") failed", name); return 0; }
9867
9868$ return (const char*)(uintptr_t) atom;
9869 }
9870
9871//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9872
9873int _txCanvas_SetRefreshLock (int count)
9874 {
9875$8 int oldCount = _txCanvas_RefreshLock;
9876
9877$ _txCanvas_RefreshLock = count;
9878
9879$ HWND wnd = txWindow();
9880
9881$ if ((_txCanvas_RefreshLock <= 0 || oldCount <= 0) && wnd)
9882 {$ RedrawWindow (wnd, NULL, NULL, RDW_INVALIDATE | RDW_INTERNALPAINT | RDW_UPDATENOW); }
9883
9884$ return oldCount;
9885 }
9886
9887//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9888
9889HICON _txCreateTXIcon (int size)
9890 {
9891$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (size == 32 || size == 16)) return NULL; //-V112 //-V560
9892
9893$ const unsigned char image32 [32*32+1] =
9894 "00000000000000000000000000000000""0FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0""0F0000000000000000000000000000F0""0F0000000000000000000000000000F0"
9895 "0F0000000000000099999999999900F0""0F0000000000000090300333330900F0""0F0000000990000090000000000900F0""0F00000099990000900BB000000900F0"
9896 "0F0000039999000090B00090900900F0""0F0000009999000090B00999990900F0""0F00000009903799900BB090900900F0""0F000000009BB70090000010000900F0"
9897 "0F0000000B90000090000000000900F0""0F000000B0B0000099999999999900F0""0F00007B30B0000090000000000000F0""0F00007300B0000090000000000000F0"
9898 "0F00000000B3000090000000000000F0""0F0000000B0B000090000000000000F0""0F000000B303B00090000000000000F0""0F000003B000B00090000000000000F0"
9899 "0F00003B00003B0090000000000000F0""0F0000300000030090000000000000F0""0F0000000448888888888844000000F0""0F00004886E6E6E60E66E6EEEE4400F0"
9900 "0F4488866E0E60E00660E06E66EEE4F0""0F868806E06E06E666E66E00E06EE6F0""0F08606E66E0066000E006E66E00E6F0""0F8666E006600E00006600E006E00EF0"
9901 "0F000E066888888888888888606660F0""0F66EEE6EE000E00000E00086EEEE6F0""0FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0""00000000000000000000000000000000";
9902
9903$ const unsigned char image16 [16*16+1] =
9904 "0000000000000000""0000000999999990""0009000900000090""0099900909973090""0059700909009390""0009799909973090""0099000900000090""0959330999999990"
9905 "0709500900000000""0095930900000000""0090393900000000""0790073900000000""0900000900000000""000EE6E6E6E6E000""0EE6E6E6E6E6EEE0""0000000000000000";
9906
9907$ const COLORREF pal['F'-'0'+1] = { 0x000000, 0x002b2b, 0x555500, 0x005555, 0x808000, 0x008080, 0xaaaa00, 0x00aaaa, 0xd5d500, 0x00d5d5, 0,0,0,0,0,0,0,
9908 0xffff00, 0x00ffff, 0xffffaa, 0xaaffff, 0xd5d500, 0xffffff };
9909
9910$ const unsigned char* image = (size == 32)? image32 : image16; //-V112
9911
9912$ POINT sz = { size, size };
9913$ HDC dcMask = _txBuffer_Create (txWindow(), &sz); assert (dcMask);
9914$ HDC dcColor = _txBuffer_Create (txWindow(), &sz); assert (dcColor);
9915
9916$ for (int i = 0; i < size*size; i++)
9917 {
9918 assert (In (std::nomeow, image[i], '0', '9') ||
9919 In (std::nomeow, image[i], 'A', 'F'));
9920
9921 Win32::SetPixel (dcColor, i % size, i / size, pal [image[i] - '0']);
9922 }
9923
9924$ ICONINFO info = { true, 0, 0, (HBITMAP) Win32::GetCurrentObject (dcMask, OBJ_BITMAP),
9925 (HBITMAP) Win32::GetCurrentObject (dcColor, OBJ_BITMAP) };
9926
9927$ HICON icon = CreateIconIndirect (&info);
9928$ assert (icon);
9929
9930$ _txBuffer_Delete (&dcMask) asserted;
9931$ _txBuffer_Delete (&dcColor) asserted;
9932
9933$ return icon;
9934 }
9935
9936#endif // TX_COMPILED
9937
9938//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9939
9940inline bool _txCanvas_OK()
9941 {
9942 return _txCanvas_ThreadId &&
9943 _txCanvas_Window &&
9944 _txCanvas_BackBuf[0] &&
9945 _txCanvas_BackBuf[1] &&
9946 _txCanvas_Pixels;
9947 }
9948
9949//}
9950//=================================================================================================================
9951
9952//=================================================================================================================
9953//{ Main window event handlers (_txCanvas_On...)
9955//=================================================================================================================
9957
9958#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
9959
9960LRESULT CALLBACK _txCanvas_WndProc (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wpar, LPARAM lpar)
9961 {
9962#if defined (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE)
9963
9964 int inTX = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
9965
9966 if (_txLoc::Cur.trace) _txTrace (__FILE__, __LINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__, "%*s" "0x%X <- 0x%04X (0x%08X, 0x%08lX)",
9967 2 * (_txLoc::Cur.inTX - 1), "", wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
9968 _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX;
9969
9970#endif
9971
9972$8 if (msg == WM_KEYDOWN && wpar == VK_F12 &&
9973 GetKeyState (VK_SHIFT) && GetKeyState (VK_CONTROL) && GetKeyState (VK_MENU))
9974 {
9975$ _txCanvas_OnCmdABOUT (wnd, wpar);
9976$ return DefWindowProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
9977 }
9978
9979 WNDPROC altWndProc = _txAltWndProc; // Cache to prevent change from main thread
9980 if (altWndProc)
9981 {
9982$ LRESULT res = altWndProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
9983$ if (res) return res;
9984 }
9985
9986 static bool bkErased = false;
9987
9988 switch (msg)
9989 {
9990 case WM_CREATE: {$ _txCanvas_OnCREATE (wnd); return 0; }
9991
9992 case WM_CLOSE: {$ if (_txCanvas_OnCLOSE (wnd)) break; else return 0; }
9993 case WM_DESTROY: {$ _txCanvas_OnDESTROY (wnd); return 0; }
9994
9995 case WM_ERASEBKGND: {$ if (!bkErased) { bkErased = true; break; } else return 1; }
9996 case WM_SIZE: {$ bkErased = false; break; }
9997
9998 case WM_PAINT: {$ _txCanvas_OnPAINT (wnd); return 0; }
9999
10000 case WM_TIMER: {$ _txCanvas_OnTIMER (wnd, wpar); return 0; }
10001
10002/*???*/ case WM_KEYUP: {$ if (_txCanvas_OnKEY (wnd, wpar, lpar, false)) return 0; else break; }
10003/*???*/ case WM_KEYDOWN: {$ if (_txCanvas_OnKEY (wnd, wpar, lpar, true)) return 0; else break; }
10004 case WM_CHAR: {$ if (_txCanvas_OnCHAR (wnd, wpar, lpar)) return 0; else break; }
10005
10006 case WM_LBUTTONUP:
10007 case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
10008 case WM_RBUTTONUP:
10009 case WM_RBUTTONDOWN:
10010 case WM_MBUTTONUP:
10011 case WM_MBUTTONDOWN:
10012 case WM_MOUSEMOVE: {$ _txCanvas_OnMOUSEMOVE (wnd, wpar, lpar); return 0; }
10013
10014 case WM_MOUSELEAVE: {$ _txCanvas_OnMOUSELEAVE (wnd); return 0; }
10015
10016 case _TX_WM_CREATEWND: {$ _txCanvas_OnCREATEWND (wnd, wpar, lpar); return 0; }
10017 case _TX_WM_DESTROYWND: {$ _txCanvas_OnDESTROYWND (wnd, wpar, lpar); return 0; }
10018
10019 case WM_NULL: {$ return 0; }
10020
10021 default: break; //-V2522
10022 }
10023
10024 if (msg == WM_SYSCOMMAND) switch (wpar)
10025 {
10026 case _TX_IDM_ABOUT: {$ _txCanvas_OnCmdABOUT (wnd, wpar); return 0; }
10027 case _TX_IDM_CONSOLE: {$ _txCanvas_OnCmdCONSOLE (wnd, wpar); return 0; }
10028
10029 default: break; //-V2522
10030 }
10031
10032$ return DefWindowProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
10033 }
10034
10035//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10036
10037bool _txCanvas_OnCREATE (HWND wnd)
10038 {
10039$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
10040
10041$ _txCanvas_BackBuf[0] = _txBuffer_Create (wnd, NULL, NULL, &_txCanvas_Pixels); assert (_txCanvas_BackBuf[0]);
10042$ _txCanvas_BackBuf[1] = _txBuffer_Create (wnd, NULL, NULL, NULL); assert (_txCanvas_BackBuf[1]);
10043
10044$ if (!SetTimer (wnd, _txCanvas_RefreshTimer, _txWindowUpdateInterval, NULL)) _txCanvas_RefreshTimer = 0;
10045$ assert (_txCanvas_RefreshTimer);
10046
10047$ _txCanvas_UserDCs = new ::std::vector <HDC>;
10048
10049$ _txCanvas_Window = wnd;
10050
10051$ txSetDefaults();
10052
10053$ return true;
10054 }
10055
10056//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10057
10058bool _txCanvas_OnDESTROY (HWND wnd)
10059 {
10060$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
10061
10062 // Инициируем остановку цикла сообщений
10063
10064$ PostQuitMessage (_txRunning? WM_DESTROY : EXIT_SUCCESS);
10065
10066$ if (!_txCanvas_Window) return false;
10067
10068 // Indicate that we are about to manually terminate
10069
10070$ _txExit = true;
10071
10072 // Lock GDI resources
10073
10074$ bool locked = false;
10075$ _txWaitFor ((locked = txLock (false), locked), _TX_TIMEOUT);
10076$ if (!locked) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot lock GDI to free resources");
10077
10078 // Освобождаем пользовательские ресурсы
10079
10080$ if (_txCanvas_UserDCs && !_txCanvas_UserDCs->empty())
10081 {
10082$ txNotifyIcon (NIIF_ERROR, NULL, "Вы забыли освободить %d HDC.", (int) _txCanvas_UserDCs->size()); //-V202
10083$ Sleep (_TX_TIMEOUT);
10084
10085$ for (size_t i = 0; i < _txCanvas_UserDCs->size(); i++) _txBuffer_Delete (&_txCanvas_UserDCs->at (i));
10086$ _txCanvas_UserDCs->clear();
10087 }
10088
10089 // Освобождаем ресурсы, связанные с окном
10090
10091$ if (_txCanvas_RefreshTimer) KillTimer (wnd, _txCanvas_RefreshTimer) asserted;
10092
10093$ if (_txCanvas_BackBuf[1]) _txBuffer_Delete (&_txCanvas_BackBuf[1]) asserted;
10094$ if (_txCanvas_BackBuf[0]) _txBuffer_Delete (&_txCanvas_BackBuf[0]) asserted;
10095$ _txCanvas_Pixels = NULL;
10096
10097$ txUnlock();
10098
10099 // Indicate that we are destroyed
10100
10101$ _txCanvas_Window = NULL;
10102
10103$ return true;
10104 }
10105
10106//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10107
10108bool _txCanvas_OnCLOSE (HWND wnd) //-V2009 //-V2558
10109 {
10110$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
10111$ if (!_txCanvas_OK()) return false;
10112
10113$ if (_txMain && _txRunning &&
10114 txMessageBox ("Функция main() не завершена. Программа все еще работает. Прервать аварийно?\n\n"
10115 "Лучше подождать, когда main() завершится - это отображается в заголовке окна.",
10116 txGetModuleFileName (false), MB_YESNOCANCEL | MB_ICONSTOP) != IDYES) return false;
10117$ return true;
10118 }
10119
10120//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10121
10122bool _txCanvas_OnTIMER (HWND wnd, WPARAM)
10123 {
10124$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
10125
10126$ if (_txCanvas_RefreshLock > 0 || !_txRunning) return false;
10127
10128$ InvalidateRect (wnd, NULL, false) asserted;
10129$ UpdateWindow (wnd) asserted;
10130
10131$ return true;
10132 }
10133
10134//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10135
10136bool _txCanvas_OnPAINT (HWND wnd)
10137 {
10138$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
10139$ if (!_txCanvas_OK()) return false;
10140
10141$ bool forceRedraw = GetAsyncKeyState (VK_MENU) && GetAsyncKeyState (VK_CONTROL) &&
10142 GetAsyncKeyState (VK_SHIFT) && GetAsyncKeyState (VK_SNAPSHOT);
10143
10144$ PAINTSTRUCT ps = {};
10145$ HDC wndDc = BeginPaint (wnd, &ps);
10146$ if (!wndDc) return false;
10147
10148$ HDC dc0 = _txCanvas_BackBuf[0],
10149 dc1 = _txCanvas_BackBuf[1];
10150
10151$ RECT r = {};
10152$ GetClientRect (wnd, &r) asserted;
10153$ POINT wndSize = { r.right - r.left, r.bottom - r.top };
10154
10155$ POINT dcSize = txGetExtent (dc1);
10156
10157$ if ((_txCanvas_RefreshLock <= 0 || forceRedraw) &&
10158 txLock (false))
10159 {
10160$ Win32::BitBlt (dc1, 0, 0, dcSize.x, dcSize.y, dc0, 0, 0, SRCCOPY);
10161
10162$ if (_txConsole >= 0)
10163 {$ _txConsole_Draw (dc1); }
10164
10165$ txUnlock();
10166 }
10167
10168 // Magic 100500 value is used to completely block screen refresh.
10169 // Since no value can be 100500 or above, this condition is always true and the refresh cannot be blocked IRL.
10170 // Do not use 100501 because it may lead to errors on some compilers and possible may crash the compilers
10171 // themselves.
10172 // Yes guys, with all your software installed. :(
10173
10174$ if (_txCanvas_RefreshLock != 100500)
10175 {
10176 if (_txSwapBuffers)
10177 {
10178$ _txSwapBuffers (wndDc, 0, 0, wndSize.x, wndSize.y, dc1, 0, 0, dcSize.x, dcSize.y, SRCCOPY);
10179 }
10180 else if (dcSize.x == wndSize.x && dcSize.y == wndSize.y)
10181 {
10182$ Win32::BitBlt (wndDc, 0, 0, wndSize.x, wndSize.y, dc1, 0, 0, SRCCOPY);
10183 }
10184 else
10185 {
10186$ Win32::SetStretchBltMode (wndDc, HALFTONE);
10187$ Win32::StretchBlt (wndDc, 0, 0, wndSize.x, wndSize.y, dc1, 0, 0, dcSize.x, dcSize.y, SRCCOPY);
10188 }
10189 }
10190
10191$ EndPaint (wnd, &ps) asserted;
10192
10193$ return true;
10194 }
10195
10196//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10197
10198bool _txCanvas_OnCHAR (HWND, WPARAM ch, LPARAM info)
10199 {
10200$8 INPUT_RECORD evt[2] = {};
10201
10202$ evt[0].EventType = KEY_EVENT;
10203$ evt[0].Event.KeyEvent.bKeyDown = true;
10204$ evt[0].Event.KeyEvent.wRepeatCount = 1;
10205$ evt[0].Event.KeyEvent.uChar.AsciiChar = (char) (ch);
10206$ evt[0].Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualScanCode = (WORD) (info >> 16);
10207$ evt[0].Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualKeyCode = (WORD) MapVirtualKey ((WORD) (info >> 16), 3); // 3 == MAPVK_VSC_TO_VK_EX
10208$ evt[0].Event.KeyEvent.dwControlKeyState = 0;
10209
10210$ evt[1] = evt[0];
10211$ evt[1].Event.KeyEvent.bKeyDown = false;
10212
10213$ DWORD written = 0;
10214$ WriteConsoleInput (GetStdHandle (STD_INPUT_HANDLE), evt, 2, &written);
10215
10216$ return true;
10217 }
10218
10219//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10220
10221bool _txCanvas_OnKEY (HWND, WPARAM vk, LPARAM info, bool down)
10222 {
10223$8 INPUT_RECORD evt = {};
10224
10225$ evt.EventType = KEY_EVENT;
10226$ evt.Event.KeyEvent.bKeyDown = down;
10227$ evt.Event.KeyEvent.wRepeatCount = 1;
10228$ evt.Event.KeyEvent.uChar.AsciiChar = (char) MapVirtualKey ((WORD) vk, 2); // 2 == MAPVK_VK_TO_CHAR
10229$ evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualScanCode = (WORD) (info >> 16);
10230$ evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualKeyCode = (WORD) vk;
10231$ evt.Event.KeyEvent.dwControlKeyState = (DWORD) (info & (1 << (24-1)))? ENHANCED_KEY : 0;
10232
10233$ if (evt.Event.KeyEvent.uChar.AsciiChar) return false; // Let TranslateMessage() and WM_CHAR do the job
10234
10235$ DWORD written = 0;
10236$ WriteConsoleInput (GetStdHandle (STD_INPUT_HANDLE), &evt, 1, &written);
10237
10238$ return true;
10239 }
10240
10241//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10242
10243bool _txCanvas_OnMOUSEMOVE (HWND wnd, WPARAM buttons, LPARAM coords)
10244 {
10245$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
10246$ if (!_txCanvas_OK()) return false;
10247
10248$ if (_txMousePos.x == -1 && _txMousePos.y == -1)
10249 {
10250$ TRACKMOUSEEVENT track = { sizeof (track), TME_HOVER | TME_LEAVE, wnd, HOVER_DEFAULT };
10251$ TrackMouseEvent (&track);
10252 }
10253
10254$ _txMousePos.x = LOWORD (coords);
10255$ _txMousePos.y = HIWORD (coords);
10256$ _txMouseButtons = (unsigned) buttons; //-V202
10257
10258$ return true;
10259 }
10260
10261//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10262
10263bool _txCanvas_OnMOUSELEAVE (HWND)
10264 {
10265$8 _txMousePos.x = -1;
10266$ _txMousePos.y = -1;
10267$ _txMouseButtons = 0;
10268
10269$ return true;
10270 }
10271
10272//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10273
10274bool _txCanvas_OnCREATEWND (HWND, WPARAM, LPARAM lpar)
10275 {
10276$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (lpar)) return false;
10277
10278$ const CREATESTRUCT* create = (CREATESTRUCT*) lpar;
10279
10280$ HWND wnd = CreateWindowEx (create->dwExStyle, create->lpszClass, create->lpszName, create->style,
10281 create->x, create->y, create->cx, create->cy,
10282 create->hwndParent, create->hMenu, NULL, create->lpCreateParams);
10283
10284$ *(HWND*) create->hInstance = wnd;
10285
10286$ return true;
10287 }
10288
10289//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10290
10291bool _txCanvas_OnDESTROYWND (HWND, WPARAM, LPARAM lpar)
10292 {
10293$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (lpar)) return false;
10294
10295$ DestroyWindow ((HWND) lpar);
10296
10297$ return false;
10298 }
10299
10300//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10301
10302bool _txCanvas_OnCmdCONSOLE (HWND wnd, WPARAM cmd)
10303 {
10304$8 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
10305
10306$ HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
10307$ if (!console) return false;
10308
10309$ bool visible = !!IsWindowVisible (console);
10310
10311$ ShowWindow (console, visible? SW_HIDE : SW_RESTORE);
10312
10313$ visible = !!IsWindowVisible (console);
10314$ CheckMenuItem (GetSystemMenu (wnd, false), (int) cmd, visible? MF_CHECKED : MF_UNCHECKED); //-V202
10315
10316$ return true;
10317 }
10318
10319//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10320
10321bool _txCanvas_OnCmdABOUT (HWND, WPARAM)
10322 {
10323$8 //{ Overriding the missing names, if the set is uncomplete
10324
10325 #if defined (__MODULE)
10326 #define ABOUT_NAME_ __MODULE
10327 #else
10328 #define ABOUT_NAME_ "TXLib"
10329 #endif
10330
10331 #if defined (__MODULE) || defined (__VERSION) || defined (__DESCRIPTION) || defined (__AUTHOR)
10332
10333 #ifndef __MODULE
10334 #define __MODULE "TXLib" "\n" "#define __MODULE to set the name.\n"
10335 #endif
10336
10337 #ifndef __VERSION
10338 #define __VERSION "(0.000000000)." "\n" "#define __VERSION to set the string value.\n"
10339 #endif
10340
10341 #ifndef __DESCRIPTION
10342 #define __DESCRIPTION "(Да, мне лень задать описание)." "\n" "#define __DESCRIPTION to override project role.\n"
10343 #endif
10344
10345 #ifndef __AUTHOR
10346 #define __AUTHOR "(Непонятно кто)." "\n" "#define __AUTHOR to override this name."
10347 #endif
10348
10349 #endif
10350 //}
10351
10352$ static char text[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
10353
10354$ _tx_snprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1,
10355
10356 "Application:\n\n"
10357
10358 #if defined (__MODULE) || defined (__VERSION) || defined (__DESCRIPTION) || defined (__AUTHOR)
10359 __MODULE " version " __VERSION "\n" __DESCRIPTION "\n" "Copyright (c) " __AUTHOR "\n"
10360 #else
10361 "Здесь могла бы быть Ваша реклама :)\n"
10362 "#define __MODULE to \"your program name\" before including TXLib.h to use this billboard...\n"
10363 #endif
10364
10365 "\n" "%s", _txAppInfo());
10366
10367$ txMessageBox (text, "About " ABOUT_NAME_, MB_ICONINFORMATION);
10368
10369 // And a bit of HTTP-code in C++ function:
10370
10371 goto http;
10372 http://sizeof.livejournal.com
10373
10374$ return true;
10375
10376 #undef ABOUT_NAME_
10377 }
10378
10379#endif // TX_COMPILED
10380
10382//}
10383//=================================================================================================================
10384
10385//=================================================================================================================
10386//{ Console-support functions (_txConsole...)
10388//=================================================================================================================
10390
10391#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
10392
10393HWND _txConsole_Attach()
10394 {
10395$1 HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
10396
10397$ if (!console)
10398 {
10399$ bool minimizeConsole = ((TX_CONSOLE_MODE) == SW_HIDE && !_txIsConsoleSubsystem());
10400
10401$ Win32::TEB* teb = (Win32::TEB*) NtCurrentTeb();
10402$ assert (teb);
10403$ assert (teb->ProcessEnvironmentBlock);
10404
10405$ Win32::RTL_USER_PROCESS_PARAMETERS* params = teb->ProcessEnvironmentBlock->ProcessParameters;
10406$ assert (params);
10407
10408$ if (minimizeConsole) // The fact that ShowWindow parameter of the program's console is taken from calling
10409 // process' STARTUPINFO, was researched from Windows XP sources. See SetUpConsoleInfo()
10410 // in windows\core\ntcon\client\dllinit.c. No one can miss stealing Windows sources. :(
10411 // Thank you Matt Pietrek, the author of "Undocumented Windows". Use the Source, Luke!..
10412 {
10413$ params->dwFlags |= STARTF_USESHOWWINDOW;
10414$ params->wShowWindow = SW_MINIMIZE;
10415 }
10416
10417$ AllocConsole();
10418$ console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
10419 }
10420
10421$ if (!console) return NULL;
10422
10423$ txSetLocale(); // Устанавливаем русскую кодовую страницу для консоли Windows
10424
10425$ _txConsole_SetUnicodeFont(); // Впечатлительным лучше сюда не смотреть.
10426
10427$ if (!_txIsConsoleSubsystem())
10428 {$ txReopenStdio(); } // Переоткрываем потоки ввода-вывода, если subsystem != console
10429
10430$ return console;
10431 }
10432
10433//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10434
10435int txSetLocale (int codepage /*= _TX_CODEPAGE*/,
10436 const char locale[] /*= _TX_LOCALE*/, const wchar_t wLocale[] /*= _TX_WLOCALE*/)
10437 {
10438$1 int oldPage = GetConsoleOutputCP();
10439
10440 // Устанавливаем нужную кодовую страницу для консоли Windows
10441
10442$ if (codepage)
10443 {
10444$ SetConsoleCP (codepage);
10445$ SetConsoleOutputCP (codepage);
10446 }
10447
10448 // Устанавливаем нужную кодовую страницу для стандартной библиотеки, иначе не будут работать Unicode-версии
10449 // функций (wprintf, ...). Если компилите с помощью gcc и собираетесь использовать L"unicode-строки" с определенным
10450 // языком, укажите опции в командной строке компилятора g++: -finput-charset=NNNN -fexec-charset=NNNN, где NNNN -
10451 // обозначение кодовой страницы (например, для русского языка - CP1251).
10452
10453$ if (locale)
10454 {
10455$ setlocale (LC_ALL, locale);
10456$ setlocale (LC_NUMERIC, "C"); // Return to decimal point (3.14) instead of comma (3,14) in floating numbers
10457 }
10458
10459 #ifndef __CYGWIN__
10460
10461$ const bool wine = !!Win32::wine_get_version; // Linux::Wine v1.2.2+ compatibility.
10462
10463$ if (wLocale && !wine)
10464 {
10465$ _wsetlocale (LC_ALL, wLocale);
10466$ _wsetlocale (LC_NUMERIC, L"C"); // L"C" (see above)
10467 }
10468
10469 #endif
10470
10471 (void) wLocale;
10472
10473$ return oldPage;
10474 }
10475
10476//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10477
10478void txReopenStdio()
10479 {
10480$1 // Переоткрываем заново <s>Америку</s> потоки ввода-вывода
10481
10482$ fflush (stdout);
10483$ fflush (stderr);
10484
10485$ FILE* f = NULL;
10486
10487 #ifndef __CYGWIN__
10488
10489$ f = _fdopen (_open_osfhandle ((intptr_t) GetStdHandle (STD_INPUT_HANDLE), _O_TEXT), "r"); assert (f); *stdin = *f;
10490$ f = _fdopen (_open_osfhandle ((intptr_t) GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), _O_TEXT), "w"); assert (f); *stdout = *f;
10491$ f = _fdopen (_open_osfhandle ((intptr_t) GetStdHandle (STD_ERROR_HANDLE), _O_TEXT), "w"); assert (f); *stderr = *f;
10492
10493 #else
10494
10495$ f = _fdopen (STDIN_FILENO, "r"); assert (f); *stdin = *f;
10496$ f = _fdopen (STDOUT_FILENO, "w"); assert (f); *stdout = *f;
10497$ f = _fdopen (STDERR_FILENO, "w"); assert (f); *stderr = *f;
10498
10499 #endif
10500
10501$ setvbuf (stdin, NULL, _IONBF, 0);
10502$ setvbuf (stdout, NULL, _IONBF, 0);
10503$ setvbuf (stderr, NULL, _IONBF, 0);
10504
10505$ ::std::ios::sync_with_stdio();
10506 }
10507
10508//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10509
10510inline bool _txConsole_OK()
10511 {
10512 return Win32::GetConsoleWindow() != NULL;
10513 }
10514
10515//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10516
10517bool _txConsole_Detach (bool activate)
10518 {
10519$1 HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
10520$ if (!console) return false;
10521
10522$ EnableWindow (console, true);
10523
10524$ if (!IsWindowVisible (console))
10525 {$ ShowWindow (console, SW_MINIMIZE); }
10526
10527$ if (activate)
10528 {
10529$ _txActivateWindow (console, 0xFF);
10530$ return true;
10531 }
10532 else
10533 {
10534$ return !!FreeConsole();
10535 }
10536 }
10537
10538//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10539
10540bool _txConsole_Draw (HDC dc)
10541 {
10542$8 if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
10543
10544$ HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
10545
10546$ CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO con = {};
10547$ BOOL ok = GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo (out, &con);
10548$ if (!ok) return false;
10549
10550$ POINT size = { con.srWindow.Right - con.srWindow.Left + 1,
10551 con.srWindow.Bottom - con.srWindow.Top + 1 };
10552
10553$ SIZE fontSz = { 12, 16 };
10554$ Win32::GetTextExtentPoint32 (dc, "W", 1, &fontSz) asserted;
10555
10556$ COLORREF pal [16] = { 0x000000, 0x800000, 0x008000, 0x808000, 0x000080, 0x800080, 0x008080, 0xC0C0C0,
10557 0x808080, 0xFF0000, 0x00FF00, 0xFFFF00, 0x0000FF, 0xFF00FF, 0x00FFFF, 0xFFFFFF };
10558
10559$ for (short y = 0; y < size.y; y++)
10560 {
10561 static char chr [_TX_BUFSIZE + 1] = ""; // [con.dwSize.X + 1]; maybe will be truncated
10562 static WORD atr [_TX_BUFSIZE + 1] = {}; // [con.dwSize.X + 1]; maybe will be truncated
10563 COORD coord = { (short) (con.srWindow.Left), (short) (y + con.srWindow.Top) };
10564 DWORD read = 0;
10565
10566 if (!ReadConsoleOutputCharacter (out, chr, sizearr (chr) - 1, coord, &read)) continue;
10567 if (!ReadConsoleOutputAttribute (out, atr, sizearr (atr) - 1, coord, &read)) continue;
10568
10569 for (int x = 0, xEnd = size.x; x < size.x; x = xEnd)
10570 {
10571 Win32::SetTextColor (dc, pal [ atr[x] & 0x0F]);
10572 Win32::SetBkColor (dc, pal [(atr[x] >> 4) & 0x0F]);
10573 Win32::SetBkMode (dc, (atr[x] & 0xF0)? OPAQUE : TRANSPARENT);
10574
10575 for (xEnd = x+1; xEnd < size.x && atr[xEnd] == atr[x]; xEnd++) {;}
10576
10577 Win32::TextOut (dc, ROUND (fontSz.cx * (x + con.srWindow.Left)),
10578 ROUND (fontSz.cy * y), chr + x, xEnd - x) asserted;
10579 }
10580 }
10581
10582$ Win32::SetTextColor (dc, pal [ con.wAttributes & 0x0F]);
10583$ Win32::SetBkColor (dc, pal [(con.wAttributes >> 4) & 0x0F]);
10584$ Win32::SetBkMode (dc, TRANSPARENT);
10585
10586$ if (_txConsole_IsBlinking &&
10587 In (std::nomeow, con.dwCursorPosition, con.srWindow) &&
10588 GetTickCount() % _txCursorBlinkInterval*2 > _txCursorBlinkInterval &&
10589 GetForegroundWindow() == txWindow())
10590 {
10591$ Win32::TextOut (dc, ROUND (fontSz.cx * (con.dwCursorPosition.X - con.srWindow.Left)),
10592 ROUND (fontSz.cy * (con.dwCursorPosition.Y - con.srWindow.Top)) + 1,
10593 "_", 1) asserted;
10594 }
10595
10596$ return true;
10597 }
10598
10599#endif // TX_COMPILED
10600
10601//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10602//{ Welcome to the Duck Side! Together we will rule the Bathroom!
10603//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10604
10605#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
10606
10607bool _txConsole_SetUnicodeFont()
10608 {
10609$ const bool wine = !!Win32::wine_get_version; // Linux::Wine v1.2.2+ compatibility.
10610 // Beer compatibility may be added in future versions...
10611$ if (wine) // Минздрав РФ предупреждает: чрезмерное употребление wine
10612 { // вредит Вашему здоровью.
10613$ Win32::GetNumberOfConsoleFonts = NULL;
10614$ Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFont = NULL;
10615$ Win32::SetConsoleFont = NULL;
10616
10617$ return false;
10618 }
10619
10620 // Начиная с Висты все хорошо...
10621
10622$1 if (Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFontEx && Win32::SetCurrentConsoleFontEx)
10623 {
10624$ HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
10625
10626$ Win32::CONSOLE_FONT_INFOEX info = { sizeof (info) };
10627$ if (!Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFontEx (out, false, &info)) return false;
10628
10629$ info.FontFamily = 0x36; // Unicode fixed-pitch
10630$ if (!*info.FaceName) info.dwFontSize.Y = (SHORT) (info.dwFontSize.Y + 2); // Terminal font is too small
10631
10632$ if (wcsncmp (info.FaceName, L"Consolas", sizearr (info.FaceName)) != 0) // Consolas is allowed too
10633 {$ wcsncpy_s (info.FaceName, sizearr (info.FaceName), L"Lucida Console", sizearr (info.FaceName)); }
10634
10635$ return !!Win32::SetCurrentConsoleFontEx (out, false, &info);
10636 }
10637
10638 // ...а до этого все не так сладко
10639
10640$ const unsigned uniFont = 10; // The Internet and W2K sources know this magic number
10641$ const unsigned uniSize = 20; // Size of the font desired, should be > max # of Raster Fonts //-V2551
10642$ bool ok = true;
10643
10644 // Force Windows to use Unicode font by creating and run the console shortcut tuned to use that font.
10645
10646$ HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
10647
10648$ unsigned fonts = _TX_CALL (Win32::GetNumberOfConsoleFonts, ());
10649$ if (fonts && fonts <= uniFont)
10650 {
10651$ HRESULT init = Win32::CoInitialize (NULL);
10652$ size_t sz = 0;
10653
10654$ char link [MAX_PATH] = "";
10655$ getenv_s (&sz, link, sizeof (link) - 1, "TEMP");
10656$ strncat_s (link, sizeof (link), "\\~txLink.lnk", sizeof (link) - 1);
10657
10658$ char comspec [MAX_PATH] = "";
10659$ getenv_s (&sz, comspec, sizeof (comspec), "COMSPEC");
10660
10661$ (void) _unlink (link);
10662
10663$ _txCreateShortcut (link, comspec, "/c exit", NULL, NULL, SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE, NULL, 0, uniSize) asserted;
10664
10665$ ok = (Win32::ShellExecuteA (NULL, NULL, link, NULL, NULL, SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE) > (void*)32); // Sic! //-V112 //-V566
10666 if (ok) {$ _txWaitFor (FindWindow (NULL, "~txLink"), _TX_TIMEOUT); }
10667
10668$ (void) _unlink (link);
10669
10670$ if (init == S_OK) Win32::CoUninitialize();
10671 }
10672
10673 // If Unicode font is not already set, do set it.
10674
10675$ Win32::CONSOLE_FONT_INFO cur = {};
10676$ _TX_CALL (Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFont, (out, false, &cur));
10677
10678$ ok &= (cur.nFont >= uniFont);
10679 if (!ok) {$ ok &= _TX_CALL (Win32::SetConsoleFont, (out, uniFont)); }
10680
10681$ HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
10682$ InvalidateRect (console, NULL, false);
10683$ UpdateWindow (console);
10684
10685$ return ok;
10686 }
10687
10688#endif // TX_COMPILED
10689
10690//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10691//{ The assistants to the nightmare. You can use it freely to make your own nightmare sweet.
10692
10693#define _TX_TRY { goto __tx_try; } __tx_try: { int __tx_error = S_OK; (void)__tx_error;
10694#define _TX_CHECKED( cmd ) { if (FAILED (__tx_error = (cmd))) goto __tx_catch; }
10695#define _TX_FAIL { __tx_error = E_FAIL; goto __tx_catch; }
10696#define _TX_RETRY { __tx_error = S_OK; goto __tx_try; }
10697#define _TX_OK ( SUCCEEDED (__tx_error) )
10698#define _TX_CATCH goto __tx_finally; __tx_catch:
10699#define _TX_RETURN goto __tx_finally;
10700#define _TX_FINALLY __tx_finally:
10701#define _TX_ENDTRY }
10702
10703//}
10704//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10705
10706// Мало не покажется
10707
10708#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
10709
10710bool _txCreateShortcut (const char shortcutName[],
10711 const char fileToLink[], const char args[] /*= NULL*/, const char workDir[] /*= NULL*/,
10712 const char description[] /*= NULL*/, int cmdShow /*= SW_SHOWNORMAL*/, const char iconFile[] /*= NULL*/, int iconIndex /*= 0*/,
10713 int fontSize /*= 0*/, COORD bufSize /*= ZERO (COORD)*/, COORD wndSize /*= ZERO (COORD)*/, COORD wndOrg /*=ZERO (COORD)*/)
10714 {
10715$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (shortcutName && *shortcutName)) return false;
10716$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (fileToLink && *fileToLink)) return false;
10717
10718$ IShellLink* shellLink = NULL;
10719$ Win32::IShellLinkDataList* dataList = NULL;
10720$ IPersistFile* file = NULL;
10721
10722$ HRESULT init = Win32::CoInitialize (NULL);
10723
10724 _TX_TRY
10725 {
10726$ _TX_CHECKED (Win32::CoCreateInstance (CLSID_ShellLink, NULL, CLSCTX_INPROC_SERVER, Win32::IID_IShellLink, (void**) &shellLink));
10727$ if (!shellLink) _TX_FAIL;
10728
10729$ shellLink->SetPath (fileToLink);
10730$ shellLink->SetArguments (args);
10731$ shellLink->SetWorkingDirectory (workDir);
10732$ shellLink->SetDescription (description);
10733$ shellLink->SetShowCmd (cmdShow);
10734$ shellLink->SetIconLocation (iconFile, iconIndex);
10735
10736$ _TX_CHECKED (shellLink->QueryInterface (Win32::IID_IShellLinkDataList, (void**) &dataList));
10737$ if (!dataList) _TX_FAIL;
10738
10739$ Win32::NT_CONSOLE_PROPS props =
10740 {{sizeof (props), NT_CONSOLE_PROPS_SIG},
10741
10742 FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY, // wFillAttribute
10743 FOREGROUND_MAGENTA | BACKGROUND_WHITE, // wPopupFillAttribute
10744 {bufSize.X, bufSize.Y}, // dwScreenBufferSize
10745 {wndSize.X, wndSize.Y}, // dwWindowSize
10746 {wndOrg.X, wndOrg.Y}, // dwWindowOrigin
10747 0, // nFont
10748 0, // nInputBufferSize
10749 {0, (short) fontSize}, // dwFontSize
10750 0x36, 400, L"Lucida Console", // uFontFamily, uFontWeight, FaceName. We're dancing for this!
10751 15, // uCursorSize
10752 0, 1, 1, 0, // bFullScreen, bQuickEdit, bInsertMode, bAutoPosition
10753 50, 4, 0, // uHistoryBufferSize, uNumberOfHistoryBuffers, bHistoryNoDup
10754
10755 {0x000000, 0x800000, 0x008000, 0x808000, 0x000080, 0x800080, 0x008080, 0xC0C0C0, // Palette
10756 0x808080, 0xFF0000, 0x00FF00, 0xFFFF00, 0x0000FF, 0xFF00FF, 0x00FFFF, 0xFFFFFF}
10757 };
10758
10759$ _TX_CHECKED (dataList->AddDataBlock (&props));
10760
10761$ _TX_CHECKED (shellLink->QueryInterface (Win32::IID_IPersistFile, (void**) &file));
10762$ if (!file) _TX_FAIL;
10763
10764$ wchar_t wName[MAX_PATH] = L"";
10765$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, shortcutName, -1, wName, MAX_PATH) || ZeroMemory (wName, sizeof (wName));
10766
10767$ _TX_CHECKED (file->Save (wName, true));
10768 }
10769
10770$ _TX_CATCH
10771$ _TX_FINALLY
10772
10773$ if (file) file ->Release();
10774$ if (dataList) dataList ->Release();
10775$ if (shellLink) shellLink->Release();
10776
10777$ if (init == S_OK) Win32::CoUninitialize();
10778
10779$ return _TX_OK;
10780 _TX_ENDTRY
10781 }
10782
10783#endif // TX_COMPILED
10784
10785//}
10786//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10787
10789//}
10790//=================================================================================================================
10791
10792//=================================================================================================================
10793//{ Memory DC functions (_txBuffer...)
10795//=================================================================================================================
10797
10798#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
10799
10800HDC _txBuffer_Create (HWND wnd, const POINT* size /*= NULL*/, HBITMAP bitmap /*= NULL*/, RGBQUAD** pixels /*= NULL*/)
10801 {
10802$1 txAutoLock _lock;
10803
10804$ HDC wndDC = GetDC (wnd);
10805$ if (!wndDC) return NULL;
10806
10807$ POINT sz = { 1, 1 };
10808$ if (size) sz = *size;
10809
10810$ if (!size && wnd)
10811 {
10812$ RECT r = {};
10813$ GetClientRect (wnd, &r) asserted;
10814
10815$ sz.x = r.right - r.left;
10816$ sz.y = r.bottom - r.top;
10817 }
10818
10819$ if (bitmap)
10820 {
10821$ BITMAP bmap = {};
10822$ Win32::GetObject (bitmap, sizeof (bmap), &bmap) asserted;
10823
10824$ sz.x = bmap.bmWidth;
10825$ sz.y = bmap.bmHeight;
10826 }
10827
10828$ RGBQUAD* buf = NULL;
10829$ if (!pixels) pixels = &buf;
10830
10831$ HDC dc = Win32::CreateCompatibleDC (wndDC);
10832$ if (!dc) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot create buffer: CreateCompatibleDC() failed");
10833
10834$ BITMAPINFO info = {{ sizeof (info), sz.x, sz.y, 1, WORD (sizeof (RGBQUAD) * 8), BI_RGB }};
10835
10836$ HBITMAP bmap = bitmap? bitmap : Win32::CreateDIBSection (NULL, &info, DIB_RGB_COLORS, (void**) pixels, NULL, 0);
10837$ if (!bmap) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot create buffer: CreateCompatibleBitmap() failed");
10838
10839$ Win32::SelectObject (dc, bmap) asserted;
10840
10841$ if (!bitmap) Win32::PatBlt (dc, 0, 0, sz.x, sz.y, BLACKNESS) asserted;
10842
10843$ ReleaseDC (wnd, wndDC) asserted;
10844
10845$ return dc;
10846 }
10847
10848//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10849
10850bool _txBuffer_Delete (HDC* dc)
10851 {
10852$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (dc)) return false;
10853$ if ( !*dc) return false;
10854$ if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (*dc)) return false;
10855
10856$ if (!Win32::GetObjectType (Win32::GetCurrentObject (*dc, OBJ_BITMAP))) return false;
10857
10858$ txAutoLock _lock;
10859
10860$ _txBuffer_Select (Win32::GetStockObject (NULL_PEN), *dc) asserted;
10861$ _txBuffer_Select (Win32::GetStockObject (NULL_BRUSH), *dc) asserted;
10862$ _txBuffer_Select (Win32::GetStockObject (SYSTEM_FONT), *dc) asserted;
10863$ _txBuffer_Select (_txStockBitmap, *dc);
10864
10865$ Win32::DeleteObject (Win32::GetCurrentObject (*dc, OBJ_BITMAP)) asserted;
10866
10867$ Win32::DeleteDC (*dc) asserted;
10868
10869$ *dc = NULL;
10870
10871$ return true;
10872 }
10873
10874//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10875
10876bool _txBuffer_Select (HGDIOBJ obj, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
10877 {
10878$1 if (!obj) return false;
10879$ if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
10880
10881$ if (!Win32::GetObjectType (obj)) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Invalid GDI object type");
10882
10883$ txAutoLock _lock;
10884
10885$ obj = Win32::SelectObject (dc, obj);
10886$ if (obj) Win32::DeleteObject (obj);
10887
10888$ return obj != NULL;
10889 }
10890
10891#endif // TX_COMPILED
10892
10894//}
10895//=================================================================================================================
10896
10897//=================================================================================================================
10898//{ Diagnostics
10900//=================================================================================================================
10902
10903#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
10904
10905const char* _txError (const char* file /*= NULL*/, int line /*= 0*/, const char* func /*= NULL*/, unsigned color /*= 0*/,
10906 const char* msg /*= NULL*/, ...)
10907 { //---/\---/\-------Это ASCII KOT!--//
10908$1 va_list arg; va_start (arg, msg); // { '-' } //
10909$$ const char* what = _txProcessError (file, line, func, color, msg, arg); // { 0 0 } Добавь его себе //
10910 va_end (arg); // --> V <-- в исходник, и тебе //
10911 // \ \|/ / будет, наверно, //
10912 if (!(msg && msg[0] == '\a')) return what; // \___/ приятно отлаживаться //
10913 //---------------долгими ночами:)--//
10914// vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv
10915 DebugBreak(); // >>> Котики, вы в отладчике. Не пугайтесь. Есть шанс посмотреть переменные и разобраться.
10916// ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
10917
10918 return what; // >>> Уходите из функции пошаговой отладкой (F10/F11). Следите за стеком вызовов (Alt+7).
10919 }
10920
10921#endif // TX_COMPILED
10922
10923//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10924//{ General runtime check hooks
10925//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10926
10927#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
10928
10929void _txOnSignal (int sig /*= 0*/, int fpe /*= 0*/)
10930 {
10931$1 if (!sig && !fpe)
10932 {
10933$ signal (SIGSEGV, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10934$ signal (SIGFPE, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10935$ signal (SIGABRT, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10936$ signal (SIGILL, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10937$ signal (SIGTERM, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10938$ return;
10939 }
10940
10941 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%d, %d) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, sig, fpe);
10942
10943 #define GET_DESCR_(str, code, descr) case (code): {$ (str) = " " #code ": " descr; break; }
10944
10945$ const char* sSig = "Неизвестный тип сигнала";
10946
10947$ switch (sig)
10948 {
10949 GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGSEGV, "Доступ по неверному указателю. Ставьте ассерты!")
10950 GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGILL, "Попытка выполнить недопустимую операцию. Проверьте указатели на функции.")
10951 GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGABRT, "Аварийное завершение программы, вызвана функция abort().")
10952 GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGTERM, "Получен сигнал принудительного завершения программы.")
10953 GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGFPE, "Грубая ошибка в вычислениях.")
10954 default: break; //-V2522
10955 }
10956
10957$ const char* sFPE = "";
10958
10959 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10960
10961 // MSVC provides the FPE code as a MS extension.
10962 // See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/ru-ru/library/xdkz3x12.aspx
10963
10964$ if (sig == SIGFPE) switch (fpe)
10965 {
10966 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_INVALID, "Результат неверен.")
10967 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_DENORMAL, "Денормализация.")
10968 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_ZERODIVIDE, "Деление на ноль.")
10969 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_OVERFLOW, "Результат слишком большой.")
10970 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_UNDERFLOW, "Результат слишком маленький.")
10971 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_INEXACT, "Результат неточен.")
10972 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_UNEMULATED, "Операция не поддерживается.")
10973 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_SQRTNEG, "Квадратный корень из отрицательного числа.")
10974 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_STACKOVERFLOW, "Переполнение стека сопроцессора.")
10975 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_STACKUNDERFLOW, "В стеке сопроцессора не хватает данных.")
10976 GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_EXPLICITGEN, "Явный вызов исключения.")
10977 default: break; //-V2522
10978 }
10979
10980 #else
10981$ fpe = 0;
10982 #endif
10983
10984 #undef GET_DESCR_
10985
10986$ signal (sig, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal);
10987
10988$ Win32::_fpreset();
10989
10990$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a\t"
10991 "signal (%d, 0x%02X):%s%s "
10992 "%s%s"
10993 "С помощью функции signal() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
10994 sig, (unsigned) fpe, sSig, sFPE,
10995 ((_txDumpSE[1] == '\n')? "" : "\n\n"), _txDumpSE + 1);
10996 }
10997
10998//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10999
11000void _txOnTerminate()
11001 {
11002 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
11003
11004 // From: http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc%2B%2B-v3/libsupc%2B%2B/vterminate.cc
11005
11006$1 static int terminating = 0;
11007 if (terminating++) {$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a" "std::terminate() вызвана рекурсивно."); return; }
11008
11009$ if (!*_txDumpSE)
11010 {$ _txDumpExceptionCPP (_txDumpSE + 1, sizeof (_txDumpSE) - 2); }
11011
11012$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\t\a"
11013 "std::terminate(): Неперехваченное исключение в функции main() или в деструкторе, "
11014 "или другая фатальная ошибка C++. "
11015 "%s"
11016 "Используйте try/catch блоки, перехватывайте catch (...), проверяйте вызовы виртуальных функций, "
11017 "разбирайтесь, в чем дело.\n\n"
11018 "С помощью std::set_terminate() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку." + !*_txDumpSE,
11019 _txDumpSE + 1);
11020 }
11021
11022//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11023
11024void _txOnUnexpected()
11025 {
11026 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
11027
11028$1 if (!*_txDumpSE)
11029 {$ _txDumpExceptionCPP (_txDumpSE + 1, sizeof (_txDumpSE) - 2); }
11030
11031$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("std::unexpected(): Необработанное исключение.\n\n"
11032 "Проверьте свои catch-блоки. Перехватите catch (...). Если вы (зря) используете "
11033 "спецификацию исключений для функций, проверьте, не нарушена ли она."
11034 "%s"
11035 "С помощью catch (...) в main() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
11036 _txDumpSE + 1);
11037 }
11038
11039//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11040
11041int _txOnMatherr (_exception* exc)
11042 {
11043 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, exc);
11044
11045$1 assert (exc);
11046
11047 const char* sType = "Неизвестный тип исключения";
11048
11049 #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
11050
11051 #define GET_DESCR_(code, descr) case (code): {$ sType = "(" #code "): " descr; break; }
11052
11053$ switch (exc->type)
11054 {
11055 GET_DESCR_ (_DOMAIN, "Нарушение области определения");
11056 GET_DESCR_ (_SING, "Сингулярность аргумента");
11057 GET_DESCR_ (_PLOSS, "Частичная потеря значимости");
11058 GET_DESCR_ (_TLOSS, "Полная потеря значимости");
11059 GET_DESCR_ (_OVERFLOW, "Результат слишком большой");
11060 GET_DESCR_ (_UNDERFLOW, "Результат слишком маленький");
11061 default: break; //-V2522
11062 }
11063
11064 #undef GET_DESCR_
11065
11066$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("_matherr(): Математическая ошибка %d %s в функции %s (%lg, [%lg]). Она вернет значение %lg.\n\n"
11067 "С помощью __setusermatherr() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
11068 exc->type, sType, exc->name, exc->arg1, exc->arg2, exc->retval);
11069 #else
11070
11071$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("_matherr(): Математическая ошибка: %s.", sType);
11072
11073 #endif
11074
11075 return 0;
11076 }
11077

11080tx_noreturn void _txOnNewHandlerAnsi()
11081 {
11082 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
11083$1
11084$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("operator new: Ошибка выделения памяти.\n\n"
11085 "С помощью std::set_new_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
11086 "и где-нибудь найти недостающую память.");
11087
11088$ throw std::bad_alloc();
11089 }

11093void _txOnSecurityErrorAnsi (const char* msg, void* ptr, int code)
11094 {
11095 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%s, 0x%p, %d) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, msg, ptr, code);
11096
11097$1 if (code)
11098 {$ errno = code; }
11099
11100$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a"
11101 "Ошибка переполнения буфера %d: %s в %.20s (0x%p). Ставьте ассерты!\n\n"
11102 "С помощью std::set_constraint_handler_s() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
11103 "и постараться не выходить за границы массивов.",
11104 code, msg, (char*) ptr, ptr);
11105 }

11131 {

11133$5
11134$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("operator new: Ошибка выделения %llu байт памяти.\n\n"
11135 "С помощью _set_new_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "

11146$5

11155void _txOnPureCall()
11156 {
11157 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
11158$5
11159$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a"
11160 "Вызвана чисто виртуальная функция. Такое бывает, например, в конструкторах "
11161 "или деструкторах базовых классов - не вызывайте там таких функций.\n\n"
11162 "С помощью _set_purecall_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
11163 "и проверить свое знание С++ :)");
11164 }

11167
11168void _txOnInvalidParam (const wchar_t* wExpr, const wchar_t* wFunc, const wchar_t* wFile, unsigned int line, uintptr_t addr)
11169 {
11170 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%S, %S, %S, %d, 0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, wExpr, wFunc, wFile, line, addr);
11171
11172$5 assert (wExpr);
11173 assert (wFunc);
11174 assert (wFile);
11175
11176 char expr [_TX_BUFSIZE/2] = "[Unknowm expr]",
11177 func [_TX_BUFSIZE/2] = "[Unknowm func]",
11178 file [MAX_PATH] = "[Unknowm file]";
11179
11180$ WideCharToMultiByte (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, wExpr, -1, expr, sizeof (expr) - 1, NULL, NULL);
11181$ WideCharToMultiByte (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, wFunc, -1, func, sizeof (func) - 1, NULL, NULL);
11182$ WideCharToMultiByte (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, wFile, -1, file, sizeof (file) - 1, NULL, NULL);
11183
11184$$ _txError (file, (int) line, func, 0, "\a"
11185 "В функцию %s передан неверный параметр: неверно, что %s. Не надо так.\n\n"
11186 "С помощью _set_invalid_parameter_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.", func, expr);
11187 }

11192
11193void _txLibCppDebugFunction (std::__libcpp_debug_info const& info)
11194 {
11195$5 assert (&info);
11196
11197$$ _txError (info.__file_, info.__line_, NULL, 0, "\a"
11198 "Оказалось неверно, что %s (%s). Не надо так.\n\n"
11199 "С помощью std::__libcpp_debug_function вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.", info.__pred_, info.__msg_);
