11204//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11205
11206#pragma runtime_checks ("", off)
11207
11208int _txOnRTCFailure (int type, const char* file, int line, const char* module, const char* format, ...)
11209 {
11210 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%d, %s, %d, %s, %s) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, type, file, line, module, format);
11211
11212$5 static long running = 0;
11213$ while (InterlockedExchange (&running, 1)) Sleep (0);
11214
11215$ assert (format);
11216
11217 // Disable all RTC failures
11218
11219$ int nErrors = _RTC_NumErrors();
11220$ int* errors = NULL;
11221$ try { errors = (int*) _alloca (nErrors * sizeof (*errors)); } catch (...) {;} //-V104
11222
11223$ int err = 0;
11224$ for (int i = 0; i < nErrors; i++) *(errors? &errors[i] : &err) = _RTC_SetErrorType ((_RTC_ErrorNumber) i, _RTC_ERRTYPE_IGNORE); //-V108
11225
11226$ char text [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
11227
11228$ va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
11229$ _tx_vsnprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1, format, arg); // Get message from the vararg list
11230$ auto error = (_RTC_ErrorNumber) va_arg (arg, int /*_RTC_ErrorNumber*/); // Get the RTC error number
11231$ va_end (arg);
11232
11233$ const char* sType = "type";
11234
11235$ switch (type)
11236 {
11237 case _CRT_ERROR: $ sType = "ошибка"; break;
11238 case _CRT_ASSERT: $ sType = "логическая ошибка"; break;
11239 case _CRT_WARN: $ sType = "возможная ошибка"; break;
11240 default: $ break;
11241 }
11242
11243$ const char* sError = _RTC_GetErrDesc (error);
11244
11245$$ _txError (file, line, NULL, 0, "\a"
11246 "Сбой проверки выполнения машинного кода: %s %d (%s): %s в модуле %s.", sType, error, sError, text, module);
11247
11248 // The code below will be never executed until the error above will stay fatal:
11249
11250 // Restore the RTC error types
11251
11252 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
11253 #pragma warning (push)
11254 #pragma warning (disable: 6385) // Reading invalid data from 'errors': the readable size is 'n' bytes, but 'm' bytes may be read.
11255 #endif
11256
11257$ for (int i = 0; i < nErrors; i++) _RTC_SetErrorType ((_RTC_ErrorNumber) i, (errors? errors[i] : _CRT_ERROR)); //-V108
11258
11259 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
11260 #pragma warning (pop) // Reading invalid data from 'errors': the readable size is 'n' bytes, but 'm' bytes may be read.
11261 #endif
11262
11263$ InterlockedExchange (&running, 0);
11264$ return 1;
11265 }
11266
11267#pragma runtime_checks ("", restore)
11268
11269//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11270
11271int _txOnAllocHook (int type, void* data, size_t size, int use, long request, const unsigned char* file, int line)
11272 {
11273 #if (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE +0 >= 4)
11274
11275 static _tx_thread int recursive = 0;
11276 if (recursive) return true;
11277 recursive++;
11278
11279 #if (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE +0 <= 10)
11280 if (!size) return true;
11281 #endif
11282
11283 #define GET_DESCR_(str, type) case (type): { str = #type; break; }
11284
11285 const char* sType = "Unknown type";
11286 const char* sUse = "Unknown use";
11287
11288 switch (_BLOCK_TYPE (type))
11289 {
11290 GET_DESCR_ (sType, _HOOK_ALLOC);
11291 GET_DESCR_ (sType, _HOOK_REALLOC);
11292 GET_DESCR_ (sType, _HOOK_FREE);
11293 default: break;
11294 }
11295
11296 switch (use)
11297 {
11298 GET_DESCR_ (sUse, _NORMAL_BLOCK);
11299 GET_DESCR_ (sUse, _CRT_BLOCK);
11300 GET_DESCR_ (sUse, _CLIENT_BLOCK);
11301 GET_DESCR_ (sUse, _FREE_BLOCK);
11302 GET_DESCR_ (sUse, _IGNORE_BLOCK);
11303 default: break;
11304 }
11305
11306 #undef GET_DESCR_
11307
11308 _txTrace ((const char*) file, line, NULL, "%*s"
11309 "_txOnAllocHook (type = 0x%02X (%-*s), subtype =0x%X, data = 0x%p, size = 0x%p, use = 0x%02X (%-*s), request = %ld)",
11310 2 * _txLoc::Cur.inTX, "",
11311 type, 13, sType, _BLOCK_SUBTYPE (type), data, (void*) size, use, 13, sUse, request);
11312
11313 recursive--;
11314
11315 #else
11316
11317 UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (type);
11318 UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (data);
11319 UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (size);
11320 UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (use);
11321 UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (request);
11322 UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (file);
11323 UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (line);
11324
11325 #endif
11326
11327 return true; //-V601
11328 }
11329
11330//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11331
11332#endif // TX_COMPILED
11333
11334#endif
11335
11336//}
11337//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11338
11339//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11340//{ SEH staff
11341//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11342
11343#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
11344
11345long WINAPI _txVectoredExceptionHandler (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc)
11346 {
11347 if (!_txProcessSystemWarnings)
11348 {
11349 DWORD code = (exc && exc->ExceptionRecord)? exc->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionCode : 0; //-V560
11350 void* addr = (exc && exc->ExceptionRecord)? exc->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionAddress : NULL; //-V560
11351
11352 if (code != DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_C &&
11353 code != DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_WIDE_C)
11354 {
11355 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (code 0x%08lX, addr 0x%p) called and SKIPPED! (_txProcessSystemWarnings == %d)\n",
11356 _TX_VERSION, "_txVectoredExceptionHandler", (unsigned long) code, addr, _txProcessSystemWarnings);
11357 }
11358
11359 return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
11360 }
11361 else
11362 {
11363 int inTX = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
11364
11365 long ret = _txOnExceptionSEH (exc, "_txVectoredExceptionHandler");
11366
11367 _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX;
11368 return ret;
11369 }
11370 }
11371
11372//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11373
11374long WINAPI _txUnhandledExceptionFilter (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc)
11375 {
11376 int inTX = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
11377
11378 long ret = _txOnExceptionSEH (exc, "_txUnhandledExceptionFilter");
11379
11380 if (_txPrevUEFilter)
11381 {
11382 if (_txSetJmp())
11383 {
11384 int inTX2 = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
11385
11386 ret = _txPrevUEFilter (exc);
11387
11388 _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX2;
11389 }
11390 else
11391 {
11392$6 _txClearJmp();
11393
11394 _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\t\a" "%s"
11395 "С помощью функции _set_se_translator() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.\n\n"
11396 "Дополнительно: Сбой вызова стандартного обработчика неперехваченнных исключений SEH." + !*_txDumpSE,
11397 _txDumpSE + 1);
11398 }
11399 }
11400
11401 _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX;
11402 return ret;
11403 }
11404
11405//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11406
11407LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER WINAPI _txOnSetUnhandledExceptionFilter (LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER filter)
11408 {
11409$6 _txPrevUEFilter = filter;
11410
11411 return (LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER) _txUnhandledExceptionFilter;
11412 }
11413
11414//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11415
11416long _txOnExceptionSEH (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc, const char func[])
11417 {
11418 assert (exc); if (!exc) {$ return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH; } //-V547
11419
11420 assert (exc->ExceptionRecord);
11421
11422 assert (func);
11423 assert (func[3] == 'V' || func[3] == 'U');
11424
11425 bool unhExc = (func[3] == 'U');
11426 DWORD code = (exc && exc->ExceptionRecord)? exc->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionCode : 0; //-V560
11427 void* addr = (exc && exc->ExceptionRecord)? exc->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionAddress : NULL; //-V560
11428
11429 if (code == DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_C ||
11430 code == DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_WIDE_C ||
11431 code == DBG_THREAD_NAME ||
11432 (code == RPC_S_SERVER_UNAVAILABLE && !unhExc) ||
11433 (code == RPC_S_CALL_CANCELLED && !unhExc) ||
11434 (code == EXCEPTION_BREAKPOINT && IsDebuggerPresent()))
11435 return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
11436
11437 _txSENumber = _txSENumber + 1;
11438 if (HIBYTE (HIWORD (code)) == 0xC0) _txSEFatalNumber = _txSEFatalNumber + 1;
11439
11440 OutputDebugString ("\n");
11441 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: #%ld: %s (code 0x%08lX, addr 0x%p) called\n",
11442 _TX_VERSION, _txSENumber, func, (unsigned long) code, addr);
11443
11444$6 if (*(unsigned long long*) _txDumpExceptionObjJmp)
11445 {
11446$ longjmp (_txDumpExceptionObjJmp, 1); //-V2512
11447 }
11448
11449 tx_fpreset();
11450
11451 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
11452 if (code == EXCEPTION_STACK_OVERFLOW) {$ _resetstkoflw(); }
11453 #endif
11454
11455$ bool primaryException = !(func && exc) || !((unhExc && *_txDumpSE) || _TX_MSC__CXX_DETECT_RETHROW (exc->ExceptionRecord)); //-V560
11456
11457$ if (primaryException && exc) //-V560
11458 {
11459$ unsigned err = GetLastError();
11460
11461$ const char* stackTrace = _txCaptureStackBackTrace (0, true, exc->ContextRecord, exc);
11462
11463$ _txDumpExceptionSEH (_txDumpSE, (intptr_t) sizeof (_txDumpSE) - 1, exc->ExceptionRecord, func);
11464$ _tx_snprintf_s (_txTraceSE, (intptr_t) sizeof (_txTraceSE) - 1, "%s", stackTrace);
11465
11466$ static _tx_thread DWORD prevCode = 0;
11467$ static _tx_thread void* prevAddr = NULL;
11468
11469$ if (code != prevCode && addr != prevAddr &&
11470 !strstr (_txDumpSE, "Объект исключения C++:"))
11471 {
11472$ SetLastError (err);
11473$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\v\b\t" "%s", _txDumpSE + 1);
11474
11475$ prevCode = code;
11476$ prevAddr = addr;
11477 }
11478
11479$ SetLastError (err);
11480 }
11481
11482$ if (_txDumpSE[0] == '\a' ||
11483 _txSENumber >= _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0 ||
11484 _txSEFatalNumber >= _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0)
11485 {
11486$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a\t" "%s"
11487 "С помощью функции _set_se_translator() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
11488 _txDumpSE + 1);
11489 }
11490
11491$ return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
11492 }
11493
11494//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11495
11496intptr_t _txDumpExceptionSEH (char what[], intptr_t size, const EXCEPTION_RECORD* exc, const char func[]) //-V2008
11497 {
11498$6 assert (what);
11499$ assert (size >= 0); //-V547
11500 assert (exc); if (!exc) {$ return 0; } //-V547
11501$ assert (func);
11502
11503$ unsigned code = exc->ExceptionCode;
11504$ void* addr = exc->ExceptionAddress;
11505$ unsigned params = exc->NumberParameters;
11506$ const ULONG_PTR* info = exc->ExceptionInformation;
11507$ void* object = (params >= 2)? (void*) info[1] : NULL;
11508
11509$ char* s = what;
11510
11511 #define PRINT_(...) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size-2 - (s-what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11512
11513$ const char* sCode = NULL;
11514$ const char* sDescr = NULL;
11515
11516 #define GET_DESCR_(code, descr) case ((unsigned long) (code)): {$ sCode = #code; sDescr = descr; break; }
11517
11518$ switch (code)
11519 {
11520 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION, " " "Нарушение доступа к памяти.")
11521 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_ILLEGAL_INSTRUCTION, " " "Недопустимая операция.")
11522 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_PRIV_INSTRUCTION, " " "Привилегированная операция.")
11523 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_ARRAY_BOUNDS_EXCEEDED, "\a" "Выход за границы массива. Ставьте ассерты!")
11524 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_BREAKPOINT, "\a" "Достигнута точка останова. Удачи в отладке!")
11525 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_DATATYPE_MISALIGNMENT, "\a" "Нарушение выравнивания данных.")
11526 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INVALID_DISPOSITION, "\a" "Обработчик исключения возвратил неверное значение.")
11527 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_IN_PAGE_ERROR, "\a" "Невозможно загрузить нужную страницу памяти.")
11528 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE_EXCEPTION, "\a" "Продолжение выполнения невозможно.")
11529 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_SINGLE_STEP, "\a" "Выполнена инструкция машинного кода. Одна штука.")
11530 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_STACK_OVERFLOW, "\a" "Ю-ху! Переполнение стека!")
11531 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_GUARD_PAGE, "\a" "Попытка доступа к защищенной странице памяти.")
11532 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INVALID_HANDLE, "\a" "Неверный или уже закрытый дескриптор.")
11533 GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_POSSIBLE_DEADLOCK, "\a" "Возможно, взаимная блокировка ресурсов.")
11534
11535 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_STACK_CHECK, "\a" "Ошибка стека при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11536 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_DENORMAL_OPERAND, " " "Денормализация числа с плавающей точкой.")
11537 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO, " " "Деление на ноль при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11538 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_INEXACT_RESULT, " " "Неточный результат при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11539 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_INVALID_OPERATION, " " "Недопустимая операция с плавающей точкой.")
11540 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_OVERFLOW, " " "Переполнение при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11541 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_UNDERFLOW, " " "Потеря значимости при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11542 GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_FLOAT_MULTIPLE_FAULTS, " " "Множественные ошибки с плавающей точкой.")
11543
11544 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INT_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO, "\a" "Целочисленное деление на ноль.")
11545 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INT_OVERFLOW, "\a" "Переполнение при целочисленной операции.")
11546
11547 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CLR_FAILURE, "\a" "Сбой среды исполнения (CLR).")
11548 GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_STACK_BUFFER_OVERRUN, "\a" "Переполнение стекового буфера!")
11549 GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_ASSERTION_FAILURE, "\a" "Сработал assert. На этот раз из ядра.")
11550 GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_WX86_BREAKPOINT, "\a" "Точка останова подсистемы эмуляции x86.")
11551 GET_DESCR_ (RPC_S_UNKNOWN_IF, "\a" "Неизвестный интерфейс удаленного вызова процедур (RPC).")
11552 GET_DESCR_ (RPC_S_SERVER_UNAVAILABLE, "\a" "Сервер удаленного вызова процедур (RPC) недоступен.")
11553 GET_DESCR_ (DBG_TERMINATE_THREAD, "\a" "Отладчик завершил поток сознания.")
11554 GET_DESCR_ (DBG_TERMINATE_PROCESS, "\a" "Отладчик завершил процесс.")
11555 GET_DESCR_ (DBG_CONTROL_C, "\a" "Отладчик получил сигнал прерывания Control+C.")
11556 GET_DESCR_ (DBG_CONTROL_BREAK, "\a" "Отладчик получил сигнал прерывания Control+Break.")
11557 GET_DESCR_ (DBG_THREAD_NAME, " " "Отладчик получил указание дать потоку имя.")
11558 GET_DESCR_ (DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_C, " " "Отладчик вывел исключение по CTRL+C (OutputDebugStringA).")
11559 GET_DESCR_ (DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_WIDE_C, " " "Отладчик вывел исключение по CTRL+C (OutputDebugStringW).")
11560
11561 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC, " " "Исключение С++, вызванное оператором throw.")
11562 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC, " " "Исключение С++, вызванное оператором throw.")
11563 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_UNWIND, " " "Исключение С++, вызванное во время раскрутки стека (rethrow?).")
11564 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_FORCED, " " "Исключение С++, вызванное нарушением магии.")
11565 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_BORLAND_BUILDER, "\a" "Это скомпилилось под Билдер? O_O")
11566 GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_BORLAND_DELPHI, "\a" "Это же С++. Как это вышло?")
11567
11568 default: $ break;
11569 }
11570
11571 #undef GET_DESCR_
11572
11573$ if (sDescr)
11574 {
11575$ PRINT_ ("%s\n\n" "#%ld: Исключение %s", sDescr, _txSENumber, sCode);
11576 }
11577 else
11578 {
11579$ PRINT_ ("\a#%ld: ", _txSENumber);
11580$ s += FormatMessage (FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_HMODULE | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS, //-V102
11581 GetModuleHandle ("NTDLL.DLL"), code, MAKELANGID (LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
11582 s, (DWORD) (size - (s-what)), NULL) - 2; //-V202
11583$ PRINT_ ("\r\r");
11584 }
11585
11586$ PRINT_ (" (0x%X) при выполнении кода по адресу", code);
11587$ PRINT_ ((addr? " 0x%p" : " NULL"), addr);
11588
11589$ Win32::SYMBOL_INFO* sym = NULL;
11590$ Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64* line = NULL;
11591
11592 if (addr) {$ _txSymGetFromAddr (addr, &sym, &line); }
11593
11594$ if (sym && *sym->Name) PRINT_ (" в функции %s()", sym->Name);
11595$ if (line && line->FileName && *line->FileName) PRINT_ (" в файле %s на строке %u", line->FileName, (unsigned) line->LineNumber);
11596
11597$ if (code == EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION ||
11598 code == EXCEPTION_IN_PAGE_ERROR)
11599 {
11600$ PRINT_ (". Попытка ");
11601
11602$ unsigned long op = 0xBADC0DE;
11603$ const char* sOp = "(действие не указано)";
11604
11605$ if (params >= 1)
11606 {
11607$ switch (op = (unsigned long) info[0]) //-V202
11608 {
11609 case 0: $ sOp = "прочесть данные"; break;
11610 case 1: $ sOp = "записать данные"; break;
11611 case 8: $ sOp = "исполнить код"; break;
11612 default: $ sOp = "совершить операцию 0x%lX"; break;
11613 }
11614 }
11615
11616$ PRINT_ (sOp, op);
11617
11618$ if (params >= 2) {$ PRINT_ ((object? " по адресу 0x%p" : " по адресу NULL"), object); } //-V1048
11619 else {$ PRINT_ (" (адрес не указан)"); }
11620
11621$ if (code == EXCEPTION_IN_PAGE_ERROR)
11622 {
11623$ PRINT_ (", ошибка ввода-вывода:");
11624
11625$ if (params >= 3)
11626 {
11627$ unsigned long ntstatus = (unsigned long) info[2]; //-V202
11628
11629$ PRINT_ (" 0x%lX (", ntstatus);
11630
11631$ s += FormatMessage (FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_HMODULE | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS, //-V102
11632 GetModuleHandle ("NTDLL.DLL"), ntstatus, MAKELANGID (LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
11633 s, (DWORD) (size - (s-what)), NULL) - 2; //-V202
11634$ PRINT_ (")");
11635 }
11636 else
11637 {$ PRINT_ (" (не указана)"); }
11638 }
11639 }
11640
11641$ HMODULE module = NULL;
11642$ _TX_CALL (Win32::GetModuleHandleEx, (GET_MODULE_HANDLE_EX_FLAG_FROM_ADDRESS, (const char*) addr, &module));
11643
11644$ if (module)
11645 {
11646$ static char sModule [MAX_PATH] = "";
11647$ int ok = GetModuleFileName (module, sModule, sizeof (sModule));
11648
11649$ char* ext = (ok? strrchr (sModule, '.') : NULL);
11650$ if (ext) _strlwr_s (ext, sizeof (sModule) - 1 - (ext - sModule));
11651
11652 if (ok) {$ PRINT_ (" в модуле %s", sModule); }
11653 else {$ PRINT_ (" в модуле 0x%p", module); }
11654 }
11655
11656$ PRINT_ (".");
11657
11658$ if (_txSENumber >= _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0)
11659 {$ PRINT_ (" Дополнительно, превышен лимит исключений _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT (%d).", _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0); }
11660
11661$ if (_txSEFatalNumber >= _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0)
11662 {$ PRINT_ (" Также превышен лимит фатальных исключений _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT (%d).", _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0); }
11663
11664$ PRINT_ (" Спасибо %s(), что сообщил. Люблю его <3", func);
11665
11666$ if (exc->ExceptionFlags & EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE)
11667 {$ PRINT_ ("\n\n" "Ой, всё (EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE)."); }
11668
11669$ if (exc->ExceptionRecord)
11670 {
11671$ PRINT_ ("\n\n" "Причина:" "\n\n");
11672$ s += _txDumpExceptionSEH (s, size - (s-what), exc->ExceptionRecord, func);
11673 }
11674
11675$ if (code == EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC ||
11676 code == EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_UNWIND ||
11677 code == EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_FORCED ||
11678 code == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC)
11679 {
11680$ s += _txDumpExceptionCPP (s, size - (s-what), code, params, info);
11681 }
11682
11683 #undef PRINT_
11684
11685$ while (s > what && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11686$ if (s > what) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s-what), "\n\n");
11687
11688$ return s - what;
11689 }
11690
11691//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11692
11693intptr_t _txDumpExceptionCPP (char what[], intptr_t size,
11694 unsigned code /*= 0*/, unsigned params /*= 0*/, const ULONG_PTR info[] /*= NULL*/)
11695 {
11696$6 assert (what);
11697$ assert (size >= 0); //-V547
11698
11699$ char* s = what;
11700
11701$ switch (code)
11702 {
11703 #if defined (_GCC_VER)
11704
11705 case EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC:
11706 case EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_UNWIND:
11707 case EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_FORCED:
11708 {
11709 // See: [1] http://llvm.org/svn/llvm-project/libcxxabi/trunk/src/cxa_exception.cpp
11710 // [2] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libgcc/unwind-seh.c, lines 51-55 and below
11711 // [3] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/eh_throw.cc, __cxa_throw, line 59 and below
11712 // [4] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/unwind-cxx.h, __cxa_exception, line 58 and below
11713 // and figure above near ABI::__cxa_exception definition in this file
11714
11715$ const std::type_info* type = NULL;
11716$ void* object = NULL;
11717
11718$ if (params >= 1)
11719 {
11720$ _Unwind_Exception* unwind_exception = (_Unwind_Exception*) info[0];
11721$ ABI::__cxa_exception* cxa_exception = (ABI::__cxa_exception*) (unwind_exception + 1) - 1;
11722
11723$ type = cxa_exception->exceptionType;
11724$ object = cxa_exception + 1;
11725 }
11726
11727$ s += _txDumpExceptionObj (s, size - (s-what), object, 0, type);
11728 }
11729$ break;
11730
11731 case 0: // Not called within SEH chain
11732 {
11733 // From: [1] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/eh_type.cc
11734 // [2] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/vterminate.cc
11735
11736 using namespace abi;
11737
11738$ ABI::__cxa_exception* cxa_exception = __cxa_get_globals() -> caughtExceptions;
11739
11740$ if (cxa_exception && (cxa_exception->unwindHeader.exception_class & 1)) // Dependent exception, case B, see pic above
11741 {
11742$ cxa_exception = (((ABI::__cxa_exception*) (&cxa_exception->unwindHeader + 1) - 1) -> primaryException) - 1;
11743 }
11744
11745$ if (cxa_exception)
11746 {
11747$ verify (cxa_exception->exceptionType == abi::__cxa_current_exception_type());
11748
11749$ s += _txDumpExceptionObj (s, size, cxa_exception + 1, 0, cxa_exception->exceptionType);
11750 }
11751 }
11752$ break;
11753
11754 #elif defined (_MSC_VER)
11755
11756 case EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC:
11757 {
11758 // See [1] http://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20100730-00/?p=13273
11759 // [2] http://www.openrce.org/articles/full_view/21
11760 // [3] http://www.openrce.org/articles/full_view/23
11761 // [4] http://yurichev.com/mirrors/RE/Recon-2012-Skochinsky-Compiler-Internals.pdf
11762
11763$ const std::type_info* type = NULL;
11764$ void* object = (params >= 2)? (void*) info[1] : NULL;
11765$ size_t szObj = 0;
11766
11767$ if (params >= 3 &&
11768 (info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_MAGIC_NUMBER1 ||
11769 info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_MAGIC_NUMBER2 ||
11770 info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_MAGIC_NUMBER3 ||
11771 info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_PURE_MAGIC_NUMBER1))
11772 {
11773$ auto throwInfo = (const Win32::ThrowInfo*) info[2];
11774
11775$ if (throwInfo && throwInfo->pCatchableTypeArray)
11776 {
11777$ HMODULE module = (params >= 4)? (HMODULE) info[3] : NULL; //-V112
11778
11779 #define RVA_(type, addr) ( (type) ((uintptr_t) module + (uintptr_t) (addr)) )
11780
11781$ const Win32::CatchableTypeArray* cArray = RVA_(const Win32::CatchableTypeArray*, throwInfo->pCatchableTypeArray);
11782$ const Win32::CatchableType* cType = RVA_(const Win32::CatchableType*, cArray->arrayOfCatchableTypes[0]);
11783
11784$ type = RVA_(const std::type_info*, cType->pType);
11785$ szObj = cType->sizeOrOffset; //-V101
11786
11787 #undef RVA_
11788 }
11789 }
11790
11791$ s += _txDumpExceptionObj (s, size - (s-what), object, szObj, type);
11792 }
11793 break;
11794
11795 case 0: // Not called within SEH chain
11796
11797 // signal() handlers or unexpected()/terminate() are called after Vectored Exception in MSC:
11798 //
11799 // terminate() is called by __scrt_unhandled_exception_filter() in case of MSC exception.
11800 // See C:\Bin\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\crt\src\vcruntime\utility_desktop.cpp
11801 //
11802 // signal() handlers are called by _seh_filter_exe(), which is called by _mainCRTStartup() in case of exception.
11803 // See C:\Bin\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\crt\src\vcruntime\mcrtexe.cpp
11804 // and C:\Bin\Windows Kits\10\Source\10.0.10240.0\ucrt\misc\exception_filter.cpp
11805 // and http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff730818.aspx.
11806 //
11807 // So _txDumpSE information should have been recorded during previous call. Now do nothing.
11808
11809$ break;
11810
11811 #endif
11812
11813 default:
11814$ txOutputDebugPrintf ("ERROR: Wrong call to %s: Unknown exception code 0x%08X\n", __TX_FUNCTION__, code);
11815$ break;
11816 }
11817
11818$ while (s > what && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11819$ if (s > what) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s - what), "\n\n");
11820
11821$ return (s - what);
11822 }
11823
11824//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11825
11826intptr_t _txDumpExceptionObj (char what[], intptr_t size, void* object, size_t sizeObj, const std::type_info* type) //-V2008
11827 {
11828$6 assert (what);
11829$ assert (size > 0); //-V547
11830
11831$ static char* s = NULL; s = what;
11832$ static size_t szObj = 0; szObj = sizeObj;
11833
11834 #define PRINT_(...) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s - what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11835
11836$ PRINT_ ("\n\n" "Объект исключения C++:");
11837
11838$ const char* mangledName = (type)? type->name() : NULL;
11839
11840$ char* typeName = NULL;
11841$ int err = 1;
11842
11843 #if defined (_GCC_VER)
11844$ typeName = ::abi::__cxa_demangle (mangledName, 0, 0, &err);
11845 #endif
11846
11847$ const char* name = (!err && typeName)? typeName : mangledName; //-V560
11848
11849$ if (name &&
11850 (strcmp (name, "class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >") == 0 ||
11851 strcmp (name, "std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >") == 0))
11852 {$ name = "std::string"; }
11853
11854$ if (name &&
11855 (strcmp (name, "class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > *") == 0 ||
11856 strcmp (name, "class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > * __ptr64") == 0 ||
11857 strcmp (name, "std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >*") == 0))
11858 {$ name = "std::string*"; }
11859
11860 if (name) {$ PRINT_ (" %s", name); }
11861
11862 #if defined (_GCC_VER)
11863$ free (typeName);
11864 #endif
11865
11866$ err = 0;
11867$ if (mangledName)
11868 {
11869 if (_txSetJmp())
11870 {
11871 #define PRINT_VAL_(fmt, typ, ...) \
11872 else if (*type == typeid ( typ )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (* (typ* ) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11873 else if (*type == typeid (const typ )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (* (typ* ) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11874 else if (*type == typeid ( typ* )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11875 else if (*type == typeid (const typ* )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11876 else if (*type == typeid ( typ* const)) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11877 else if (*type == typeid (const typ* const)) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); }
11878
11879 if (false) ;
11880 PRINT_VAL_ ("%s", char*) PRINT_VAL_ ('%c', unsigned char) PRINT_VAL_ (%s, bool, ? "true" : "false") //-V206 //-V517
11881 PRINT_VAL_ ( %d, int) PRINT_VAL_ ( %u, unsigned int) PRINT_VAL_ (%g, float) //-V206
11882 PRINT_VAL_ ( %hd, short) PRINT_VAL_ ( %hu, unsigned short) PRINT_VAL_ (%lg, double) //-V206
11883 PRINT_VAL_ ( %ld, long) PRINT_VAL_ ( %lu, unsigned long) PRINT_VAL_ ('%c', char) //-V206
11884 PRINT_VAL_ ("%s", std::string, .c_str()) //-V206
11885
11886 else if (std::exception* e = dynamic_cast <std::exception*> ( (std::exception* ) object))
11887 {
11888$ PRINT_ (", what(): \"%s\"", e->what());
11889 }
11890 else
11891 {$ err = 1; }
11892 }
11893 else
11894 {$ err = 2; }
11895 }
11896
11897$ _txClearJmp();
11898
11899$ if (err && object && szObj)
11900 {
11901$ const unsigned char* buf = (const unsigned char*) object;
11902
11903$ if (szObj >= 64) szObj = 64;
11904
11905$ PRINT_ (", дамп: [");
11906$ for (size_t i = 0; i < szObj; i++) PRINT_ ("%c", (isprint (buf[i]) && !iscntrl (buf[i]))? buf[i] : '.' );
11907
11908$ PRINT_ ("]");
11909$ for (size_t i = 0; i < szObj; i++) PRINT_ (" %02X", buf[i]);
11910
11911$ err = 0;
11912 }
11913
11914$ if (err)
11915 {$ PRINT_ (" = ??"); }
11916
11917$ PRINT_ ((object? "%sего адрес 0x%p." : "%sего адрес NULL."), ((typeName || mangledName)? ", " : ""), object); //-V560
11918
11919 #undef PRINT_VAL_
11920 #undef PRINT_
11921
11922$ return s - what;
11923 }
11924
11925#endif // TX_COMPILED
11926
11927//}
11928//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11929
11930//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11931//{ Stack trace and debug info access
11932//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11933
11934#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
11935
11936const char* _txCaptureStackBackTrace (int framesToSkip /*= 0*/, bool readSource /*= true*/,
11937 CONTEXT* context /*= NULL*/, EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc /*= NULL*/,
11938 HANDLE thread /*= GetCurrentThread()*/)
11939 {
11940$6 const int maxFrames = 62; // MS says: < 63
11941$ static char trace [(MAX_PATH + 1024+1) * maxFrames] = "";
11942
11943 if (framesToSkip == -1) {$ return trace; }
11944
11945$ static void* capture [maxFrames] = {};
11946$ int frames = _txStackWalk (framesToSkip + !context, sizearr (capture), capture, context, thread);
11947
11948$ memset (trace, 0, sizeof (trace));
11949$ char* s = trace;
11950
11951 #define PRINT_(...) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (trace) - 1 - 3 - (s-trace), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11952
11953$ for (int i = 0, n = 0; i < frames; i++) //-V2530
11954 {
11955$ void* addr = capture[i];
11956
11957$ Win32::SYMBOL_INFO* sym = NULL;
11958$ Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64* line = NULL;
11959$ const char* module = NULL;
11960$ const char* source = NULL;
11961$ bool inTX = false;
11962
11963 if (addr) {$ inTX = _txSymGetFromAddr ((char*) addr - 1, &sym, &line, &module); }
11964 if (readSource && !inTX) {$ _txSymGetFromAddr ((void*) 1, NULL, NULL, NULL, &source, 2); } //-V566
11965
11966$ int nl = 0;
11967$ while (s > trace && s[-1] == '\n') { s--; nl++; }
11968
11969 #if !defined (_TX_FULL_STACKTRACE)
11970
11971$ if (! ((sym && *sym->Name) || (line && ((line->FileName && *line->FileName) || line->LineNumber))))
11972 {$ continue; }
11973
11974 #endif
11975
11976$ PRINT_ ("%s#%2d 0x%p", ((n)? ((source || nl)? "\n\n" : "\n") : ""), i, addr);
11977$ n++;
11978
11979 if (addr == 0) {$ PRINT_ (" [Неверный фрейм]"); break; }
11980 if (addr == (void*) -1) {$ PRINT_ (" [Странный фрейм]"); break; }
11981 if (addr == (void*)(uintptr_t) 0xBAADF00D) {$ PRINT_ (" [Мусор от LocalAlloc()]"); break; } //-V566
11982
11983 if (module) {$ PRINT_ (" in %s%s", module, ((sym && *sym->Name)? ": " : "")); }
11984 if (sym && *sym->Name) {$ PRINT_ ("%s()", sym->Name); }
11985 if (line && line->FileName) {$ PRINT_ (" at %s", line->FileName); }
11986 if (line && line->LineNumber) {$ PRINT_ (" (%d)", (int) line->LineNumber); }
11987 if (source) {$ PRINT_ (":\n\n" "%s\n", source); }
11988
11989 if (sym && strcmp (sym->Name , "main") == 0) {$ break; }
11990 }
11991
11992 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
11993 #pragma warning (push)
11994 #pragma warning (disable: 28199) // Using possibly uninitialized memory '*s'
11995 #endif
11996
11997$ while (s > trace && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11998$ *s = 0;
11999
12000 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
12001 #pragma warning (pop) // Using possibly uninitialized memory '*s'
12002 #endif
12003
12004 #undef PRINT_
12005
12006$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (trace) - 1 - (s-trace), "");
12007
12008 #if !defined (_TX_NO_MINIDUMP)
12009$ _txCreateMiniDump (exc);
12010 #endif
12011
12012$ return trace;
12013 }
12014
12015//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12016
12017// Stack WALKING if the program is DEAD. Dead, Carl!
12018
12019int _txStackWalk (int framesToSkip, size_t szCapture, void* capture[], CONTEXT* context /*= NULL*/,
12020 HANDLE thread /* = GetCurrentThread()*/)
12021 {
12022$6 namespace MinGW = Win32::MinGW;
12023
12024$ assert (capture);
12025
12026$ HANDLE process = GetCurrentProcess();
12027$ bool thisThread = !Win32::GetThreadId || (Win32::GetThreadId (thread) == GetCurrentThreadId());
12028
12029$ CONTEXT ctx = {};
12030$ ctx.ContextFlags |= CONTEXT_FULL;
12031
12032$ int isWow64 = 0;
12033$ if (Win32::IsWow64Process) Win32::IsWow64Process (process, &isWow64);
12034 else {$ return -1; }
12035
12036$ if (context)
12037 {
12038$ ctx = *context;
12039 }
12040 else
12041 {
12042$ if (thisThread)
12043 {
12044$ _TX_CALLv (Win32::RtlCaptureContext, (&ctx));
12045 }
12046 else
12047 {
12048$ SuspendThread (thread); //-V720
12049
12050$ ctx.ContextFlags = CONTEXT_ALL;
12051$ bool ok = !!GetThreadContext (thread, &ctx);
12052
12053$ if (!ok)
12054 {
12055$ ResumeThread (thread);
12056$ return -1;
12057 }
12058 }
12059 }
12060
12061$ Win32::STACKFRAME64 frame = {};
12062$ frame.AddrPC.Mode = frame.AddrStack.Mode = frame.AddrFrame.Mode = Win32::AddrModeFlat;
12063
12064$ int cpu = 0;
12065
12066 #if defined (_WIN64)
12067
12068$ if (isWow64)
12069 {
12070$ Win32::WOW64_CONTEXT wow64ctx = {};
12071$ wow64ctx.ContextFlags |= WOW64_CONTEXT_FULL;
12072
12073$ if (!_TX_CALL (Win32::Wow64GetThreadContext, (thread, &wow64ctx))) // This call fails in WINE,
12074 { // while EXIT_PROCESS_DEBUG_EVENT
12075 if (!thisThread) {$ ResumeThread (thread); }
12076$ return 0;
12077 }
12078
12079$ cpu = IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_I386;
12080
12081$ frame.AddrPC .Offset = wow64ctx.Eip;
12082$ frame.AddrStack.Offset = wow64ctx.Esp;
12083$ frame.AddrFrame.Offset = wow64ctx.Ebp;
12084 }
12085 else
12086 {
12087$ cpu = IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_AMD64;
12088
12089$ frame.AddrPC .Offset = ctx.Rip;
12090$ frame.AddrStack.Offset = ctx.Rbp;
12091$ frame.AddrFrame.Offset = ctx.Rsp;
12092 }
12093
12094 #else
12095
12096 {
12097$ cpu = IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_I386;
12098
12099$ frame.AddrPC .Offset = ctx.Eip;
12100$ frame.AddrStack.Offset = ctx.Ebp;
12101$ frame.AddrFrame.Offset = ctx.Esp;
12102 }
12103
12104 #endif
12105
12106$ assert (cpu);
12107
12108 if (_txSetJmp())
12109 {
12110$ _txSymGetFromAddr ((void*) 1); //-V566
12111 }
12112$ _txClearJmp();
12113
12114$ int frames = -1;
12115
12116$ for (frames = -framesToSkip; frames < (int) szCapture; frames++) //-V202 //-V2530
12117 {
12118$ DWORD64 prev = frame.AddrStack.Offset;
12119
12120 // Я злой и страшный серый walk. Я в поросятах знаю talk.
12121
12122 if (!_txSetJmp()) {$ break; }
12123
12124#if defined (_GCC_VER)
12125
12126 if (!_TX_CALL (MinGW::StackWalk64, (cpu, process, thread, &frame, &ctx, NULL,
12127 MinGW::SymFunctionTableAccess64, MinGW::SymGetModuleBase64, NULL))) {$ break; }
12128#elif defined (_MSC_VER)
12129
12130$ if (!_TX_CALL (Win32::StackWalk64, (cpu, process, thread, &frame, &ctx, NULL,
12131 Win32::SymFunctionTableAccess64, Win32::SymGetModuleBase64, NULL))) {$ break; }
12132#else
12133 #error _GCC_VER / _MSC_VER not defined
12134#endif
12135 if (frames < 0) {$ continue; }
12136
12137$ void* addr = (void*) frame.AddrPC.Offset;
12138
12139 if (frame.AddrFrame.Offset == 0) {$ addr = 0; } // Bad frame
12140 if (frame.AddrStack.Offset < prev) {$ addr = (void*) -1; } // Strange frame
12141
12142$ assert (0 <= frames && frames < (int) szCapture); //-V202
12143
12144$ capture[frames] = addr; //-V108
12145 }
12146
12147$ _txClearJmp();
12148
12149 if (!thisThread) {$ ResumeThread (thread); }
12150
12151$ return frames;
12152 }
12153
12154// Note that Rick and Carl are speaking near the C language block. "C block", Carl. See: http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/carl
12155
12156//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12157
12158bool _txSymGetFromAddr (void* addr, Win32::SYMBOL_INFO** symbol /*= NULL*/,
12159 Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64** line /*= NULL*/, const char** module /*= NULL*/,
12160 const char** source /*= NULL*/, int context /*= 2*/)
12161 {
12162$7 static HANDLE process = NULL;
12163
12164#if defined (_GCC_VER)
12165 #define LIB_ Win32::MinGW
12166
12167#elif defined (_MSC_VER)
12168 #define LIB_ Win32
12169
12170#else
12171 #error _GCC_VER / _MSC_VER not defined
12172#endif
12173
12174$ if (!process && addr)
12175 {
12176$ process = GetCurrentProcess();
12177
12178$ DWORD options = SYMOPT_UNDNAME | SYMOPT_LOAD_LINES | SYMOPT_LOAD_ANYTHING | SYMOPT_INCLUDE_32BIT_MODULES |
12179 SYMOPT_DEFERRED_LOADS | SYMOPT_FAVOR_COMPRESSED | SYMOPT_FAIL_CRITICAL_ERRORS | SYMOPT_NO_PROMPTS;
12180
12181$ _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymSetOptions, (options));
12182$ _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymInitialize, (process, NULL, true));
12183 }
12184
12185$ static DWORD64 mod = 0;
12186
12187$ if (module)
12188 {
12189$ static char sMod [MAX_PATH] = "";
12190$ memset (sMod, 0, sizeof (sMod));
12191
12192$ mod = _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymGetModuleBase64, (process, (uintptr_t) addr));
12193
12194$ GetModuleFileName ((HMODULE)(intptr_t) mod, sMod, MAX_PATH);
12195
12196$ char* ext = strrchr (sMod, '.');
12197 if (ext) {$ _strlwr_s (ext, sizeof (sMod) - (ext-sMod)); }
12198
12199$ *module = sMod;
12200 }
12201
12202$ static char buffer [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12203$ static Win32::SYMBOL_INFO* sym = (Win32::SYMBOL_INFO*) buffer; //-V1032
12204
12205$ if (symbol)
12206 {
12207$ memset (buffer, 0, sizeof (buffer));
12208
12209$ sym->MaxNameLen = sizeof (buffer) - sizeof (Win32::SYMBOL_INFO) - 1;
12210$ sym->SizeOfStruct = sizeof (Win32::SYMBOL_INFO);
12211$ unsigned long long ofs = 0;
12212
12213$ _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymFromAddr, (process, (uintptr_t) addr, &ofs, sym));
12214
12215 if (strcmp (sym->Name, "??") == 0) {$ *sym->Name = 0; }
12216
12217$ *symbol = sym;
12218 }
12219
12220$ static Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64 line64 = { sizeof (line) };
12221
12222$ if (line)
12223 {
12224$ memset (&line64, 0, sizeof (line64));
12225
12226$ DWORD ofs = 0;
12227$ _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymGetLineFromAddr64, (process, (uintptr_t) addr, &ofs, &line64));
12228
12229$ *line = &line64;
12230 }
12231
12232$ if (source)
12233 {
12234$ static char buf [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12235$ memset (buf, 0, sizeof (buf));
12236
12237$ if (line64.FileName && line64.LineNumber)
12238 {
12239$ _txReadSource (buf, sizeof (buf) - 1, line64.FileName,
12240 (int) line64.LineNumber - context, (int) line64.LineNumber + context, (int) line64.LineNumber);
12241
12242$ *source = buf;
12243 }
12244
12245 if (!*source || !**source) {$ *source = NULL; }
12246 }
12247
12248$ if (!addr && process)
12249 {
12250$ _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymCleanup, (process));
12251
12252$ process = NULL;
12253 }
12254
12255$ if (symbol)
12256 {
12257$ if (strstr (sym->Name, "::TX::") ||
12258 (strncmp (sym->Name, "_tx", 3) == 0 && isupper ((unsigned char) sym->Name[3])) ||
12259 (strncmp (sym->Name, "tx", 2) == 0 && isupper ((unsigned char) sym->Name[2])) ||
12260 strncmp (sym->Name, "_tx_", 4) == 0 || //-V112
12261 strncmp (sym->Name, "tx_", 3) == 0)
12262 {
12263$ return true;
12264 }
12265
12266$ if (!line || !line64.FileName) return false;
12267
12268$ intptr_t len = strlen (line64.FileName) - (sizeof (__FILE__) - 1);
12269
12270$ return (len >= 0 && _stricmp (line64.FileName + len, __FILE__) == 0) &&
12271 (len == 0 || line64.FileName[len-1] == '/' || line64.FileName[len-1] == '\\');
12272 }
12273
12274 #undef LIB_
12275
12276$ return false;
12277 }
12278
12279//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12280
12281intptr_t _txReadSource (char buf[], intptr_t size, const char file[],
12282 int linStart /*= 0*/, int linEnd /*= INT_MIN*/, int linMark /*= INT_MIN*/)
12283 {
12284$7 assert (buf);
12285
12286 if (!file || !*file) {$ return 0; }
12287
12288 if (linStart < 1) {$ linStart = 1; }
12289 if (linEnd == -1) {$ linEnd = INT_MAX; }
12290
12291$ FILE* f = NULL;
12292$ fopen_s (&f, file, "r");
12293 if (!f) {$ return 0; }
12294
12295$ int n = 1;
12296 while (!feof (f))
12297 {
12298 if (n >= linStart) {$ break; }
12299 while (!feof (f) && fgetc (f) != '\n')
12300 ;
12301 n++;
12302 }
12303
12304$ char* s = buf;
12305
12306 #define SZ_ ( size - 3 - (s - buf) )
12307
12308$ while (!feof (f) && SZ_ > 0)
12309 {
12310 if (n > linEnd || _txNOP (SZ_) < 0) {$ break; }
12311
12312 if (linMark != INT_MIN)
12313 {$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, SZ_, "%s%5d: ", ((n == linMark)? "=>" : " "), n); }
12314
12315$ int c = 0;
12316$ while (!feof (f) && SZ_ > 0 && (c = fgetc (f)) != '\n') *s++ = (char) c;
12317 if (c == EOF) {$ s--; }
12318
12319 if (SZ_ > 0) {$ *s++ = '\n'; }
12320$ n++;
12321 }
12322
12323 if (n <= linEnd && SZ_ <= 0)
12324 {$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s - buf), "..."); }
12325
12326 #undef SZ_
12327
12328$ fclose (f);
12329
12330 if (s > buf && s[-1] == '\n') {$ s--; }
12331$ *s = 0;
12332
12333$ return (s - buf);
12334 }
12335
12336//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12337
12338const char* _txCaptureStackBackTraceTX (int framesToSkip /*= 0*/, bool readSource /*= false*/)
12339 {
12340$6 const int maxFrames = 62; // TX says too: < 63
12341$ static char trace [(MAX_PATH + 1024+1) * maxFrames] = "";
12342
12343 if (framesToSkip == -1) {$ return trace; }
12344
12345$ memset (trace, 0, sizeof (trace));
12346$ char* s = trace;
12347
12348 #define SZ_ ( sizeof (trace) - 1 - 3 - (s-trace) )
12349
12350$ const _txLoc* loc = &_txLoc::Cur;
12351
12352 for (int i = 0; loc && i < framesToSkip + 1; i++, loc = loc->prev) { $; }
12353
12354$ for (int i = -framesToSkip; loc && i < maxFrames; i++, loc = loc->prev)
12355 {
12356 if (i < 0) {$ continue; }
12357
12358 if (loc->func || loc->file || loc->line)
12359 {
12360$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, SZ_, "%s#%2d in %s at %s (%d)", (i? readSource? "\n\n" : "\n" : ""),
12361 i, loc->func, loc->file, loc->line);
12362
12363$ if (readSource)
12364 {
12365$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, SZ_, ":\n\n");
12366$ s += _txReadSource (s, SZ_, loc->file, loc->line - 2, loc->line + 2, loc->line);
12367 }
12368 }
12369 }
12370
12371 #undef SZ_
12372
12373$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (trace) - 1 - (s-trace), "");
12374
12375$ return trace;
12376 }
12377
12378//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12379
12380bool _txCreateMiniDump (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc /*= NULL*/)
12381 {
12382$6 static char dumpName[MAX_PATH] = "";
12383 if (!*dumpName) {$ _tx_snprintf_s (dumpName, sizeof (dumpName) - 1, "%s.dmp", _txLogName); }
12384
12385$ HANDLE file = CreateFile (dumpName, GENERIC_WRITE, 0, NULL, CREATE_ALWAYS, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
12386
12387 if (!file || file == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {$ return false; }
12388
12389$ Win32::MINIDUMP_EXCEPTION_INFORMATION excInfo = { GetCurrentThreadId(), exc, false };
12390$ Win32::MINIDUMP_TYPE type = (Win32::MINIDUMP_TYPE) (Win32::MiniDumpWithIndirectlyReferencedMemory | Win32::MiniDumpScanMemory);
12391
12392$ bool ok = _TX_CALL (Win32::MiniDumpWriteDump, (GetCurrentProcess(), GetCurrentProcessId(), file, type,
12393 ((exc)? &excInfo : NULL), NULL, NULL));
12394$ CloseHandle (file);
12395
12396 if (ok) {$ return true; }
12397 else {$ return false; }
12398 }
12399
12400#endif // TX_COMPILED
12401
12402//}
12403//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12404
12405//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12406//{ Errors reporting
12407//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12408
12409#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
12410
12411const char* _txProcessError (const char file[], int line, const char func[], unsigned color, const char msg[], va_list args) //-V2008
12412 {
12413 _txErrors = _txErrors + 1;
12414
12415 DWORD winErr = GetLastError();
12416
12417 int crtErr = errno;
12418
12419 #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
12420 unsigned long dosErr = _doserrno;
12421 #else
12422 unsigned long dosErr = 0;
12423 #endif
12424
12425 unsigned dlgErr = _TX_CALL (Win32::CommDlgExtendedError, ());
12426
12427 unsigned oglErr = _TX_CALL (Win32::wglGetCurrentDC, ())? _TX_CALL (Win32::glGetError, ()) : _txOGLError;
12428
12429 unsigned threadId = GetCurrentThreadId();
12430
12431 enum { isFatal = 0x01, isWarning = 0x02, noMsgBox = 0x04, fmtOnly = 0x08, traceSE = 0x10 };
12432 unsigned options = 0;
12433
12434 for (; msg && *msg; msg++)
12435 {
12436 if (*msg == '\a') options |= isFatal;
12437 else if (*msg == '\v') options |= isWarning;
12438 else if (*msg == '\b') options |= noMsgBox;
12439 else if (*msg == '\f') options |= fmtOnly;
12440 else if (*msg == '\t') options |= traceSE;
12441 else break;
12442 }
12443
12444 const char* stkTrace = NULL;
12445 const char* txTrace = NULL; (void) txTrace;
12446
12447 if (!(options & fmtOnly))
12448 {
12449 stkTrace = ((options & traceSE) && *_txTraceSE)? _txTraceSE : _txCaptureStackBackTrace (2, true);
12450 txTrace = _txCaptureStackBackTraceTX (0, true);
12451 }
12452
12453 static char what[_TX_BIGBUFSIZE*10] = "";
12454 static char str [_TX_BIGBUFSIZE] = "";
12455 char *s = what;
12456
12457 #define PRINT_(...) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (what) - 1 - (s - what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
12458 #define VPRINT_(...) s += _tx_vsnprintf_s (s, sizeof (what) - 1 - (s - what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
12459
12460 PRINT_ ("TXLib %s\n\n", ((options & isWarning)? "предупреждает:" :
12461 (options & isFatal)? "соболезнует..." :
12462 "сообщает:"));
12463 PRINT_ ("Программа: %s", txGetModuleFileName());
12464 if (file) PRINT_ (", файл: %s", file);
12465 if (line) PRINT_ (", строка: %d", line);
12466 if (func) PRINT_ (", функция: %s", func);
12467 PRINT_ (",\n\n");
12468
12469 if (msg) PRINT_ ("%s: ", (file || line || func)? "Сообщение" : "ВНЕЗАПНО"),
12470 VPRINT_ (msg, args);
12471
12472 while (s > what && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
12473
12474 PRINT_ ("\n\n" "#%d: %s, Instance: 0x%p (%d-bit), Flags: %c%c%c%c%c%d, Thread: 0x%X%s",
12475
12476 _txErrors, _TX_VERSION, &_txInitialized, (sizeof (void*) == 4)? 32 : 64,
12477
12478 "cC"[!!_txConsole], "mM"[_txMain], "dD"[_txIsDll], "rR"[_txRunning], "eE"[_txExit], _txLoc::Cur.trace,
12479
12480 threadId, (threadId == _txMainThreadId)? " (Main)" :
12481 (threadId == _txCanvas_ThreadId)? " (Canvas)" : "");
12482
12483 if (winErr) PRINT_ (", GetLastError(): %lu (", (unsigned long) winErr),
12484 s += FormatMessage (FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS, //-V102
12485 NULL, winErr, MAKELANGID (LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
12486 s, (DWORD) (sizeof (what) - (s-what)), NULL) - 2, //-V202
12487 s -= (s[-1] == '.')? 1 : 0,
12488 PRINT_ (")");
12489
12490 if (crtErr) PRINT_ (", errno: %d (%s)", crtErr, (strerror_s (str, sizeof (str), crtErr), str));
12491 if (dosErr) PRINT_ (", _doserrno: %lu (%s)", dosErr, (strerror_s (str, sizeof (str), dosErr), str));
12492 if (oglErr) PRINT_ (", glGetError(): %u (0x%04X, %s)", oglErr, oglErr, _TX_CALL (Win32::gluErrorString, (oglErr)));
12493 if (dlgErr) PRINT_ (", CommDlgExtendedError(): %u (0x%04X)", dlgErr, dlgErr);
12494
12495 #if (__cplusplus >= 201703L) || (defined (_MSVC_LANG) && _MSVC_LANG >= 201703L)
12496 PRINT_ (". %s\n", ::std::uncaught_exceptions()? "std::uncaught_exceptions(): true." : "");
12497 #else
12498 PRINT_ (". %s\n", ::std::uncaught_exception ()? "std::uncaught_exception(): true." : "");
12499 #endif
12500
12501 if (_txLoc::Cur.inTX > 0 && file && !(_txLoc::Cur.line == line && _stricmp (_txLoc::Cur.file, file) == 0) &&
12502 (_txLoc::Cur.file || _txLoc::Cur.line || _txLoc::Cur.func))
12503 PRINT_ ("From: %s (%d) %s.\n", _txLoc::Cur.file, _txLoc::Cur.line, _txLoc::Cur.func);
12504
12505 txOutputDebugPrintf ("\r" "%s - ERROR: %s\n", _TX_VERSION, what);
12506
12507 if (options & fmtOnly)
12508 {
12509 SetLastError (winErr);
12510
12511 errno = crtErr;
12512
12513 #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
12514 _doserrno = dosErr;
12515 #endif
12516
12517 return what;
12518 }
12519
12520 txSetProgress (-1, Win32::TBPF_ERROR);
12521
12522 unsigned restore = txGetConsoleAttr();
12523 txSetConsoleAttr ((options & isFatal)? FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA : FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED);
12524 if (color) {$ txSetConsoleAttr (color); }
12525
12526 int oldCodePage = txSetLocale();
12527
12528 fprintf (stderr, "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12529 "%s\n"
12530 "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12531 what);
12532
12533 if (stkTrace && strstr (stkTrace, ".exe: "))
12534 {$ fprintf (stderr, "Стек вызовов:\n\n"
12535 "%s\n\n"
12536 "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12537 stkTrace); }
12538
12539 SetConsoleOutputCP (oldCodePage);
12540 txSetConsoleAttr (restore);
12541
12542 if (*_txLogName) do //-V2530
12543 {
12544 FILE* log = NULL; fopen_s (&log, _txLogName, "a");
12545 if (!log) {$ break; }
12546
12547 fprintf (log, "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12548 "%s\n"
12549 "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12550 what);
12551
12552 fprintf (log, "Стек вызовов:\n\n" //-V576
12553 "%s\n",
12554 (*_txTraceSE)? _txTraceSE : stkTrace);
12555
12556 #if defined (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE) || defined (_DEBUG)
12557
12558 if (_txLoc::Cur.inTX > 0 && txTrace && *txTrace)
12559 {
12560 fprintf (log, "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12561 "Стек вызовов TX:\n\n"
12562 "%s\n",
12563 txTrace);
12564 }
12565
12566 #endif
12567
12568 fprintf (log, "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12569 "%s\n\n"
12570 "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12571 _txAppInfo());
12572 fclose (log);
12573 break;
12574 }
12575 while (false);
12576
12577 txSleep();
12578
12579 int ret = 0;
12580
12581 if (!(options & noMsgBox))
12582 {
12583 txSleep (_txWindowUpdateInterval);
12584
12585 PRINT_ ("\n" "Прервать программу?");
12586
12587 ret = txMessageBox (what, ((options & isWarning)? "Предупреждение" :
12588 (options & isFatal)? "Фатальная ошибка" :
12589 "Ошибка в программе"), MB_ICONSTOP | MB_SYSTEMMODAL | MB_YESNOCANCEL);
12590 }
12591
12592 SetLastError (winErr);
12593
12594 errno = crtErr;
12595
12596 #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
12597 _doserrno = dosErr;
12598 #endif
12599
12600 if (((options & isFatal) && !IsDebuggerPresent()) || ret == IDYES)
12601 {
12602 txUnlock();
12603 _txCleanup();
12604 Win32::TerminateProcess (GetCurrentProcess(), EXIT_FAILURE);
12605 }
12606
12607 #undef PRINT_
12608 #undef VPRINT_
12609
12610 return what;
12611 }
12612
12613//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12614
12615#if defined (_MSC_VER)
12616
12617int _txOnErrorReport (int type, const char* text, int* ret)
12618 {
12619 assert (text);
12620 assert (ret);
12621
12622 _txErrors = _txErrors + 1;
12623
12624 unsigned restore = txGetConsoleAttr();
12625
12626 switch (type)
12627 {
12628 case _CRT_WARN: txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED); break;
12629 case _CRT_ERROR: txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA); break;
12630 case _CRT_ASSERT: txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW); break;
12631 default: break; //-V2522
12632 }
12633
12634 const char startReport[] = "Detected memory leaks!\n",
12635 endReport[] = "Object dump complete.\n";
12636
12637 if (strcmp (text, startReport) == 0) // Dirty, dirty hack. А что делать?
12638 {
12639 _txOnErrorReport (type, "\n", NULL);
12640 _txOnErrorReport (type, _TX_VERSION " - ERROR: ", NULL);
12641 _txOnErrorReport (type, "Внимание: Обнаружены утечки памяти! (Для поиска используйте _TX_ALLOC_BREAK.)\n", NULL);
12642 _txOnErrorReport (type, "\n", NULL);
12643 }
12644
12645 size_t len = strlen (text);
12646 if (text [len-1] != '\n') txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s", text);
12647 else if (strcmp (text, endReport) != 0) txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s" "%s - ERROR: ", text, _TX_VERSION);
12648 else txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s\n", text);
12649
12650 DWORD n = 0;
12651 HANDLE err = GetStdHandle (STD_ERROR_HANDLE);
12652 WriteFile (err, text, (DWORD) strlen (text), &n, NULL); //-V202
12653
12654 txSetConsoleAttr (restore);
12655
12656 if (*_txLogName) do //-V2530
12657 {
12658 HANDLE log = CreateFile (_txLogName, GENERIC_WRITE, FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL, OPEN_ALWAYS, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
12659 if (log == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) break;
12660
12661 SetFilePointer (log, 0, NULL, FILE_END);
12662 WriteFile (log, text, (DWORD) strlen (text), &n, NULL); //-V202
12663
12664 CloseHandle (log);
12665 break;
12666 }
12667 while (false);
12668
12669 if (ret) *ret = 0;
12670
12671 return (type == _CRT_WARN);
12672 }
12673
12674#endif
12675
12676//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12677
12678int txMessageBox (const char text[], const char header[], unsigned flags /*= MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OKCANCEL*/)
12679 {
12680$5 static wchar_t textW [_TX_BIGBUFSIZE * sizeof (wchar_t)] = L"[NULL text]";
12681$ static wchar_t headerW [_TX_BUFSIZE * sizeof (wchar_t)] = L"[NULL header]";
12682
12683 if (text) {$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, text, -1, textW, sizearr (textW)) || memset (textW, 0, sizeof (textW)); }
12684 if (header) {$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, header, -1, headerW, sizearr (headerW)) || memset (headerW, 0, sizeof (headerW)); }
12685
12686$ HWND wnd = _txCanvas_Window;
12687$ int ret = MessageBoxW ((wnd && IsWindowVisible (wnd))? wnd : _TX_CALL (Win32::GetConsoleWindow,()),
12688 textW, headerW, flags | MB_SETFOREGROUND | MB_TOPMOST);
12689
12690$ GetAsyncKeyState (VK_SHIFT); GetAsyncKeyState (VK_CONTROL); GetAsyncKeyState (VK_MENU);
12691
12692$ if (ret == IDCANCEL && GetAsyncKeyState (VK_SHIFT) && GetAsyncKeyState (VK_CONTROL) && GetAsyncKeyState (VK_MENU))
12693 {
12694$ SendNotifyMessage (txWindow(), (_txMain? WM_CLOSE : WM_DESTROY), 0, 0);
12695$ _txWaitFor (!_txCanvas_Window, _TX_TIMEOUT);
12696 }
12697
12698$ return ret;
12699 }
12700
12701//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12702
12703bool txGetAsyncKeyState (int key)
12704 {
12705$1 HWND wnd = GetForegroundWindow();
12706
12707 return (GetAsyncKeyState (key) & 0x8000) &&
12708 (wnd == txWindow() || wnd == Win32::GetConsoleWindow());
12709 }
12710
12711//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12712
12713bool txNotifyIcon (unsigned flags, const char* title, const char* format, ...)
12714 {
12715$5 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (format)) return false;
12716
12717$ va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
12718$ bool ok = true;
12719
12720 #if defined (_WIN32_IE) && (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0500)
12721
12722$ NOTIFYICONDATA nid = { sizeof (nid) };
12723
12724$ nid.uFlags = NIF_ICON | NIF_TIP | NIF_INFO;
12725$ nid.hWnd = NULL;
12726$ nid.uID = 1;
12727$ nid.hIcon = _txCreateTXIcon (16); assert (nid.hIcon);
12728$ strncpy_s (nid.szTip, sizeof (nid.szTip), "TXLib Information", sizeof (nid.szTip));
12729$ strncpy_s (nid.szInfoTitle, sizeof (nid.szInfoTitle), (title? title : "TXLib сообщает"), sizeof (nid.szInfoTitle) - 1);
12730$ _tx_vsnprintf_s (nid.szInfo, sizeof (nid.szInfo), format, arg);
12731$ nid.dwInfoFlags = flags;
12732
12733$ txOutputDebugPrintf ("\r" _TX_VERSION " - %s: %s (Icon notification)\n", nid.szInfoTitle, nid.szInfo);
12734
12735$ ok &= !!Shell_NotifyIcon (NIM_ADD, (::NOTIFYICONDATA*) &nid);
12736$ ok &= !!Shell_NotifyIcon (NIM_MODIFY, (::NOTIFYICONDATA*) &nid);
12737
12738$ if (nid.hIcon) DestroyIcon (nid.hIcon) asserted;
12739
12740 #else
12741
12742$ char nid_szInfo[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12743$ _tx_vsnprintf_s (nid_szInfo, sizeof (nid_szInfo), format, arg);
12744$ txOutputDebugPrintf ("\r" _TX_VERSION " - %s: %s (Icon notification - NOT displayed)\n", title, nid_szInfo);
12745$ ok = false;
12746
12747$ (void)flags; (void)title;
12748
12749 #endif
12750
12751$ va_end (arg);
12752 return ok;
12753 }
12754
12755//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12756
12757void _txTrace (const char* file, int line, const char* func, const char* msg /*= NULL*/, ...)
12758 {
12759 unsigned id = GetCurrentThreadId();
12760
12761 const char marks[2][2][3] = {{"uU", "cC"}, {"mM", "??"}};
12762
12763 char mark = marks [id == _txMainThreadId] [id == _txCanvas_ThreadId] [(_txLoc::Cur.inTX > 0)];
12764
12765 char msgStr[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12766 if (msg)
12767 {
12768 va_list arg; va_start (arg, msg);
12769 _tx_vsnprintf_s (msgStr, sizeof (msgStr) - 1, msg, arg);
12770 va_end (arg);
12771 }
12772
12773 txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - 0x%p %c%c%c%c%c%d [%c] - %-*s (%5d) " "|%*s%s" "%s%s\n",
12774
12775 _TX_VERSION, &_txInitialized,
12776
12777 "cC"[!!_txConsole], "mM"[_txMain], "dD"[_txIsDll], "rR"[_txRunning], "eE"[_txExit],
12778 _txLoc::Cur.trace, mark,
12779
12780 (int) sizeof (__FILE__) - 1, (file? file : "(NULL file)"), line,
12781 2 * (_txLoc::Cur.inTX - 1) * !!func, "", (func? func : ""),
12782
12783 ((*msgStr && func)? ": " : ""), msgStr);
12784 }
12785
12786//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12787
12788int txOutputDebugPrintf (const char* format, ...)
12789 {
12790 if (!format) return 0;
12791
12792 enum { msgbox = 1, print = 2, compr = 4 };
12793 int options = 0;
12794
12795 for (; format && *format; format++)
12796 {
12797 if (*format == '\a') options |= msgbox;
12798 else if (*format == '\f') options |= print;
12799 else if (*format == '\r') options |= compr;
12800 else break;
12801 }
12802
12803 char text[_TX_BIGBUFSIZE] = "";
12804
12805 va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
12806 int n = (int) _tx_vsnprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1-1, format, arg); //-V202
12807 va_end (arg);
12808
12809 struct __ { static int trimSpaces (char str[])
12810 {
12811 char *dst = str, *src = str;
12812
12813 for (char d = ' '; d; src++)
12814 if (isspace ((unsigned char)(*src))) { if (d != ' ') *dst++ = d = ' '; }
12815 else *dst++ = d = *src;
12816
12817 return (int) (dst - str - 1); //-V202
12818 }};
12819
12820 if (options & compr) n = __::trimSpaces (text);
12821
12822 OutputDebugString (text);
12823
12824 if (options & print) fprintf (stderr, "%s", text);
12825
12826 if (options & msgbox) txMessageBox (text, "Оказывается, что", MB_ICONEXCLAMATION);
12827
12828 return n;
12829 }
12830
12831//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12832
12833intptr_t _tx_snprintf_s (char* stream, intptr_t size, const char* format, ...)
12834 {
12835 if (!format) return 0;
12836
12837 va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
12838 intptr_t ret = _tx_vsnprintf_s (stream, size, format, arg);
12839 va_end (arg);
12840
12841 return ret;
12842 }
12843
12844//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12845
12846intptr_t _tx_vsnprintf_s (char stream[], intptr_t size, const char format[], va_list arg)
12847 {
12848 if (!stream || !format) return 0;
12849
12850 #if defined (_TRUNCATE)
12851 intptr_t ret = _vsnprintf_s (stream, size, _TRUNCATE, format, arg);
12852 #else
12853 intptr_t ret = _vsnprintf (stream, size, format, arg);
12854 #endif
12855
12856 if (ret < 0 && size >= 4) //-V112
12857 {
12858 const char ellipsis[] = "...";
12859 size_t szEllipsis = sizeof (ellipsis) - 1;
12860
12861 strncpy_s (stream + size - szEllipsis, szEllipsis+1, ellipsis, szEllipsis);
12862 }
12863
12864 return (ret >= 0)? ret : size;
12865 }
12866
12867//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12868
12869#if defined (__CYGWIN__)
12870
12871int _getch()
12872 {
12873 termios oldattr = {}; tcgetattr (STDIN_FILENO, &oldattr);
12874
12875 termios newattr = oldattr;
12876 newattr.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);
12877 tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &newattr);
12878
12879 int ch = getchar();
12880
12881 tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &oldattr);
12882
12883 return ch;
12884 }
12885
12886//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12887
12888int _putch (int ch)
12889 {
12890 termios old = {}; tcgetattr (STDOUT_FILENO, &old);
12891
12892 termios cur = old;
12893 cur.c_lflag &= ~ICANON;
12894 cur.c_lflag |= ECHO;
12895 tcsetattr (STDOUT_FILENO, TCSANOW, &cur);
12896
12897 putchar (ch);
12898
12899 tcsetattr (STDOUT_FILENO, TCSANOW, &old);
12900
12901 return ch;
12902 }
12903
12904//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12905
12906int _kbhit()
12907 {
12908 termios old = {}; tcgetattr (STDIN_FILENO, &old);
12909
12910 termios cur = old;
12911 cur.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);
12912 cur.c_cc[VMIN] = 1;
12913 cur.c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
12914
12915 tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSAFLUSH, &cur);
12916
12917 fd_set fd = {}; FD_SET (STDIN_FILENO, &fd);
12918 timeval tv = {};
12919
12920 int res = select (STDIN_FILENO + 1, &fd, NULL, NULL, &tv) && FD_ISSET (STDIN_FILENO, &fd);
12921
12922 tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSAFLUSH, &old);
12923
12924 return res;
12925 }
12926
12927#endif
12928
12929#endif // TX_COMPILED
12930
12931//}
12932//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12933
12934//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12935//{ Information
12936//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12937
12938#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
12939
12940const char* txGetModuleFileName (bool fileNameOnly /*= true*/)
12941 {
12942 static char name[MAX_PATH] = "";
12943
12944 if (!*name)
12945 {
12946 if (!GetModuleFileName (NULL, name, sizeof (name) - 1)) *name = 0;
12947
12948 char* ext = strrchr (name, '.');
12949 if (ext) _strlwr_s (ext, sizeof (name) - 1 - (ext - name));
12950 }
12951
12952 assert (*name);
12953
12954 if (fileNameOnly) return name;
12955
12956 static char fullName[MAX_PATH] = "";
12957 strncpy_s (fullName, sizeof (fullName), name, sizeof (fullName) - 1);
12958
12959 char* title = strrchr (fullName, '\\'); if (!title) title = fullName;
12960 char* ext = strrchr (fullName, '.'); if (!ext) ext = fullName + strlen (fullName);
12961
12962 size_t sz = sizeof (fullName) - (ext - fullName);
12963 strncpy_s (ext, sz-1, " - TXLib", sz);
12964
12965 return title + 1;
12966 }
12967
12968#endif // TX_COMPILED
12969
12970//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12971
12972inline const char* _txAppInfo()
12973 {
12974$1 time_t timeT = time (NULL) - clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC; //-V104
12975 char timeS[32] = "";
12976 ctime_s (timeS, sizeof (timeS), &timeT);
12977
12978 static char text[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12979 char cwd [MAX_PATH] = "";
12980
12981 _tx_snprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1,
12982
12983 "Developed with:\n\n"
12984 "The Dumb Artist Library (TX Library)\n"
12985 _TX_VERSION "\n" _TX_AUTHOR "\n"
12986 "See license on: http://txlib.ru\n\n"
12987
12988 "TXLib file:" "\t" __FILE__ "\n"
12989 "Compiled:" "\t" __DATE__ " " __TIME__ ", " __TX_COMPILER__ ", %s, %d-bit, " _TX_BUILDMODE "\n"
12990 "Started:" "\t" "%.6s %.4s %.8s\n\n"
12991
12992 "Run file:" "\t" "%s\n"
12993 "Directory:" "\t" "%s",
12994
12995 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
12996 "MSVC Runtime",
12997 #elif defined (__CYGWIN__)
12998 "Cygwin Runtime",
12999 #elif defined (_GCC_VER) && defined (_WIN64)
13000 __mingw_get_crt_info(),
13001 #else
13002 "MinGW Runtime " TX_QUOTE (__MINGW32_MAJOR_VERSION) "." TX_QUOTE (__MINGW32_MINOR_VERSION),
13003 #endif
13004 (sizeof (void*) == sizeof (DWORD))? 32 : 64, //-V112
13005
13006 timeS + 4, timeS + 20, timeS + 11, //-V112 These offsets are ANSI standardized
13007 txGetModuleFileName(),
13008 _getcwd (cwd, sizeof (cwd) - 1));
13009
13010 return text;
13011 }
13012

13024
13025inline const char* txVersion()
13026 {
13027 return _TX_VERSION;
13028 }
13029
13030//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13031
13032inline unsigned txVersionNumber()
13033 {
13034 return _TX_VER; //-V2517
13035 }
13036
13037//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13038
13039inline HWND txWindow()
13040 {
13041$9 return _txCanvas_Window;
13042 }
13043
13044//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13045
13046inline HDC& txDC()
13047 {
13048 return _txCanvas_BackBuf[0];
13049 }
13050
13051//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13052
13053inline RGBQUAD* txVideoMemory()
13054 {
13055 return _txCanvas_Pixels;
13056 }
13057
13058//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13059
13060inline int txGetExtentX (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13061 {
13062 return txGetExtent (dc) .x;
13063 }
13064
13065//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13066
13067inline int txGetExtentY (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13068 {
13069 return txGetExtent (dc) .y;
13070 }
13071
13072//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13073
13074#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
13075
13076POINT txGetExtent (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13077 {
13078$0 static POINT err = {-1, -1};
13079
13080 if (!dc) {$ POINT screen = { GetSystemMetrics (SM_CXSCREEN), GetSystemMetrics (SM_CYSCREEN) }; return screen; };
13081
13082 if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) {$ return err; }
13083
13084$ BITMAP bmap = {};
13085$ txGDI (Win32::GetObject (Win32::GetCurrentObject (dc, OBJ_BITMAP), sizeof (bmap), &bmap), dc) asserted;
13086
13087$ POINT size = { bmap.bmWidth, bmap.bmHeight };
13088$ return size;
13089 }
13090
13091//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13092
13093bool txDestroyWindow (HWND wnd /*= txWindow()*/)
13094 {
13095$1 if (!wnd || !txWindow()) return false;
13096
13097$ if (wnd != txWindow())
13098 {
13099$ return !!SendNotifyMessage (txWindow(), _TX_WM_DESTROYWND, 0, (LPARAM) wnd);
13100 }
13101
13102$ if (SendNotifyMessage (txWindow(), (_txMain? WM_CLOSE : WM_DESTROY), 0, 0) == 0) return false;
13103
13104$ if (_txMain)
13105 {
13106$ txNotifyIcon (NIIF_WARNING, NULL, "\n" "Очень, очень плохо завершать программу через txDestroyWindow().\n\n"
13107 "Возвращайтесь через main(), там вам будут рады.\n");
13108$ Sleep (_TX_TIMEOUT);
13109 }
13110
13111$ _txWaitFor (!_txCanvas_Window, _TX_TIMEOUT);
13112
13113$ return _txCanvas_Window == NULL;
13114 }
13115
13116//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13117
13118HPEN txSetColor (COLORREF color, double thickness /*= 1*/, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13119 {
13120$1 if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return NULL;
13121
13122$ HPEN pen = Win32::CreatePen ((color == TX_TRANSPARENT? PS_NULL : PS_SOLID), ROUND (thickness), color);
13123
13124$ if (!pen) return (HPEN) NULL;
13125
13126$ if (!_txBuffer_Select (pen, dc))
13127 {
13128$ Win32::DeleteObject (pen);
13129$ return (HPEN) NULL;
13130 }
13131
13132$ if (txGDI (Win32::SetTextColor (dc, color), dc) == CLR_INVALID)
13133 {$ return (HPEN) NULL; }
13134
13135$ return pen;
13136 }
13137
13138//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13139
13140COLORREF txColor (double red, double green, double blue)
13141 {
13142$1 if (red > 1) red = 1; if (red < 0) red = 0;
13143$ if (green > 1) green = 1; if (green < 0) green = 0;
13144$ if (blue > 1) blue = 1; if (blue < 0) blue = 0;
13145
13146$ COLORREF color = RGB (ROUND (red * 255), ROUND (green * 255), ROUND (blue * 255));
13147
13148$ return txSetColor (color)? color : CLR_INVALID;
13149 }
13150
13151//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13152
13153COLORREF txGetColor (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13154 {
13155$1 if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return CLR_INVALID;
13156
13157$ HGDIOBJ obj = txGDI ((Win32::GetCurrentObject (dc, OBJ_PEN)), dc);
13158$ assert (obj); if (!obj) return CLR_INVALID; //-V547
13159
13160$ union { EXTLOGPEN extLogPen; LOGPEN LogPen; } buf = {}; //-V2514
13161
13162$ int size = Win32::GetObject (obj, 0, NULL);
13163$ Win32::GetObject (obj, sizeof (buf), &buf) asserted;
13164
13165$ return (size == sizeof (LOGPEN))? buf.LogPen.lopnColor : buf.extLogPen.elpColor;
13166 }
13167
13168//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13169
13170HBRUSH txSetFillColor (COLORREF color, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13171 {
13172$1 if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return NULL;
13173
13174$ HBRUSH brush = (color == TX_TRANSPARENT)? (HBRUSH) Win32::GetStockObject (HOLLOW_BRUSH) : Win32::CreateSolidBrush (color);
13175
13176$ return (_txBuffer_Select (brush, dc))? brush : (Win32::DeleteObject (brush), (HBRUSH) NULL);
13177 }
13178
13179//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13180
13181COLORREF txFillColor (double red, double green, double blue)
13182 {
13183$1 if (red > 1) red = 1; if (red < 0) red = 0;
13184$ if (green > 1) green = 1; if (green < 0) green = 0;
13185$ if (blue > 1) blue = 1; if (blue < 0) blue = 0;
13186
13187$ COLORREF color = RGB (ROUND (red * 255), ROUND (green * 255), ROUND (blue * 255));
13188
13189$ return txSetFillColor (color)? color : CLR_INVALID;
13190 }
13191
13192//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13193
13194COLORREF txGetFillColor (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13195 {
13196$1 if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return CLR_INVALID;
13197
13198$ HGDIOBJ obj = txGDI ((Win32::GetCurrentObject (dc, OBJ_BRUSH)), dc);
13199$ assert (obj); if (!obj) return CLR_INVALID; //-V547
13200
13201$ LOGBRUSH buf = {};
13202$ txGDI ((Win32::GetObject (obj, sizeof (buf), &buf)), dc) asserted;
13203
13204$ return buf.lbColor;
13205 }
13206
13207//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13208
13209bool txClear (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13210 {
13211$1 if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
13212
13213$ POINT size = txGetExtent (dc);
13214$ return txGDI (!!(Win32::PatBlt (dc, 0, 0, size.x, size.y, PATCOPY)), dc);
13215 }

13222
13223$ txGDI ((Win32::SetPixel (dc, ROUND (x), ROUND (y), color)), dc);
13224
13225$ return true;
13226 }
13227
13228//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13229
13230bool txPixel (double x, double y, double red, double green, double blue, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13231 {
13232$1 if (red > 1) red = 1; if (red < 0) red = 0;
13233$ if (green > 1) green = 1; if (green < 0) green = 0;
13234$ if (blue > 1) blue = 1; if (blue < 0) blue = 0;
13235
13236$ return txSetPixel (x, y, RGB (ROUND (red * 255), ROUND (green * 255), ROUND (blue * 255)), dc);
13237 }

13244
13245$ return txGDI ((Win32::GetPixel (dc, ROUND (x), ROUND (y))), dc);
13246 }

13253
13254$ bool ok = txGDI ((Win32::MoveToEx (dc, ROUND (x0), ROUND (y0), NULL)), dc);
13255$ ok &= txGDI ((Win32::LineTo (dc, ROUND (x1), ROUND (y1) )), dc);
13256
13257$ return ok;
13258 }

13295//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13296
13297bool txArc (double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, double startAngle, double totalAngle, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13298 {
13299$1 if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
13300
13301$ POINT center = { ROUND ((x0 + x1) /2), ROUND ((y0 + y1) /2) };
13302
13303$ double start = startAngle * txPI/180,
13304 end = (startAngle + totalAngle) * txPI/180;
13305
13306$ return txGDI (!!(Win32::Arc (dc, ROUND (x0), ROUND (y0), ROUND (x1), ROUND (y1),
13307 ROUND (center.x + 1E3*cos (start)), ROUND (center.y - 1E3*sin (start)),
13308 ROUND (center.x + 1E3*cos (end)), ROUND (center.y - 1E3*sin (end)))), dc);
13309 }
13310
13311//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13312
13313bool txPie (double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, double startAngle, double totalAngle, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13314 {
13315$1 if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
13316
13317$ POINT center = { ROUND ((x0 + x1) /2), ROUND ((y0 + y1) /2) };
13318
13319$ double start = startAngle * txPI/180,
13320 end = (startAngle + totalAngle) * txPI/180;
13321
13322$ return txGDI (!!(Win32::Pie (dc, ROUND (x0), ROUND (y0), ROUND (x1), ROUND (y1),
13323 ROUND (center.x + 1E3*cos (start)), ROUND (center.y - 1E3*sin (start)),
13324 ROUND (center.x + 1E3*cos (end)), ROUND (center.y - 1E3*sin (end)))), dc);
13325 }
13326
13327//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13328
13329bool txChord (double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, double startAngle, double totalAngle, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13330 {
13331$1 if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
13332
13333$ POINT center = { ROUND ((x0 + x1) /2), ROUND ((y0 + y1) /2) };
13334
13335$ double start = startAngle * txPI/180,
13336 end = (startAngle + totalAngle) * txPI/180;
13337
13338$ return txGDI (!!(Win32::Chord (dc, ROUND (x0), ROUND (y0), ROUND (x1), ROUND (y1),
13339 ROUND (center.x + 1E3*cos (start)), ROUND (center.y - 1E3*sin (start)),
13340 ROUND (center.x + 1E3*cos (end)), ROUND (center.y - 1E3*sin (end)))), dc);
13341 }

13346 COLORREF color /*= TX_TRANSPARENT*/, DWORD mode /*= FLOODFILLSURFACE*/, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)

13349
13350$ if (color == TX_TRANSPARENT) color = txGetPixel (x, y, dc);
13351
13352$ return txGDI (!!(Win32::ExtFloodFill (dc, ROUND (x), ROUND (y), color, mode)), dc);
13353 }

13355//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13356
13357bool txTextOut (double x, double y, const char text[], HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13358 {
13359$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (text)) return false;
13360$ if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
13361
13362$ int len = (int) strlen (text); //-V202
13363$ bool ok = txGDI (!!(Win32::TextOut (dc, ROUND (x), ROUND (y), text, len)), dc);
13364
13365$ return ok;
13366 }
13367
13368//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13369
13370bool txDrawText (double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, const char text[],
13371 unsigned format /*= DT_CENTER | DT_VCENTER | DT_WORDBREAK | DT_WORD_ELLIPSIS*/,
13372 HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13373 {
13374$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (text)) return false;
13375$ if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
13376
13377#if !defined (NDEBUG)
13378
13379$ if (x0 > x1)
13380 {
13381$ SetLastError (ERROR_INVALID_DATA);
13382$ TX_ERROR ("Параметр x0 = %lg больше, чем x1 = %lg. Текст выводиться не будет.", x0, x1);
13383 }
13384
13385$ if (y0 > y1)
13386 {
13387$ SetLastError (ERROR_INVALID_DATA);
13388$ TX_ERROR ("Параметр y0 = %lg больше, чем y1 = %lg. Текст выводиться не будет.", y0, y1);
13389 }
13390
13391#endif
13392
13393$ RECT r = { ROUND (x0), ROUND (y0), ROUND (x1), ROUND (y1) };
13394
13395$ if (!strchr (text, '\n')) format |= DT_SINGLELINE;
13396
13397$ unsigned prev = txSetTextAlign (TA_LEFT | TA_TOP | TA_NOUPDATECP, dc);
13398
13399$ bool ok = false;
13400
13401$ if (Win32::DrawText)
13402 {
13403$ ok = !!txGDI ((Win32::DrawText (dc, text, -1, &r, format)), dc);
13404$ Win32::GetPixel (dc, 0, 0);
13405$ ok = true; //-V519
13406 }
13407 else
13408 {
13409$ txTextOut ((x0 + x1) / 2, (y0 + y1) / 2, text);
13410$ ok = false;
13411 }
13412
13413$ txSetTextAlign (prev, dc);
13414
13415$ return ok;
13416 }
13417
13418//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13419
13420HFONT txSelectFont (const char name[], double sizeY, double sizeX /*= -1*/,
13421 int bold /*= FW_DONTCARE*/, bool italic /*= false*/, bool underline /*= false*/,
13422 bool strikeout /*= false*/, double angle /*= 0*/,
13423 HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13424 {
13425$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (name)) return NULL;
13426$ if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return NULL;
13427
13428$ HFONT font = txFontExist (name)?
13429 Win32::CreateFont (ROUND (sizeY), ROUND ((sizeX >= 0)? sizeX : sizeY/3),
13430 ROUND (angle*10), 0, bold, italic, underline, strikeout,
13431 RUSSIAN_CHARSET, OUT_DEFAULT_PRECIS, CLIP_DEFAULT_PRECIS,
13432 DEFAULT_QUALITY, DEFAULT_PITCH, name)
13433 :
13434 (HFONT) Win32::GetStockObject (SYSTEM_FIXED_FONT);
13435
13436$ _txBuffer_Select (font, dc);
13437
13438$ return font;
13439 }
13440

13442
13443SIZE txGetTextExtent (const char text[], HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13444 {
13445$1 SIZE size = {-1, -1};
13446
13447$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (text)) return size;
13448$ if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return size;
13449
13450$ size_t len = strlen (text);
13451$ txGDI ((Win32::GetTextExtentPoint32 (dc, text, (int) len, &size)), dc) asserted; //-V202
13452
13453$ return size;
13454 }
