13478
13479//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13480
13481LOGFONT* txFontExist (const char name[])
13482 {
13483$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (name)) return NULL;
13484
13485$ static LOGFONT font = {};
13486$ font.lfCharSet = DEFAULT_CHARSET;
13487$ strncpy_s (font.lfFaceName, sizeof (font.lfFaceName), name, sizeof (font.lfFaceName) - 1);
13488
13489$ struct tools
13490 {
13491 static int CALLBACK enumFonts (const LOGFONT* fnt, const TEXTMETRIC*, DWORD, LPARAM data)
13492 {
13493$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (fnt)) return 0;
13494$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (data)) return 0;
13495
13496 #ifndef __STRICT_ANSI__
13497$ return _strnicmp (fnt->lfFaceName, ((LOGFONT*)data)->lfFaceName, LF_FACESIZE);
13498
13499 #else
13500$ return strncmp (fnt->lfFaceName, ((LOGFONT*)data)->lfFaceName, LF_FACESIZE);
13501
13502 #endif
13503 }
13504 };
13505
13506$ return txGDI ((Win32::EnumFontFamiliesEx (NULL, &font, tools::enumFonts, (LPARAM) &font, 0)), NULL) == 0? &font : NULL;
13507 }
13508
13509//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13510
13511bool txSelectObject (HGDIOBJ obj, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13512 {
13513$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (obj)) return false;
13514$ if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
13515
13516$ return _txBuffer_Select (obj, dc);
13517 }
13518
13519//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13520
13521HDC txCreateCompatibleDC (double sizeX, double sizeY, HBITMAP bitmap /*= NULL*/, RGBQUAD** pixels /*= NULL*/)
13522 {
13523$1 POINT size = { ROUND (sizeX), ROUND (sizeY) };
13524
13525$ HDC dc = _txBuffer_Create (NULL, &size, bitmap, pixels);
13526$ assert (dc); if (!dc) return NULL; //-V547
13527
13528$ txSetDefaults (dc);
13529
13530$ if (!_txCanvas_UserDCs) return dc;
13531
13532$ txAutoLock _lock;
13533$ _txCanvas_UserDCs->push_back (dc);
13534
13535$ if (_txCanvas_UserDCs->size() >= _TX_BUFSIZE)
13536 {$ txNotifyIcon (NIIF_WARNING, NULL, "Вы загрузили уже %d HDC, системе может стать плохо.", (int) _txCanvas_UserDCs->size()); } //-V202
13537
13538$ return dc;
13539 }
13540
13541//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13542
13543HDC txCreateDIBSection (double sizeX, double sizeY, RGBQUAD** pixels /*= NULL*/)
13544 {
13545$1 RGBQUAD* pix = NULL;
13546 if (!pixels) {$ pixels = &pix; }
13547
13548$ HDC dc = txCreateCompatibleDC (sizeX, sizeY, NULL, pixels);
13549
13550$ RGBQUAD black = { 0, 0, 0, 255 };
13551$ for (int i = 0; i < sizeX * sizeY; i++) (*pixels)[i] = black; //-V108
13552
13553$ return dc;
13554 }
13555
13556//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13557
13558HDC txCreateDIBSection (double sizeX, double sizeY, COLORREF** pixels)
13559 {
13560$1 return txCreateDIBSection (sizeX, sizeY, (RGBQUAD**) pixels);
13561 }
13562
13563//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13564
13565HDC txLoadImage (const char filename[], int sizeX /*= 0*/, int sizeY /*= 0*/,
13566 unsigned imageFlags /*= IMAGE_BITMAP*/, unsigned loadFlags /*= LR_LOADFROMFILE*/)
13567 {
13568$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (filename && *filename)) return NULL;
13569
13570$ HBITMAP image = (HBITMAP) Win32::LoadImage ((loadFlags & LR_LOADFROMFILE)? NULL : GetModuleHandle (NULL),
13571 filename, imageFlags, sizeX, sizeY, loadFlags);
13572$ if (!image) return NULL;
13573
13574$ HDC dc = txCreateCompatibleDC (sizeX, sizeY, image);
13575
13576$ if (!(loadFlags & LR_LOADFROMFILE)) return dc;
13577
13578$ static std::map <std::string, unsigned> loadTimes;
13579$ std::string file = filename;
13580$ unsigned time = GetTickCount();
13581
13582$ if ((long) (time - loadTimes [file]) < _TX_TIMEOUT)
13583 {$ txNotifyIcon (NIIF_WARNING, NULL, "Вы загружаете \"%s\" слишком часто, программа будет тормозить.", filename); }
13584
13585$ loadTimes [file] = time;
13586
13587$ return dc;
13588 }
13589
13590//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13591
13592bool txDeleteDC (HDC* pdc)
13593 {
13594$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (pdc)) return false;
13595
13596$ HDC dc = *pdc;
13597$ bool ok = _txBuffer_Delete (pdc);
13598$ if (!ok) return false;
13599
13600$ if (!_txCanvas_UserDCs) return ok;
13601
13602$ txAutoLock _lock;
13603
13604$ for (std::vector <HDC> ::iterator it = _txCanvas_UserDCs->begin(); it != _txCanvas_UserDCs->end(); ++it)
13605 if (*it == dc)
13606 {
13607$ std::swap (*it, _txCanvas_UserDCs->back());
13608$ _txCanvas_UserDCs->pop_back();
13609$ break;
13610 }
13611
13612$ return ok;
13613 }
13614
13615//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13616
13617bool txDeleteDC (HDC dc)
13618 {
13619$1 return txDeleteDC (&dc);
13620 }
13621
13622//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13623
13624bool txBitBlt (HDC destImage, double xDest, double yDest, double width, double height,
13625 HDC sourceImage, double xSource /*= 0*/, double ySource /*= 0*/, unsigned operation /*= SRCCOPY*/)
13626 {
13627$1 if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (destImage)) return false;
13628$ if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (sourceImage)) return false;
13629
13630$ POINT size = txGetExtent (sourceImage);
13631$ if (!width) width = size.x; //-V550
13632$ if (!height) height = size.y; //-V550
13633
13634$ return txGDI (!!(Win32::BitBlt (destImage, ROUND (xDest), ROUND (yDest), ROUND (width), ROUND (height),
13635 sourceImage, ROUND (xSource), ROUND (ySource), operation)), destImage);
13636 }
13637
13638//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13639
13640bool txBitBlt (double xDest, double yDest, HDC sourceImage, double xSource /*= 0*/, double ySource /*= 0*/)
13641 {
13642$1 if (_TX_TXWINDOW_FAILED()) return false;
13643
13644$ return txBitBlt (txDC(), xDest, yDest, 0, 0, sourceImage, xSource, ySource);
13645 }
13646
13647//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13648
13649bool txTransparentBlt (HDC destImage, double xDest, double yDest, double width, double height,
13650 HDC sourceImage, double xSource /*= 0*/, double ySource /*= 0*/, COLORREF transColor /*= TX_BLACK*/)
13651 {
13652 // Это проверки того, правильные ли HDC вы передали в функцию.
13653 // Не бойтесь долларов - <s>это не запрещенная валюта</s> это макросы для отладки TXLib'а.
13654 // При первом чтении это можно пропустить.
13655
13656$1 if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (destImage)) return false;
13657$ if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (sourceImage)) return false;
13658
13659 // Это автоматическое определение размеров картинки (точнее, HDC источника - source) с помощью txGetExtent().
13660 // При первом чтении это можно пропустить.
13661
13662$ POINT size = txGetExtent (sourceImage);
13663$ if (!width) width = size.x; //-V550
13664$ if (!height) height = size.y; //-V550
13665
13666 // Это проверка того, что картинка (или ее часть) правильно попадает в окно (точнее, HDC приемника - destination, dest).
13667 // Если она "вылезает" из окна в любую сторону, то Win32::TransparentBlt() не будет работать. Эта проверка происходит только
13668 // в режиме отладки (когда не задан макрос NDEBUG - No Debugging, без отладки).
13669 // При первом чтении это можно пропустить.
13670
13671#if !defined (NDEBUG)
13672
13673$ if (!(0 <= xSource && xSource + width <= size.x &&
13674 0 <= ySource && ySource + height <= size.y))
13675 {
13676$ SetLastError (ERROR_INVALID_DATA);
13677$ TX_ERROR ("Прямоугольник копируемой области {%lg, %lg, %lg, %lg} не полностью лежит внутри изображения-источника {%d, %d, %d, %d}, "
13678 "функция txTransparentBlt() работать не будет.", xSource, ySource, xSource + width, ySource + height, 0, 0, (int) size.x, (int) size.y);
13679 }
13680
13681#endif
13682
13683$ bool ok = true;
13684
13685$ if (Win32::TransparentBlt)
13686 {
13687 // А вот теперь уже надо начать читать.
13688 //
13689 // Ниже - это вызов стандартной Win32::TransparentBlt() из ядра Windows. Погуглите "Windows TransparentBlt function"
13690 // и почитайте про ее параметры.
13691 //
13692 // Как видите, оригинальная функция из Win32 принимает размеры не только исходной, но и итоговой картинки, и если они не
13693 // совпадают, то картинка будет уменьшена или увеличена. TXlib'овская <s>паленая</s> функция TransparentBlt предполагает, что
13694 // эти размеры всегда совпадают, и поэтому при работе с TransparentBlt() масштаб будет всегда 1:1. <s>Так себе решение, но</s>
13695 // это сделано для упрощения вызова функции TransparentBlt().
13696
13697 // Только то, что эти параметры передаются одинаковыми, не дает возможность менять масштаб картинки! // <<--
13698 // // <<--
13699 // ||||| |||||| // <<--
13700 // vvvvv vvvvvv // <<--
13701 // <<--
13702$ ok &= txGDI (!!(Win32::TransparentBlt (destImage, ROUND (xDest), ROUND (yDest), ROUND (width), ROUND (height), // <<<<
13703 sourceImage, ROUND (xSource), ROUND (ySource), ROUND (width), ROUND (height), transColor)), // <<<<
13704 destImage); // <<--
13705 // ^^^^^ ^^^^^^ // <<--
13706 // ||||| |||||| // <<--
13707 // // <<--
13708 } // См. "TransparentBlt function" в Google, ищите смысл параметров wSrc и wDest (hSrc и hDest). Думайте! // <<--
13709 else
13710 {
13711$ ok &= txGDI (!!(Win32::BitBlt (destImage, ROUND (xDest), ROUND (yDest), ROUND (width), ROUND (height),
13712 sourceImage, ROUND (xSource), ROUND (ySource), SRCCOPY)),
13713 destImage);
13714 }
13715
13716 // В TXLib-овской функции txTransparentBlt() проверок и комментариев больше, чем рабочего кода, и это как бы намекает, что
13717 // нетрудно сделать свою аналогичную функцию без ограничений масштаба отображения. <s>Если ты дочитал до этого места,</s>
13718 // пересядь с иглы TXLib'а на поверхность GDI Win32, <s>хотя GDI тоже так себе, так что лучше заюзай GDI+, SFML, OpenGL
13719 // или DirectX, будет круто. Хотя это и сложнее.</s>
13720
13721 // Пожалуйста, не надо бездумно копировать себе в программу код из TXLib'а. Осмыслите его и напишите свою функцию сами,
13722 // иначе вы породите невнятный паленый код и безнадежно испортите себе карму. :((
13723
13724$ return ok;
13725 }
13726
13727//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13728
13729bool txTransparentBlt (double xDest, double yDest, HDC sourceImage,
13730 COLORREF transColor /*= TX_BLACK*/, double xSource /*= 0*/, double ySource /*= 0*/)
13731 {
13732$1 if (_TX_TXWINDOW_FAILED()) return false;
13733
13734$ return txTransparentBlt (txDC(), xDest, yDest, 0, 0, sourceImage, xSource, ySource, transColor);
13735 }
13736
13737//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13738
13739bool txAlphaBlend (HDC destImage, double xDest, double yDest, double width, double height,
13740 HDC sourceImage, double xSource /*= 0*/, double ySource /*= 0*/, double alpha /*= 1.0*/)
13741 {
13742$1 if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (destImage)) return false;
13743$ if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (sourceImage)) return false;
13744
13745$ POINT size = txGetExtent (sourceImage);
13746$ if (!width) width = size.x; //-V550
13747$ if (!height) height = size.y; //-V550
13748
13749#if !defined (NDEBUG)
13750
13751$ if (!(0 <= xSource && xSource + width <= size.x &&
13752 0 <= ySource && ySource + height <= size.y))
13753 {
13754$ SetLastError (ERROR_INVALID_DATA);
13755$ TX_ERROR ("Прямоугольник копируемой области {%lg, %lg, %lg, %lg} не полностью лежит внутри изображения-источника {%d, %d, %d, %d}, "
13756 "функция txAlphaBlend() работать не будет.", xSource, ySource, xSource + width, ySource + height, 0, 0, (int) size.x, (int) size.y);
13757 }
13758
13759#endif
13760
13761$ if (alpha < 0) alpha = 0;
13762$ if (alpha > 1) alpha = 1;
13763
13764$ BITMAP bmap = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 24 };
13765$ bool ok = !!Win32::GetObject (txGDI ((Win32::GetCurrentObject (sourceImage, OBJ_BITMAP)), sourceImage), sizeof (bmap), &bmap);
13766
13767$ BLENDFUNCTION blend = { AC_SRC_OVER, 0, (BYTE) ROUND (alpha * 255), (BYTE) ((bmap.bmBitsPixel == 32)? AC_SRC_ALPHA : 0) }; //-V112 //-V821 //-V2551
13768
13769$ if (Win32::AlphaBlend)
13770 {
13771$ ok &= txGDI (!!(Win32::AlphaBlend (destImage, ROUND (xDest), ROUND (yDest), ROUND (width), ROUND (height),
13772 sourceImage, ROUND (xSource), ROUND (ySource), ROUND (width), ROUND (height), blend)),
13773 destImage);
13774 }
13775 else
13776 {
13777$ ok &= txGDI (!!(Win32::BitBlt (destImage, ROUND (xDest), ROUND (yDest), ROUND (width), ROUND (height),
13778 sourceImage, ROUND (xSource), ROUND (ySource), SRCCOPY)),
13779 destImage);
13780$ ok = false; //-V519
13781 }
13782
13783$ return ok;
13784 }
13785
13786//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13787
13788bool txAlphaBlend (double xDest, double yDest, HDC sourceImage,
13789 double xSource /*= 0*/, double ySource /*= 0*/, double alpha /*= 1.0*/)
13790 {
13791$1 if (_TX_TXWINDOW_FAILED()) return false;
13792
13793$ return txAlphaBlend (txDC(), xDest, yDest, 0, 0, sourceImage, xSource, ySource, alpha);
13794 }
13795
13796//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13797
13798HDC txUseAlpha (HDC image)
13799 {
13800$1 if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (image)) return NULL;
13801
13802$ HBITMAP bitmap = (HBITMAP) Win32::GetCurrentObject (image, OBJ_BITMAP);
13803$ if (!bitmap) return NULL;
13804
13805$ DIBSECTION dib = {};
13806$ Win32::GetObject (bitmap, sizeof (dib), &dib) asserted;
13807
13808$ POINT size = { dib.dsBm.bmWidth, dib.dsBm.bmHeight };
13809$ BITMAPINFO info = {{ sizeof (info), size.x, size.y, 1, (WORD) (sizeof (RGBQUAD) * 8), BI_RGB }};
13810$ RGBQUAD* buf = NULL;
13811
13812$ bool isDIB = (dib.dsBm.bmPlanes == 1 &&
13813 dib.dsBm.bmBitsPixel == sizeof (RGBQUAD) * 8 &&
13814 dib.dsBmih.biCompression == DIB_RGB_COLORS &&
13815 dib.dsBm.bmBits);
13816$ if (!isDIB)
13817 {
13818$ buf = new (std::nothrow) RGBQUAD [size.x * size.y]; //-V121
13819$ if (!buf) return NULL;
13820
13821$ Win32::GetDIBits (image, bitmap, 0, size.y, buf, &info, DIB_RGB_COLORS) asserted;
13822 }
13823 else
13824 {
13825$ buf = (RGBQUAD*) dib.dsBm.bmBits;
13826 }
13827
13828$ for (int y = 0; y < size.y; y++)
13829 for (int x = 0; x < size.x; x++)
13830 {
13831 RGBQUAD* color = &buf [x + y * size.x]; // Get color at (x, y) within image buffer //-V108
13832
13833 color->rgbRed = (BYTE) ROUND (color->rgbRed * color->rgbReserved / 255.0);
13834 color->rgbGreen = (BYTE) ROUND (color->rgbGreen * color->rgbReserved / 255.0);
13835 color->rgbBlue = (BYTE) ROUND (color->rgbBlue * color->rgbReserved / 255.0);
13836 }
13837
13838$ if (!isDIB)
13839 {
13840$ Win32::SetDIBitsToDevice (image, 0, 0, size.x, size.y, 0, 0, 0, size.y, buf, &info, DIB_RGB_COLORS) asserted;
13841
13842$ delete[] buf;
13843 }
13844
13845$ return image;
13846 }
13847
13848//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13849
13850bool txSaveImage (const char filename[], HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
13851 {
13852$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (filename)) return false;
13853$ if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
13854
13855$ POINT size = txGetExtent (dc);
13856
13857$ size_t szHdrs = sizeof (BITMAPFILEHEADER) + sizeof (BITMAPINFOHEADER), //-V119
13858 szImg = (size.x * size.y) * sizeof (RGBQUAD); //-V104
13859
13860$ BITMAP bmap = {};
13861$ BITMAPFILEHEADER hdr = { 0x4D42 /* 'MB' */, (DWORD) (szHdrs + szImg), 0, 0, (DWORD) szHdrs }; //-V202
13862$ BITMAPINFOHEADER info = { sizeof (info), size.x, size.y, 1, (WORD) (sizeof (RGBQUAD) * 8), BI_RGB };
13863
13864$ RGBQUAD* buf = NULL;
13865$ bool ok = true;
13866
13867$ ok &= !!Win32::GetObject (Win32::GetCurrentObject (dc, OBJ_BITMAP), sizeof (bmap), &bmap);
13868
13869 if (!ok) {$ return false; }
13870
13871$ if (!bmap.bmBits)
13872 {
13873$ buf = new (std::nothrow) RGBQUAD [size.x * size.y]; //-V121
13874$ ok &= (buf != NULL);
13875
13876$ int res = Win32::GetDIBits (dc, (HBITMAP) Win32::GetCurrentObject (dc, OBJ_BITMAP), 0, size.y,
13877 buf, (BITMAPINFO*) &info, DIB_RGB_COLORS);
13878
13879 if (res == ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER) {$ SetLastError (res); }
13880
13881$ ok &= !!res;
13882 }
13883 else
13884 {
13885$ buf = (RGBQUAD*) bmap.bmBits;
13886 }
13887
13888$ FILE* f = NULL;
13889$ if (ok) fopen_s (&f, filename, "wb");
13890$ ok &= (f != NULL);
13891
13892$ if (ok) ok &= (fwrite (&hdr, sizeof (hdr), 1, f) == 1); //-V575 //-V595
13893$ if (ok) ok &= (fwrite (&info, sizeof (info), 1, f) == 1);
13894$ if (ok) ok &= (fwrite (buf, szImg, 1, f) == 1); //-V575
13895
13896$ ok &= (f && fclose (f) == 0);
13897
13898$ if (!bmap.bmBits)
13899 {
13900$ delete[] buf;
13901$ buf = NULL;
13902 }
13903
13904$ return ok;
13905 }
13906
13907//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13908
13909double txSleep (double time)
13910 {
13911$1 LARGE_INTEGER start = {};
13912$ QueryPerformanceCounter (&start) asserted;
13913
13914$ LARGE_INTEGER freq = {};
13915$ QueryPerformanceFrequency (&freq) asserted;
13916
13917$ int lock = _txCanvas_RefreshLock;
13918$ _txCanvas_RefreshLock = 0;
13919
13920$ HWND wnd = txWindow();
13921 if (wnd) {$ RedrawWindow (wnd, NULL, NULL, RDW_INVALIDATE | RDW_INTERNALPAINT | RDW_UPDATENOW); }
13922
13923$ Sleep (ROUND ((time >= 0)? time : 0));
13924
13925$ _txCanvas_RefreshLock = lock;
13926
13927$ LARGE_INTEGER stop = {};
13928$ QueryPerformanceCounter (&stop) asserted;
13929
13930$ return 1000.0 * (double) (stop.QuadPart - start.QuadPart) / (double) freq.QuadPart;
13931 }
13932
13933//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13934
13935bool txLock (bool wait /*= true*/)
13936 {
13937$0 if (_txCanvas_RefreshLock <= 0 || _txExit) Sleep (0);
13938
13939$ if (wait) {$ return EnterCriticalSection (&_txCanvas_LockBackBuf), true; } //-V1048
13940 else {$ return !!TryEnterCriticalSection (&_txCanvas_LockBackBuf); }
13941 }
13942
13943//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13944
13945bool txUnlock()
13946 {
13947$0 LeaveCriticalSection (&_txCanvas_LockBackBuf);
13948
13949$ if (_txCanvas_RefreshLock <= 0 || _txExit) Sleep (0);
13950$ return false;
13951 }
13952
13953#endif // TX_COMPILED
13954
13955//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13956
13957template <typename T>
13958inline T txUnlock (T value)
13959 {
13960$1 txUnlock();
13961$ return value;
13962 }
13963
13964//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13965
13966inline void txRedrawWindow()
13967 {
13968$1 txSleep (0);
13969 }
13970
13971//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13972
13973inline int txUpdateWindow (int update /*= true*/)
13974 {
13975$1 return _txCanvas_SetRefreshLock (update >= 0? (int) !update : -update);
13976 }
13977
13978//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13979
13980inline int txBegin()
13981 {
13982$1 _txCanvas_SetRefreshLock (_txCanvas_RefreshLock + 1);
13983
13984$ return _txCanvas_RefreshLock;
13985 }
13986
13987//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13988
13989inline int txEnd()
13990 {
13991$1 _txCanvas_SetRefreshLock (_txCanvas_RefreshLock - 1);
13992
13993$ return _txCanvas_RefreshLock;
13994 }
13995
13996//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13997
13998inline POINT txMousePos()
13999 {
14000$1 POINT pos = {};
14001$ GetCursorPos (&pos);
14002
14003$ if (txWindow())
14004 {$ ScreenToClient (txWindow(), &pos); }
14005
14006$ return pos;
14007 }
14008
14009//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14010
14011inline double txMouseX()
14012 {
14013 return (double) txMousePos() .x;
14014 }
14015
14016//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14017
14018inline double txMouseY()
14019 {
14020 return (double) txMousePos() .y;
14021 }
14022
14023//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14024
14025#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
14026
14027unsigned txMouseButtons()
14028 {
14029$1 HWND txWnd = txWindow();
14030$ HWND foreground = GetForegroundWindow();
14031
14032$ if ((txWnd && (foreground == txWnd)) ||
14033 (!txWnd && (foreground == Win32::GetConsoleWindow())))
14034 {
14035$ return ((GetAsyncKeyState (VK_LBUTTON) & 0x8000) >> 15) | // MSB to bit 0
14036 ((GetAsyncKeyState (VK_RBUTTON) & 0x8000) >> 14) | // MSB to bit 1
14037 ((GetAsyncKeyState (VK_MBUTTON) & 0x8000) >> 13); // MSB to bit 2
14038 }
14039 else
14040 {$ return 0; }
14041 }
14042
14043//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14044
14045unsigned txSetConsoleAttr (unsigned color /*= FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY*/)
14046 {
14047 unsigned oldAttr = txGetConsoleAttr();
14048
14049 SetConsoleTextAttribute (GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), (WORD) color);
14050
14051 return oldAttr;
14052 }
14053
14054//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14055
14056unsigned txGetConsoleAttr()
14057 {
14058 CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO con = {};
14059 GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo (GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), &con);
14060
14061 return con.wAttributes;
14062 }
14063
14064//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14065
14066POINT txSetConsoleCursorPos (double x, double y)
14067 {
14068$1 POINT fontSz = txGetConsoleFontSize();
14069
14070$ CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO con = {};
14071$ GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo (GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), &con) asserted;
14072
14073$ COORD pos = { (short) ROUND (1.0 * x / fontSz.x + con.srWindow.Left),
14074 (short) ROUND (1.0 * y / fontSz.y + con.srWindow.Top ) };
14075
14076$ SetConsoleCursorPosition (GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), pos) asserted;
14077
14078$ POINT prev = { ROUND ((con.dwCursorPosition.X - con.srWindow.Left) * fontSz.x),
14079 ROUND ((con.dwCursorPosition.Y - con.srWindow.Top ) * fontSz.y) };
14080$ return prev;
14081 }
14082
14083//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14084
14085POINT txGetConsoleCursorPos()
14086 {
14087$1 POINT fontSz = txGetConsoleFontSize();
14088
14089$ CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO con = {};
14090$ GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo (GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), &con) asserted;
14091
14092$ POINT pos = { ROUND ((con.dwCursorPosition.X - con.srWindow.Left) * fontSz.x),
14093 ROUND ((con.dwCursorPosition.Y - con.srWindow.Top ) * fontSz.y) };
14094$ return pos;
14095 }
14096
14097//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14098
14099POINT txGetConsoleExtent()
14100 {
14101$1 CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO con = {};
14102$ GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo (GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), &con) asserted;
14103
14104$ POINT size = { con.srWindow.Right - con.srWindow.Left + 1,
14105 con.srWindow.Bottom - con.srWindow.Top + 1 };
14106$ return size;
14107 }
14108
14109//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14110
14111bool txClearConsole()
14112 {
14113$1 HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
14114
14115$ CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO con = {};
14116$ GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo (out, &con) asserted;
14117
14118$ COORD start = {con.srWindow.Left, con.srWindow.Top};
14119
14120$ DWORD len = (con.srWindow.Right - con.srWindow.Left + 1) *
14121 (con.srWindow.Bottom - con.srWindow.Top + 1);
14122
14123$ DWORD written = 0;
14124$ FillConsoleOutputCharacter (out, 0x20 /*' '*/, len, start, &written) asserted; //-V112
14125$ FillConsoleOutputAttribute (out, con.wAttributes, len, start, &written) asserted;
14126
14127$ SetConsoleCursorPosition (GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), start) asserted;
14128
14129$ return written == len;
14130 }
14131
14132//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14133
14134POINT txGetConsoleFontSize()
14135 {
14136$1 Win32::CONSOLE_FONT_INFO font = {0, {8, 16}};
14137
14138$ _TX_CALL (Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFont, (GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), false, &font));
14139
14140$ SIZE size = { font.dwFontSize.X, font.dwFontSize.Y };
14141$ txGDI (Win32::GetTextExtentPoint32 (_txCanvas_BackBuf[1], "W", 1, &size), txDC()); //-V501
14142
14143$ POINT sizeFont = { size.cx, size.cy };
14144$ return sizeFont;
14145 }
14146

14148
14149bool txTextCursor (bool blink /*= true*/)
14150 {
14151$1 bool old = _txConsole_IsBlinking;
14152
14153$ _txConsole_IsBlinking = blink;
14154
14155$ return old;
14156 }

14158//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14159
14160bool txPlaySound (const char filename[] /*= NULL*/, DWORD mode /*= SND_ASYNC*/)
14161 {
14162$1 mode |= SND_FILENAME | SND_NODEFAULT | SND_NOWAIT;
14163$ if (mode & SND_LOOP) mode = (mode & ~SND_SYNC) | SND_ASYNC;
14164
14165$ if (!filename) mode = SND_PURGE;
14166
14167$ return !!Win32::PlaySound (filename, NULL, mode);
14168 }
14169
14170//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14171
14172int txSpeak (const char* text, ...)
14173 {
14174$1 bool verbose = false; (void) verbose;
14175$ bool async = false; (void) async;
14176
14177$ for (; text && *text; text++)
14178 {
14179 if (*text == '\a') {$ async = true; }
14180 else if (*text == '\v') {$ verbose = true; }
14181 else break;
14182 }
14183
14184$ char textA [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "You asked to speak empty text. I would rather say that TX Library is cool! Cats rules!";
14185
14186$ va_list arg; va_start (arg, text);
14187 if (text && *text) {$ _tx_vsnprintf_s (textA, sizeof (textA) - 1, text, arg); }
14188$ va_end (arg);
14189
14190 if (text && verbose) {$ printf ("%s", textA); }
14191
14192#ifdef TX_USE_SPEAK
14193
14194$ int time = GetTickCount();
14195
14196$ static wchar_t textW [_TX_BUFSIZE * sizeof (wchar_t)] = L"";
14197$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, textA, -1, textW, sizearr (textW));
14198
14199$ static ISpVoice* voice = NULL;
14200
14201$ if (text && !voice)
14202 {
14203$ HRESULT res = Win32::CoInitialize (NULL);
14204 if (res == S_OK) {$ Win32::CoCreateInstance (Win32::CLSID_SpVoice, NULL, CLSCTX_ALL, Win32::IID_ISpVoice, (void**) &voice); }
14205 }
14206
14207$ if (text && voice)
14208 {
14209$ Win32::_fpreset();
14210$ voice->Speak (textW, SPF_PERSIST_XML | SPF_PURGEBEFORESPEAK | ((*textW == '<')? SPF_IS_XML : 0) | (async? SPF_ASYNC : 0), NULL);
14211$ tx_fpreset();
14212 }
14213
14214$ if (!text && voice)
14215 {
14216$ voice->Release();
14217$ voice = NULL;
14218
14219$ Win32::CoUninitialize();
14220 }
14221
14222$ return (voice)? GetTickCount() - time : -1;
14223
14224#else
14225
14226$ if (text)
14227 {
14228$ unsigned oldAttr = txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
14229
14230$ txNotifyIcon (NIIF_ERROR, "txSpeak(): Не могу произнести (нужен TX_USE_SPEAK, см. TXLib Help)", "\n" "%s", textA);
14231
14232$ txSetConsoleAttr (oldAttr);
14233 }
14234
14235$ return -1;
14236
14237#endif
14238 }
14239
14240//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14241
14242intptr_t txPlayVideo (int x, int y, int width, int height, const char fileName[],
14243 double zoom /*= 0*/, double gain /*= 1*/, HWND wnd /*= txWindow()*/)
14244 {
14245$1 if (wnd && wnd == txWindow() && _TX_TXWINDOW_FAILED()) return -1;
14246
14247$ int time = GetTickCount(); //-V2551
14248
14249$ static char processUID [64] = "";
14250 if (!*processUID)
14251 {
14252$ FILETIME startTime = {}, null = {};
14253$ GetProcessTimes (GetCurrentProcess(), &startTime, &null, &null, &null) asserted;
14254$ _snprintf_s (processUID, sizeof (processUID) - 1, "TXLib[%08X%08X]::txPlayVideo",
14255 (unsigned) startTime.dwHighDateTime, (unsigned) startTime.dwLowDateTime) < (int) sizeof (processUID) asserted;
14256 }
14257
14258$ if (!fileName)
14259 {
14260$ _txTaskKill ("vlc.exe", processUID, 0); // Kill'em all, by command line pattern
14261$ return 0;
14262 }
14263
14264$ static const char* vlcPath = _txPlayVideo_FindVLC();
14265
14266$ if (!vlcPath || _access (vlcPath, 0) != 0)
14267 {
14268$ static int once = false; //-V601
14269
14270$ if (*fileName && !once++)
14271 {$ txOutputDebugPrintf ("\a" "Не найден видеопроигрыватель VideoLAN (vlc.exe). Cкачайте его с сайта VideoLAN.org "
14272 "и установите. Без установки VideoLAN видео воспроизводиться не будет :(\n\n"
14273 "--\n" "Всегда Ваша, функция " /* как бы */ "txPlayVideo()...\n"
14274 "P.S. См. мое описание в TXLib Help."); }
14275$ return INT_MIN; //-V109
14276 }
14277
14278$ bool async = false;
14279 if (*fileName == '\a') {$ async = true; fileName++; }
14280
14281$ RECT rect = {};
14282 if (wnd) {$ GetClientRect (wnd, &rect); }
14283
14284 if (!width) {$ width = rect.right; }
14285 if (!height) {$ height = rect.bottom; }
14286
14287 // Create a child window to hold the video stream
14288
14289$ const char* errPos = "ВНЕЗАПНО";
14290
14291$ volatile HWND child = NULL;
14292$ if (wnd && (wnd == txWindow()))
14293 {
14294$ const char* wndClass = txRegisterClass ("txPlayVideo", _txPlayVideo_WndProc, 0, NULL_BRUSH, 1);
14295
14296$ static int number = 1;
14297$ CREATESTRUCT createData = { NULL, NULL, (HMENU) (size_t) number++, txWindow(), height, width, y, x,
14298 WS_CHILD | WS_CLIPSIBLINGS | WS_VISIBLE, __func__, wndClass };
14299$ child = txCreateExtraWindow (createData);
14300$ if (!child)
14301 {
14302$ txNotifyIcon (NIIF_ERROR, "txPlayVideo() сообщает", "\n" "%s",
14303 strstr (_txError (NULL, 0, NULL, 0, "\f" "Не могу создать окно для видео :("), errPos));
14304$ return INT_MIN+3; //-V109
14305 }
14306
14307$ BringWindowToTop (child);
14308
14309$ wnd = child;
14310 }
14311
14312 // Build the command line
14313
14314 if (!zoom && !wnd) {$ zoom = 1; }
14315
14316$ char sZoom [64] = "--autoscale";
14317 if (zoom) {$ _snprintf_s (sZoom, sizeof (sZoom) - 1, "--no-autoscale --zoom=%.10g", zoom) < (int) sizeof (sZoom) asserted; } //-V550
14318
14319$ static char cmd [MAX_PATH*2 + 1024] = "";
14320
14321$ _snprintf_s (cmd, sizeof (cmd) - 1, "\"%s\" \"%s\" vlc://quit"
14322
14323 " %s --gain=%.10g --drawable-hwnd=%p --video-title=\"%s\" --logfile=%s"
14324
14325 " --live-caching=500 --network-caching=500 --quiet-synchro --no-embedded-video --file-logging"
14326
14327 " --ignore-config --reset-config --no-one-instance --play-and-exit"
14328 " --intf=dummy --dummy-quiet --quiet --no-video-deco --no-video-title-show --no-stats --no-sub-autodetect-file"
14329 " --no-disable-screensaver --no-snapshot-preview --no-auto-preparse --no-mouse-events --no-keyboard-events",
14330
14331 vlcPath, (*fileName? fileName : "fileName"), sZoom, gain, (void*) wnd, processUID, _txLogName) < (int) sizeof (cmd) asserted;
14332
14333$ txOutputDebugPrintf ("txPlayVideo (%d, %d, %d, %d, \"%s\", %lg, %lg, %p): [%s]\n\n",
14334 x, y, width, height, fileName, zoom, gain, wnd, cmd);
14335$ if (!*fileName)
14336 {
14337 if (child) {$ txDestroyWindow (child); }
14338$ return (intptr_t) cmd;
14339 }
14340
14341$ if (!strstr (fileName, "://") && _access (fileName, 0) != 0)
14342 {
14343$ txNotifyIcon (NIIF_ERROR, "txPlayVideo() сообщает", "\n" "%s",
14344 strstr (_txError (NULL, 0, NULL, 0, "\f" "Не найден файл \"%s\"", fileName), errPos));
14345
14346 if (child) {$ txDestroyWindow (child); }
14347$ return INT_MIN+1; //-V109
14348 }
14349
14350 // Run VLC, run
14351
14352$ PROCESS_INFORMATION vlc = {};
14353$ STARTUPINFO start = { sizeof (start) };
14354$ DWORD ret = 0;
14355
14356$ if (CreateProcess (NULL, cmd, NULL, NULL, true, 0, NULL, NULL, &start, &vlc) &&
14357 vlc.hProcess && vlc.hThread)
14358 {
14359$ if (child)
14360 {
14361$ assert (wnd == child); //-V547
14362$ SetWindowLongPtr (wnd, GWLP_USERDATA, (LONG_PTR) vlc.hProcess); //-V107
14363 }
14364
14365$ if (!async)
14366 {
14367$ WaitForSingleObject (vlc.hProcess, INFINITE);
14368$ GetExitCodeProcess (vlc.hProcess, &ret) asserted;
14369 }
14370
14371$ if (!child)
14372 {
14373$ CloseHandle (vlc.hProcess) asserted;
14374 }
14375
14376$ CloseHandle (vlc.hThread) asserted;
14377
14378$ return (async? (intptr_t) wnd : (ret == 0)? time - GetTickCount() : - (int) ret); //-V105
14379 }
14380 else
14381 {
14382$ txNotifyIcon (NIIF_ERROR, "txPlayVideo() сообщает", "%s",
14383 strstr (_txError (NULL, 0, NULL, 0, "\f" "Ошибка запуска VideoLAN (%s)", cmd), errPos));
14384$ if (child)
14385 {$ txDestroyWindow (child); }
14386
14387$ return INT_MIN+4; //-V112 //-V109
14388 }
14389
14390 #undef PROCESS_UID_
14391 }
14392
14393//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14394
14395intptr_t txPlayVideo (const char fileName[], double zoom /*= 0*/, double gain /*= 0*/, HWND wnd /*= txWindow()*/)
14396 {
14397$1 return txPlayVideo (0, 0, 0, 0, fileName, zoom, gain, wnd);
14398 }
14399
14400//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14401
14402LRESULT CALLBACK _txPlayVideo_WndProc (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wpar, LPARAM lpar)
14403 {
14404 const UINT_PTR checkTimer = 1;
14405
14406 switch (msg)
14407 {
14408 case WM_CREATE:
14409 {
14410$1 SetTimer (wnd, checkTimer, 5*_txWindowUpdateInterval, NULL) asserted;
14411 }
14412 break;
14413
14414 case WM_DESTROY:
14415 {
14416$1 KillTimer (wnd, checkTimer) asserted;
14417
14418$ HANDLE vlc = (HANDLE)(uintptr_t) GetWindowLongPtr (wnd, GWLP_USERDATA);
14419
14420$ if (vlc)
14421 {
14422$ Win32::TerminateProcess (vlc, 0);
14423
14424$ CloseHandle (vlc) asserted;
14425
14426$ SetWindowLongPtr (wnd, GWLP_USERDATA, 0);
14427 }
14428 }
14429 break;
14430
14431 case WM_TIMER:
14432 {
14433 HANDLE vlc = (HANDLE)(uintptr_t) GetWindowLongPtr (wnd, GWLP_USERDATA);
14434
14435 if (vlc && WaitForSingleObject (vlc, 0) != WAIT_TIMEOUT)
14436 {
14437$1 DestroyWindow (wnd) asserted;
14438 }
14439 }
14440 break;
14441
14442 default: //-V2522
14443 break;
14444 }
14445
14446 return DefWindowProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
14447 }
14448

14450
14451const char* _txPlayVideo_FindVLC()
14452 {
14453$1 static char vlcPath [MAX_PATH] = "";
14454
14455$ if (SearchPath (NULL, "vlc.bat", NULL, sizeof (vlcPath), vlcPath, NULL))
14456 {
14457 if (_access (vlcPath, 0) == 0) {$ return vlcPath; }
14458 }
14459
14460$ if (SearchPath (NULL, "vlc.exe", NULL, sizeof (vlcPath), vlcPath, NULL))
14461 {
14462 if (_access (vlcPath, 0) == 0) {$ return vlcPath; }
14463 }
14464
14465$ if (txRegQuery ("HKLM\\Software\\VideoLAN\\VLC", NULL, vlcPath, sizeof (vlcPath)))
14466 {
14467 if (_access (vlcPath, 0) == 0) {$ return vlcPath; }
14468 }
14469
14470$ if (txRegQuery ("HKLM\\Software\\VideoLAN\\VLC", "InstallDir", vlcPath, sizeof (vlcPath)))
14471 {
14472$ strncat_s (vlcPath, sizeof (vlcPath) - 1, "\\vlc.exe", INT_MAX);
14473
14474 if (_access (vlcPath, 0) == 0) {$ return vlcPath; }
14475 }
14476
14477$ strncpy_s (vlcPath, sizeof (vlcPath), "C:\\Program Files" "\\VideoLAN\\VLC\\vlc.exe", UINT_MAX); //-V106
14478 {
14479 if (_access (vlcPath, 0) == 0) {$ return vlcPath; }
14480 }
14481
14482$ strncpy_s (vlcPath, sizeof (vlcPath), "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\VideoLAN\\VLC\\vlc.exe", UINT_MAX); //-V106
14483 {
14484 if (_access (vlcPath, 0) == 0) {$ return vlcPath; }
14485 }
14486
14487$ return NULL;
14488 }

14490//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14491
14492HRESULT txSetProgress (double percent, unsigned type /*= TBPF_NORMAL*/, HWND wnd /*= NULL*/)
14493 {
14494$1 static double oldPercent = 100;
14495
14496 if (percent < 0) {$ percent = MIN (oldPercent, 100); }
14497 else {$ oldPercent = percent; }
14498
14499$ HRESULT res = S_OK;
14500$ bool ok = true;
14501
14502$ Win32::CoInitialize (NULL);
14503
14504$ Win32::ITaskbarList3* taskbar = NULL;
14505 if (ok) {$ res = Win32::CoCreateInstance (Win32::CLSID_TaskbarList, NULL, CLSCTX_INPROC_SERVER, Win32::IID_ITaskbarList3, (void**) &taskbar); }
14506$ ok &= !!taskbar && (res == S_OK);
14507
14508 if (!wnd) {$ wnd = txWindow(); }
14509 if (ok && taskbar) {$ res = taskbar->SetProgressValue (wnd, ROUND (percent), 100); ok &= (res == S_OK); }
14510 if (ok && taskbar) {$ res = taskbar->SetProgressState (wnd, type); ok &= (res == S_OK); }
14511
14512 if (wnd == txWindow()) {$ wnd = Win32::GetConsoleWindow(); }
14513 if (ok && taskbar) {$ res = taskbar->SetProgressValue (wnd, ROUND (percent), 100); ok &= (res == S_OK); }
14514 if (ok && taskbar) {$ res = taskbar->SetProgressState (wnd, type); ok &= (res == S_OK); }
14515
14516 if (taskbar) {$ taskbar->Release(); }
14517
14518$ Win32::CoUninitialize();
14519
14520$ return res;
14521 }
14522
14523#endif // TX_COMPILED
14524

14526
14527// +--<<< Это вряд ли имеет отношение к тому, что вы ищете :)
14528// V Полезно смотреть не только вверх, но и вниз
14529
14530inline WNDPROC txSetWindowsHook (WNDPROC wndProc /*= NULL*/)
14531 {
14532$1 WNDPROC old = _txAltWndProc; _txAltWndProc = wndProc;
14533$ return old;
14534 }

14536//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14537
14538// +--<<< А это, наконец, искомое определение этой функции.
14539// | Смотрите по сторонам! Нужная вам функция где-то рядом.
14540// |
14541// v
14542inline bool txIDontWantToHaveAPauseAfterMyProgramBeforeTheWindowWillClose_AndIWillNotBeAskingWhereIsMyPicture()
14543 {
14544 txMessageBox ("Это запланированная ошибка. Такое бывает. Вы хотели вызвать:\n\n"
14545
14546 "txIDontWantToHaveAPauseAfterMyProgramBeforeTheWindowWillClose_AndIWillNotBeAskingWhereIsMyPicture()\n\n"
14547
14548 "Хоть вы долго [копировали]набирали это имя, на самом деле эта функция не реализована. "
14549 "Есть другая функция, которая убирает авто-паузу в конце программы, но в хелпе про нее не написано.\n\n"
14550
14551 "Но не все так плохо. Определение нужной функции есть в исходных текстах TXLib.h, оно лежит рядом "
14552 "с определением той функции с длинным названием, которую вы сейчас вызвали.\n\n"
14553
14554 "Нажмите в редакторе Ctrl+O, найдите и откройте файл TXLib.h (он лежит в папке, куда вы "
14555 "установили TXLib), затем нажмите Ctrl+F и ищите \"txIDontWant\". Удачи!\n\n",
14556
14557 "Не получилось", MB_ICONSTOP);
14558
14559 // The truth is out there... (C++files)
14560
14561 return false;
14562 }

14566// Bingo! Now you are learned to use the Source, Luke. And may the Source be with you.
14567
14568inline bool txDisableAutoPause()
14569 {
14570 _txExit = true;
14571 return true;
14572 }

14575
14576//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14577
14578#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
14579
14580void _txDump (const void* address, const char name[] /*= "_txDump()"*/, bool pause /*= true*/)
14581 {
14582$1 assert (!_txIsBadReadPtr (address));
14583
14584 const unsigned char* p = (const unsigned char*) address;
14585$ unsigned x = 0;
14586
14587$ unsigned attr = txGetConsoleAttr();
14588
14589$ txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_WHITE);
14590$ printf ("\n%*.*s ", (int) sizeof (address) * 2, (int) sizeof (address) * 2, ((name)? name : ""));
14591
14592$ txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW);
14593$ for (x = 0; x < 16; x++) printf ("%02X ", x);
14594$ for (x = 0; x < 16; x++) printf ("%X", x);
14595
14596$ const char isCtrl[] = "\a" "\b" "\n" "\r" "\t" "\0";
14597$ const char xlatCh[] = "·" "·" "·" "·" "·" "·";
14598$ const size_t szCtrl = sizeof (isCtrl) - 1;
14599
14600$ int oldCP = GetConsoleOutputCP();
14601
14602$ for (int y = 0; y < 16; y++, p += 16)
14603 {
14604 txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW);
14605
14606 printf ("\n" "%*p ", (int) sizeof (address) * 2, p);
14607
14608 int color = FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN;
14609
14610 for (x = 0; x < 16; x++)
14611 {
14612 txSetConsoleAttr (color + x/4%2); //-V112
14613 printf ("%02X ", p[x]);
14614 }
14615
14616 for (x = 0; x < 16; x++)
14617 {
14618 txSetConsoleAttr (color + x/4%2); //-V112
14619
14620 char c = p[x];
14621 const char* ctrl = (const char*) memchr (isCtrl, c, szCtrl);
14622 if (ctrl) c = xlatCh [ctrl - isCtrl];
14623
14624 if (ctrl) SetConsoleOutputCP (1251); //-V581
14625
14626 printf ("%c", c);
14627
14628 if (ctrl) SetConsoleOutputCP (oldCP);
14629 }
14630 }
14631
14632$ txSetConsoleAttr (attr);
14633$ printf ("\n");
14634
14635$ if (pause)
14636 {
14637$ SetConsoleOutputCP (_TX_CODEPAGE);
14638
14639$ fprintf (stderr, "%-*s CodePage = %5d\n", (int) sizeof (void*) * 2 + 16*3, "[Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", oldCP);
14640$ (void)_getch();
14641
14642$ SetConsoleOutputCP (oldCP);
14643 }
14644 }

14647
14648void _txStackBackTrace (const char file[] /*= "?"*/, int line /*= 0*/, const char func[] /*= "?"*/,
14649 bool readSource /*= true*/)
14650 {
14651$1 unsigned attr = txGetConsoleAttr();
14652$ txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTCYAN);
14653
14654$ fprintf (stderr, "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
14655 "Трассировка стека из \"%s\" at %s (%d):\n\n"
14656 "%s\n\n"
14657 "--------------------------------------------------\n\n",
14658 func, file, line, _txCaptureStackBackTrace (1, readSource));
14659
14660$ txSetConsoleAttr (attr);
14661 }

14663//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14664
14665char* txDemangle (const char* mangledName, std::nomeow_t)
14666 {
14667$1 if (!mangledName) return NULL;
14668
14669$ char* typeName = NULL;
14670
14671 #if defined (_GCC_VER)
14672
14673$ int err = 1;
14674$ typeName = ::abi::__cxa_demangle (mangledName, 0, 0, &err); (void) err;
14675 if (typeName) {$ return typeName; }
14676
14677 #endif
14678
14679$ unsigned short flags = 0;
14680
14681$ if (mangledName[0] == '.')
14682 {
14683$ mangledName++;
14684$ flags = 0x2800; // UNDNAME_32_BIT_DECODE | UNDNAME_TYPE_ONLY
14685 }
14686
14687$ typeName = _TX_CALL (Win32::__unDName, (NULL, mangledName, 0, malloc, free, flags));
14688 if (typeName) {$ return typeName; }
14689
14690$ return _strdup (mangledName);
14691 }
14692
14693//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14694
14695std::string txDemangle (const char* mangledName)
14696 {
14697$1 char* typeName = txDemangle (mangledName, std::nomeow);
14698$ std::string name (typeName? typeName : "");
14699$ free (typeName);
14700
14701$ return name;
14702 }

14704//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14705
14706double txQueryPerformance()
14707 {
14708$1 int maxTime = 500;
14709$ int maxSamples = 100;
14710$ POINT size = {100, 100};
14711
14712$ HDC dc = _txBuffer_Create (txWindow(), &size, NULL);
14713$ assert (dc); if (!dc) return -1; //-V547
14714
14715$ DWORD mask = (DWORD) SetThreadAffinityMask (GetCurrentThread(), 1); //-V202
14716$ assert (mask);
14717
14718$ LARGE_INTEGER freq = {};
14719$ QueryPerformanceFrequency (&freq) asserted;
14720
14721$ LARGE_INTEGER start = {};
14722$ QueryPerformanceCounter (&start) asserted;
14723
14724$ int samples = 0;
14725$ while (samples++ < maxSamples)
14726 {
14727$ LARGE_INTEGER cur = {};
14728$ QueryPerformanceCounter (&cur) asserted;
14729
14730$ double t = 1000.0 * (double) (cur.QuadPart - start.QuadPart) / (double) freq.QuadPart;
14731$ if (t > maxTime) break;
14732
14733 // Draw test scene
14734
14735$ for (int y = 0; y < size.y; y++)
14736 for (int x = 0; x < size.x; x++) txSetPixel (x, y, TX_BLACK, dc);
14737
14738$ for (int y = 0; y < size.y; y += 10)
14739 for (int x = 0; x < size.x; x += 50) txTextOut (x, y, "*", dc);
14740
14741$ txEllipse (0, 0, size.x, size.y, dc);
14742$ txFloodFill (size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, TX_TRANSPARENT, FLOODFILLSURFACE, dc);
14743
14744$ txBitBlt (dc, size.x/2.0, 0, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, dc, 0, 0) asserted;
14745$ txBitBlt (dc, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, dc, 0, size.y/2.0) asserted;
14746$ txBitBlt (dc, 0, size.y/2.0, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, dc, 0, 0) asserted;
14747$ txBitBlt (dc, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, size.x/2.0, size.y/2.0, dc, size.x/2.0, 0) asserted;
14748 }
14749
14750$ mask = (DWORD) SetThreadAffinityMask (GetCurrentThread(), mask); //-V106 //-V202
14751$ assert (mask);
14752
14753$ _txBuffer_Delete (&dc);
14754
14755$ return 3.0 * samples / sqrt (1.0 * size.x * size.y);
14756 }
14757
14758//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14759
14760unsigned txExtractColor (COLORREF color, COLORREF component)
14761 {
14762$1 switch (component)
14763 {
14764 case TX_RED:
14765 case TX_HUE: $ return (color >> 0) & 0xFF;
14766
14767 case TX_GREEN:
14768 case TX_SATURATION: $ return (color >> 8) & 0xFF;
14769
14770 case TX_BLUE:
14771 case TX_LIGHTNESS: $ return (color >> 16) & 0xFF;
14772
14773 default: $ return CLR_INVALID;
14774 }
14775 }
14776
14777//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14778
14779COLORREF txRGB2HSL (COLORREF rgbColor)
14780 {
14781$1 int r = (int) txExtractColor (rgbColor, TX_RED),
14782 g = (int) txExtractColor (rgbColor, TX_GREEN),
14783 b = (int) txExtractColor (rgbColor, TX_BLUE);
14784
14785$ double m1 = MAX (MAX (r, g), b) / 255.0,
14786 m2 = MIN (MIN (r, g), b) / 255.0,
14787 dm = m1 - m2,
14788 sm = m1 + m2,
14789
14790 ir = r / 255.0, //-V2551
14791 ig = g / 255.0, //-V2551
14792 ib = b / 255.0, //-V2551
14793
14794 ih = 0,
14795 is = 0,
14796 il = sm / 2;
14797
14798$ const double prec = 0.001;
14799
14800$ if (fabs (dm) < prec)
14801 {
14802$ is = dm / ((sm <= 1)? sm : (2-sm));
14803
14804$ double cr = (m1 - ir) / dm,
14805 cg = (m1 - ig) / dm,
14806 cb = (m1 - ib) / dm;
14807
14808$ if (fabs (ir - m1) < prec) ih = cb - cg;
14809$ if (fabs (ig - m1) < prec) ih = 2 + cr - cb;
14810$ if (fabs (ib - m1) < prec) ih = 4 + cg - cr;
14811 }
14812
14813$ ih = (ih >= 0)? ih*60 : ih*60 + 360;
14814
14815$ return RGB (ROUND (ih / 360 * 255), ROUND (is * 255), ROUND (il * 255));
14816 }
14817
14818//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14819
14820COLORREF txHSL2RGB (COLORREF hslColor)
14821 {
14822$1 struct xRGB
14823 {
14824 static double calc (double h, double m1, double m2)
14825 {
14826$ if (h < 0) h += 360;
14827$ if (h > 360) h -= 360;
14828
14829$ return (h < 60)? m1 + (m2-m1) * h / 60 :
14830 (h < 180)? m2 :
14831 (h < 240)? m1 + (m2-m1) * (240-h) / 60 :
14832 m1;
14833 }
14834 };
14835
14836$ int h = (int) txExtractColor (hslColor, TX_HUE),
14837 s = (int) txExtractColor (hslColor, TX_SATURATION),
14838 l = (int) txExtractColor (hslColor, TX_LIGHTNESS);
14839
14840$ double ih = h / 255.0 * 360.0,
14841 il = l / 100.0,
14842 is = s / 100.0,
14843
14844 m2 = (il <= 0.5)? il * (1 + is) : il + is - il * is,
14845 m1 = 2 * il - m2,
14846
14847 ir = s? xRGB::calc (ih + 120, m1, m2) : il,
14848 ig = s? xRGB::calc (ih, m1, m2) : il,
14849 ib = s? xRGB::calc (ih - 120, m1, m2) : il;
14850
14851$ return RGB (ROUND (ir * 255), ROUND (ig * 255), ROUND (ib * 255));
14852 }
14853
14854//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14855
14856void tx_fpreset()
14857 {
14858$1 txAutoLock _lock;
14859
14860$ Win32::_fpreset();
14861
14862$ unsigned new87 = 0x0008001C; // _EM_INVALID | _EM_DENORMAL | _EM_ZERODIVIDE | _EM_OVERFLOW | _EM_UNDERFLOW
14863
14864 #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
14865
14866$ unsigned old87 = 0;
14867$ if (_controlfp_s (&old87, 0, 0) == 0)
14868 {$ (void) _controlfp_s (&old87, old87 & ~new87, 0x0008001F); } // _MCW_EM
14869
14870 #else
14871
14872$ Win32::_controlfp (Win32::_controlfp (0, 0) & ~new87, 0x0008001F); // _MCW_EM
14873
14874 #endif
14875 }
14876
14877#endif // TX_COMPILED
14878
14879//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14880
14881#if defined (_TX_CPP11)
14882template <int txFramesToAverage>
14883#endif
14884
14885double txGetFPS (int minFrames)
14886 {
14887$1 static _tx_thread LARGE_INTEGER time0 = {}; if (!time0.QuadPart) QueryPerformanceCounter (&time0);
14888$ LARGE_INTEGER time = {}; QueryPerformanceCounter (&time);
14889
14890$ if (time.QuadPart - time0.QuadPart == 0)
14891 {$ return 0; }
14892
14893$ LARGE_INTEGER freq = {}; QueryPerformanceFrequency (&freq);
14894
14895$ double fps = (double) freq.QuadPart / (double) (time.QuadPart - time0.QuadPart);
14896$ time0 = time;
14897
14898$ if (txFramesToAverage == 0) return fps;
14899
14900$ static _tx_thread double average [txFramesToAverage] = {};
14901$ static _tx_thread unsigned n = 0;
14902
14903$ average [n++ % txFramesToAverage] = fps;
14904
14905$ unsigned nn = MIN (n, (unsigned) sizearr (average));
14906
14907$ fps = 0;
14908$ for (unsigned i = 0; i < nn; i++) fps += average[i];
14909$ fps /= nn;
14910
14911$ return ((int)n >= MIN (minFrames, txFramesToAverage))? fps : 0;
14912 }
14913
14914//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14915
14916template <typename T>
14917inline T zero() { T __zero = {}; return __zero; }
14918
14919//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14920
14921inline double random (std::nomeow_t, double left, double right)
14922 {
14923 return left + (right - left) * ((double) rand() / RAND_MAX);
14924 }
14925
14926//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14927
14928template <typename Tx, typename Ta, typename Tb>
14929inline bool In (std::nomeow_t, Tx x, Ta a, Tb b)
14930 {
14931 return a <= x && x <= b;
14932 }
14933
14934//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14935
14936inline bool In (std::nomeow_t, const POINT& pt, const RECT& rect)
14937 {
14938 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&pt)) return false;
14939 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&rect)) return false;
14940
14941 return In (std::nomeow, pt.x, rect.left, rect.right) &&
14942 In (std::nomeow, pt.y, rect.top, rect.bottom);
14943 }
14944
14945//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14946
14947inline bool In (std::nomeow_t, const COORD& pt, const SMALL_RECT& rect)
14948 {
14949 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&pt)) return false;
14950 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&rect)) return false;
14951
14952 return In (std::nomeow, pt.X, rect.Left, rect.Right) &&
14953 In (std::nomeow, pt.Y, rect.Top, rect.Bottom);
14954 }
14955
14956//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14957
14958inline int random (int range)
14959 {
14960 if (rand() % 100 == 0) fprintf (stderr, "%.4s ", (const volatile char*) ((rand() & 0x0F)? &_txCanaryFirst : &_txCanaryLast)); //-V206
14961
14962 return rand() % range;
14963 }
14964
14965//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14966
14967inline double random (double left, double right)
14968 {
14969 if (rand() % 100 == 0) fprintf (stderr, "%.4s ", (const volatile char*) ((rand() & 0x0F)? &_txCanaryFirst : &_txCanaryLast)); //-V206
14970
14971 return random (std::nomeow, left, right);
14972 }
14973
14974//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14975
14976template <typename Tx, typename Ta, typename Tb>
14977inline bool In (Tx x, Ta a, Tb b)
14978 {
14979 if (rand() % 100 == 0) fprintf (stderr, "%.4s ", (const volatile char*) ((rand() & 0x0F)? &_txCanaryFirst : &_txCanaryLast)); //-V206
14980
14981 return In (std::nomeow, x, a, b);
14982 }
14983
14984//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14985
14986inline bool In (const POINT& pt, const RECT& rect)
14987 {
14988 if (rand() % 100 == 0) fprintf (stderr, "%.4s ", (const volatile char*) ((rand() & 0x0F)? &_txCanaryFirst : &_txCanaryLast)); //-V206
14989
14990 return In (std::nomeow, pt, rect);
14991 }
14992
14993//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14994
14995inline bool In (const COORD& pt, const SMALL_RECT& rect)
14996 {
14997 if (rand() % 100 == 0) fprintf (stderr, "%.4s ", (const volatile char*) ((rand() & 0x0F)? &_txCanaryFirst : &_txCanaryLast)); //-V206
14998
14999 return In (std::nomeow, pt, rect);
15000 }
15001
15002//}
15003//=================================================================================================================
15004
15005//=================================================================================================================
15006//{ txPrintf() implementation
15007// Реализация txPrintf()
15008//=================================================================================================================
15009
15010#if defined (_TX_CPP11)
15011
15012template <typename T, typename... ArgsT> void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, const T& arg, ArgsT... args);
15013template <typename T, typename... ArgsT> void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, width_t width, const T& arg, ArgsT... args);
15014template <typename T, typename... ArgsT> void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, precision_t prec, const T& arg, ArgsT... args);
15015template <typename T, typename... ArgsT> void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, width_t width, precision_t prec, const T& arg, ArgsT... args);
15016 void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt);
15017
15018template <typename T> void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, const T& arg);
15019 void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, int* arg);
15020 void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt);
15021
15022//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15023
15024template <typename T, typename... ArgsT>
15025void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, const T& arg, ArgsT... args)
15026 {
15027$1 assert (fmt);
15028
15029$ _txPrintV (stream, format, n, fmt);
15030
15031 if (fmt[0] == '%') {$}
15032 else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%$\" required to print an argument in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
15033
15034$ _txPrintV (stream, format, n, fmt, arg);
15035
15036$ _txPrintF (stream, format, n+1, fmt, args...);
15037 }
15038
15039//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15040
15041template <typename T, typename... ArgsT>
15042void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, width_t width, const T& arg, ArgsT... args)
15043 {
15044$1 assert (&stream);
15045$ assert (fmt);
15046
15047$ _txPrintV (stream, format, n, fmt);
15048
15049 if (fmt[0] == '%' && fmt[1] == '*') {$ stream << std::setw (width); } //-V2006
15050 else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%*\" required to setwidth (%d) in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", width, fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
15051
15052$ _txPrintV (stream, format, n, fmt, arg);
15053
15054$ _txPrintF (stream, format, n+1, fmt, args...);
15055 }
15056
15057//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15058
15059template <typename T, typename... ArgsT>
15060void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, precision_t prec, const T& arg, ArgsT... args)
15061 {
15062$1 assert (&stream);
15063$ assert (fmt);
15064
15065$ _txPrintV (stream, format, n, fmt);
15066
15067 if (fmt[0] == '%' && fmt[1] == '.' && fmt[2] == '*') {$ stream << std::setprecision ((std::streamsize) (prec + 1)); } //-V2006 //-V1028
15068 else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%.*\" required to setprecision (%d) in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", prec, fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
15069
15070$ _txPrintV (stream, format, n, fmt, arg);
15071
15072$ _txPrintF (stream, format, n+1, fmt, args...);
15073 }
15074
15075//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15076
15077template <typename T, typename... ArgsT>
15078void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, width_t width, precision_t prec, const T& arg, ArgsT... args)
15079 {
15080$1 assert (&stream);
15081$ assert (fmt);
15082
15083$ _txPrintV (stream, format, n, fmt);
15084
15085 if (fmt[0] == '%' && fmt[1] == '*' && fmt[2] == '.' && fmt[3] == '*') {$ stream << std::setw (width) << std::setprecision ((std::streamsize) (prec + 1)); } //-V2006 //-V1028
15086 else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%*.*\" required to setwidth (%d) and setprecision (%d) in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", width, prec, fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
15087
15088$ _txPrintV (stream, format, n, fmt, arg);
15089
15090$ _txPrintF (stream, format, n+1, fmt, args...);
15091 }
15092
15093//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15094
15095inline void _txPrintF (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt)
15096 {
15097$1 assert (fmt);
15098
15099$ _txPrintV (stream, format, n, fmt);
15100
15101 if (!fmt[0]) {$}
15102 else {$ TX_ERROR ("No argument provided for %% in \"%s\" while printing \"%s\"", fmt, format); }
15103 }
15104
15105//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15106
15107inline void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char*, int, const char*& fmt)
15108 {
15109$1 assert (&stream);
15110$ assert (fmt);
15111
15112$ while (*fmt)
15113 {
15114 if (fmt[0] == '%')
15115 {
15116 if (fmt[1] == '%') fmt++;
15117 else break;
15118 }
15119
15120 stream << *fmt++;
15121 }
15122$ }
15123
15124//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15125
15126template <typename T>
15127void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, const T& arg)
15128 {
15129$1 assert (&stream);
15130$ assert (fmt);
15131
15132$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&arg)) return;
15133
15134 if (fmt[0] == '%') {$}
15135 else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%$\" required to print an argument in ...\"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); }
15136
15137$ fmt++;
15138
15139$ char oldFill = stream.fill (' ');
15140$ std::ios_base::fmtflags oldFlags = stream.flags();
15141
15142$ for (;;) switch (*fmt)
15143 {
15144 case '-': $ stream << std::left; fmt++; break;
15145 case '+': $ stream << std::showpos; fmt++; break;
15146 case ' ': $ stream.fill (' '); fmt++; break;
15147 case '#': $ stream << std::showbase; fmt++; break;
15148 case '0': $ stream.fill ('0'); fmt++; break;
15149
15150 default: $ goto end;
15151 }
15152 end:
15153
15154$ int width = (*fmt != '*')? (int) strtoul (fmt, const_cast <char**> (&fmt), 10) : (fmt++, 0);
15155$ int prec = (*fmt == '.')? (*++fmt != '*')? (int) strtoul (fmt, const_cast <char**> (&fmt), 10) : (fmt++, 0) : 0;
15156
15157 if (width) {$ stream << std::setw (width); }
15158 if (prec) {$ stream << std::setprecision (prec); }
15159
15160$ fmt += strspn (fmt, "hljztL");
15161
15162$ switch (*fmt)
15163 {
15164 case '$':
15165 case '?': $ break;
15166
15167 case 'd':
15168 case 'i':
15169 case 'u': $ stream << std::dec; break;
15170
15171 case 'o': $ stream << std::oct; break;
15172
15173 case 'x': $ stream << std::hex; break;
15174 case 'X': $ stream << std::hex << std::uppercase; break;
15175
15176 case 'f': $ stream << std::fixed; break;
15177 case 'F': $ stream << std::fixed << std::uppercase; break;
15178
15179 case 'e': $ stream << std::scientific; break;
15180 case 'E': $ stream << std::scientific << std::uppercase; break;
15181
15182 case 'g': $ break;
15183 case 'G': $ stream << std::uppercase; break;
15184
15185 case 'a': $ break;
15186 case 'A': $ stream << std::uppercase; break;
15187
15188 case 'c':
15189 case 's':
15190 case 'p': $ break;
15191
15192 default: $ TX_ERROR ("Invalid format '%.1s' at \"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", fmt, fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); break;
15193 }
15194
15195$ fmt++;
15196
15197 if (&arg) {$ stream << arg; }
15198 else {$ stream << "(null)"; }
15199
15200$ stream.fill (oldFill);
15201$ stream.flags (oldFlags);
15202 }
15203
15204//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15205
15206inline void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, int* arg) //-V2009
15207 {
15208$1 assert (fmt);
15209
15210 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (arg)) return;
15211
15212 if (fmt[0] == '%' && fmt[1] == 'n') {$}
15213 else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%n\" required to store print length in int* argument %d in \"%s\"", n, format); }
15214
15215$ *arg = (int) stream.str().length(); //-V202
15216
15217$ fmt += 2;
15218 }
15219
15220//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15221
15222template <typename T> inline const T& _txPrintfNormalizeArg (const T& arg) { if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&arg)) {;} return arg; }
15223 inline const char* _txPrintfNormalizeArg (const std::string& arg) { if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&arg)) return NULL; return arg.c_str(); }
15224
15225//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15226
15227template <typename... ArgsT>
15228inline int txPrintf (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, ArgsT... args)
15229 {
15230$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return 0;
15231$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return 0;
15232
15233$ const char* fmt = format;
15234$ _txPrintF (stream, format, 2, fmt, _txPrintfNormalizeArg (args)...);
15235
15236$ return (int) stream.str().length(); //-V202
15237 }
15238
15239//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15240
15241template <typename... ArgsT>
15242inline int txPrintf (char buffer[], size_t size, const char* format, ArgsT... args)
15243 {
15244$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&buffer)) return 0;
15245$ if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return 0;
15246
15247$ if (size > 0) size--;
15248$ buffer[size] = 0;
15249
15250$ if (!size) return 0;
15251
15252$ std::ostringstream stream;
15253$ stream.rdbuf() -> pubsetbuf (buffer, size);
15254
15255$ txPrintf (stream, format, args...);
15256
15257$ return (int) stream.str().length(); //-V202
15258 }
15259
15260//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15261
15262template <typename... ArgsT>
15263inline std::string txFormat (const char* format, ArgsT... args)
15264 {
15265$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return "";
15266
15267$ std::ostringstream stream;
15268
15269$ txPrintf (stream, format, args...);
15270
15271$ return stream.str();
15272 }
15273
15274//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15275
15276template <typename... ArgsT>
15277inline int txPrintf (const char* format, ArgsT... args)
15278 {
15279$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return 0;
15280
15281$ return printf ("%s", txFormat (format, args...) .c_str());
15282 }
15283
15284#endif
15285
15286//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15287
15288 int _txPrintfCheck (const char* format, ...) tx_printfy (1);
15289inline int _txPrintfCheck (const char*, ...) { return 0; }
15290
15291//}

15294//=================================================================================================================
15295//{ txDialog methods implementation
15296// Реализация методов класса txDialog
15297//
15298// See [1] http://msdn.microsoft.com/ru-ru/library/windows/desktop/ms645389%28v=vs.85%29.aspx
15299// [2] http://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20050429-00/?p=35743
15300// [3] http://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20040623-00/?p=38753
15301//=================================================================================================================
15302
15303#ifndef TX_COMPILED // <<< THE CODE IS HERE, UNFOLD IT <<<
15304
15305txDialog::txDialog () :
15306 layout_ (NULL)
15307 {$1}
15308
15309//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15310
15311txDialog::txDialog (const Layout* layout) :
15312 layout_ (layout)
15313 {$1}
15314
15315//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15316
15317const txDialog::Layout* txDialog::setLayout (const Layout* layout)
15318 {
15319$1 assert (layout);
15320
15321$ return ::std::swap (layout_, layout), layout;
15322 }
15323
15324//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15325
15326intptr_t txDialog::dialogBox (WORD resourceID)
15327 {
15328$1 const char* resName = (char*)(uintptr_t) resourceID;
15329
15330$ if (!FindResource (NULL, resName, RT_DIALOG)) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Не найден ресурс диалога %d", resourceID), 0;
15331
15332$ return DialogBoxParam (NULL, resName, NULL, (DLGPROC) DialogProc_, (LPARAM) this);
15333 }
15334
15335//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15336
15337intptr_t txDialog::dialogBox (const txDialog::Layout* layout /*= NULL*/, size_t bufsize /*= 0*/)
15338 {
15339$1 if (!layout) layout = layout_;
15340$ if (!layout) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Не установлен динамический шаблон диалога"), 0;
15341
15342$ if (!bufsize) bufsize = 1024;
15343
15344$ DLGTEMPLATE* tmpl = (DLGTEMPLATE*) GlobalAlloc (GPTR, bufsize);
15345$ if (!tmpl) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("GlobalAlloc(): Нет памяти для шаблона диалога"), 0;
15346
15347$ const Layout* dlg = &layout[0];
15348$ const Layout def = { DIALOG, NULL, 0, 0,0,0,0, WS_CAPTION | WS_SYSMENU | DS_MODALFRAME | DS_CENTER, "MS Shell Dlg", 8 };
15349
15350$ void* ptr = _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Create (tmpl, bufsize,
15351 (dlg->style? dlg->style : def.style) | DS_SETFONT, 0, 0,
15352 dlg->x, dlg->y, dlg->sx, dlg->sy,
15353 dlg->caption? dlg->caption : def.caption,
15354 dlg->font? dlg->font : def.font,
15355 dlg->fontsize? dlg->fontsize : def.fontsize, NULL);
15356$ WORD i = 0;
15357$ for (i = 1; layout[i].wndclass != END; ++i)
15358 {
15359$ const Layout* item = &layout[i];
15360
15361$ ptr = _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Add (ptr, bufsize - ((char*)ptr - (char*)tmpl),
15362 item->style | WS_VISIBLE, 0, item->x, item->y, item->sx, item->sy,
15363 item->id, (const char*)(uintptr_t) item->wndclass, item->caption);
15364 }
15365
15366$ tmpl->cdit = (unsigned short) (i-1);
15367
15368$ intptr_t res = DialogBoxIndirectParam (NULL, tmpl, NULL, (DLGPROC) DialogProc_, (LPARAM) this);
15369
15370$ GlobalFree (tmpl);
15371
15372$ return res;
15373 }
15374
15375//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15376
15377int txDialog::dialogProc (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM)
15378 {
15379$1 switch (msg)
15380 {
15381 case WM_INITDIALOG: $ SetForegroundWindow (wnd);
15382 $ break;
15383
15384 case WM_COMMAND: $ switch (LOWORD (wParam))
15385 {
15386 case IDOK:
15387 case IDCANCEL: $ SetForegroundWindow (txWindow()? txWindow() : Win32::GetConsoleWindow());
15388 $ EndDialog (wnd, (uintptr_t) this);
15389 $ break;
15390
15391 default: $ break;
15392 }
15393 $ break;
15394 default: $ break;
15395 }
15396
15397$ return FALSE;
15398 }
15399
15400//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15401
15402intptr_t CALLBACK txDialog::DialogProc_ (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
15403 {
15404$1 static txDialog* this__ = NULL;
15405$ if (msg == WM_INITDIALOG) this__ = (txDialog*) lParam;
15406$ if (!this__) return FALSE;
15407
15408$ return this__-> dialogProc (wnd, msg, wParam, lParam); //-V109
15409 }
15410
15411//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15412
15413void* _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Create (void* globalMem, size_t bufsize, DWORD style, DWORD exStyle,
15414 WORD controls, short x, short y, short cx, short cy,
15415 const char caption[], const char font[], WORD fontsize, const char menu[])
15416 {
15417$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (globalMem)) return NULL;
15418
15419$ WORD* pw = (WORD*) globalMem;
15420
15421$ DLGTEMPLATE* tmpl = ((DLGTEMPLATE*&) pw)++;
15422
15423$ tmpl->style = style;
15424$ tmpl->dwExtendedStyle = exStyle;
15425$ tmpl->cdit = controls;
15426$ tmpl->x = x;
15427$ tmpl->y = y;
15428$ tmpl->cx = cx;
15429$ tmpl->cy = cy;
15430
15431$ if (menu > (const char*) 0xFFFF)
15432 {
15433$ pw += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, (menu? menu : ""), -1, (wchar_t*) pw, //-V547
15434 (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) globalMem) : 0xFFFF)); //-V202
15435 }
15436 else
15437 {
15438$ *pw++ = (WORD)(uintptr_t) (menu? 0xFFFF : 0);
15439$ *pw++ = (WORD)(uintptr_t) menu;
15440 }
15441
15442$ if (caption)
15443 {
15444$ pw += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, (caption? caption : ""), -1, (wchar_t*) pw, //-V547
15445 (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) globalMem) : 0xFFFF)); //-V202
15446 }
15447
15448$ if (style & DS_SETFONT)
15449 {
15450$ *pw++ = fontsize;
15451$ pw += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, (font? font : ""), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
15452 (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) globalMem) : 0xFFFF)); //-V202
15453 }
15454
15455$ return pw;
15456 }
15457
15458//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15459
15460void* _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Add (void* dlgTemplatePtr, size_t bufsize, DWORD style, DWORD exStyle,
15461 short x, short y, short cx, short cy,
15462 WORD id, const char wclass[], const char caption[])
15463 {
15464$1 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (dlgTemplatePtr)) return NULL;
15465
15466$ WORD* pw = (LPWORD) dlgTemplatePtr; // Force align at word boundary
15467$ ((ULONG&) pw) += 3; //-V205
15468$ ((ULONG&) pw) >>= 2; //-V205
15469$ ((ULONG&) pw) <<= 2; //-V205
15470
15471$ DLGITEMTEMPLATE* tmpl = ((DLGITEMTEMPLATE*&) pw)++;
15472
15473$ tmpl->style = style;
15474$ tmpl->dwExtendedStyle = exStyle;
15475$ tmpl->x = x;
15476$ tmpl->y = y;
15477$ tmpl->cx = cx;
15478$ tmpl->cy = cy;
15479$ tmpl->id = id;
15480
15481$ if (HIWORD (wclass) == 0xFFFF)
15482 {
15483$ *pw++ = (WORD) (HIWORD ((uintptr_t) wclass));
15484$ *pw++ = (WORD) (LOWORD ((uintptr_t) wclass));
15485 }
15486 else if (wclass)
15487 {
15488$ pw += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, const_cast <char*> (wclass), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
15489 (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) dlgTemplatePtr) : 0xFFFF)); //-V202
15490 }
15491 else
15492 {
15493$ *pw++ = 0;
15494 }
15495
15496$ if (caption)
15497 {
15498$ pw += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, caption, -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
15499 (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) dlgTemplatePtr) : 0xFFFF)); //-V202
15500 }
15501 else
15502 {
15503$ *pw++ = 0;
15504 }
15505
15506$ *pw++ = 0;
15507
15508$ return pw;
15509 }
15510
15511#endif // TX_COMPILED
15512
15513//}

15523#undef $1

15525#undef $3
15526#undef $4
15527#undef $5
15528#undef $6
15529#undef $7
15530#undef $8
15531#undef $9
15532#undef $$
