15544//{----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15664//}----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15665
15666#ifndef __TX_DEBUG_MACROS
15667#define __TX_DEBUG_MACROS ("Группа отладочных $-макросов")
15668
15670//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15671
15672#define $H txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLACK | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15673#define $B txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLUE | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15674#define $G txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15675#define $C txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_CYAN | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15676#define $R txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15677#define $M txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_MAGENTA | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15678#define $Y txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_DARKYELLOW | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15679#define $d txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15680#define $D txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_DARKGRAY | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15681#define $b txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTBLUE | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15682#define $g txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15683#define $c txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTCYAN | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15684#define $r txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15685#define $m txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15686#define $y txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15687#define $h txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_WHITE | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15688
15689#define $i txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTCYAN | BACKGROUND_BLUE);
15690#define $I txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW | BACKGROUND_BLUE);
15691#define $o txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN | BACKGROUND_GREEN);
15692#define $O txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW | BACKGROUND_GREEN);
15693#define $e txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_WHITE | BACKGROUND_RED);
15694#define $E txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW | BACKGROUND_RED);
15695#define $w txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA | BACKGROUND_MAGENTA);
15696#define $W txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW | BACKGROUND_MAGENTA);
15697#define $f txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLACK | BACKGROUND_LIGHTRED);
15698#define $F txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_MAGENTA | BACKGROUND_LIGHTRED);
15699#define $l txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLACK | BACKGROUND_DARKGRAY);
15700#define $L txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY | BACKGROUND_DARKGRAY);
15701
15702#define $T( cond ) txSetConsoleAttr ((cond)? FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN : FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED );
15703
15704#define $s _txSaveConsoleAttr TX_JOIN (__txSavedConsoleAttrs, __LINE__);
15705
15706#define $sH $s $H
15707#define $sB $s $B
15708#define $sG $s $G
15709#define $sC $s $C
15710#define $sR $s $R
15711#define $sM $s $M
15712#define $sY $s $Y
15713#define $sd $s $d
15714#define $sD $s $D
15715#define $sb $s $b
15716#define $sg $s $g
15717#define $sc $s $c
15718#define $sr $s $r
15719#define $sm $s $m
15720#define $sy $s $y
15721#define $sh $s $h
15722
15723#define $si $s $i
15724#define $sI $s $I
15725#define $so $s $o
15726#define $sO $s $O
15727#define $se $s $e
15728#define $sE $s $E
15729#define $sw $s $w
15730#define $sW $s $W
15731#define $sf $s $f
15732#define $sF $s $F
15733#define $sl $s $l
15734#define $sL $s $L
15735
15736#define $sT( cond ) $s $T (cond)
15737
15738#define $test(cond) { if (!!(cond)) { $o std::cerr << "[PASSED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #cond; } \
15739 else { $e std::cerr << "[FAILED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #cond; } $d; }
15740
15741#define $status(cond) $test (cond)
15742
15743#define $unittest( code, expected ) \
15744 { \
15745 const _tx_decltype (code) & _result = (code); /* Should use auto, but g++ 4.7.2 default std is < 2011 */ \
15746 const _tx_decltype (expected) & _expected = (expected); \
15747 \
15748 if (_result == _expected) \
15749 { $so std::cerr << "[PASSED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #code; } \
15750 else \
15751 { $se std::cerr << "[FAILED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #code " == (" << _result << "), should be (" << _expected << ")"; } \
15752 \
15753 $n; \
15754 (_result == _expected); \
15755 }
15756
15757//=================================================================================================================
15758
15759#define $V( var, ...) ( _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$PrefixV ( __VA_ARGS__), "]\n") )
15760#define $V_( var, ...) ( _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$PrefixV ( __VA_ARGS__), "] " ) )
15761#define $V__(var, ...) ( _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$PrefixV ( __VA_ARGS__), "]" ) )
15762
15763#define $( var, ...) ( _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$Prefix (#var, __VA_ARGS__), "]\n") )
15764#define $_( var, ...) ( _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$Prefix (#var, __VA_ARGS__), "] " ) )
15765#define $__( var, ...) ( _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$Prefix (#var, __VA_ARGS__), "]" ) )
15766
15767#define $x( var, ...) ( _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$Prefix (#var, __VA_ARGS__), "]\n", ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15768#define $x_( var, ...) ( _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$Prefix (#var, __VA_ARGS__), "] ", ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15769
15770#define $v( var, cond, ...) { { $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$Prefix (#var, __VA_ARGS__), "]" ); } $n; }
15771#define $v_( var, cond, ...) { $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var), _tx$Prefix (#var, __VA_ARGS__), "]" ); }
15772
15773#define $$ { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sC txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[%s (%d) %s]", __FILE__, __LINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__); } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15774#define $$_ { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sC txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[" "(%d) %s]", __LINE__, __func__); } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15775#define $meow(...) { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sc txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[%s (%d) %s]", __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__); txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f " __VA_ARGS__); } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15776#define $meow_ { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sc txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[%s (%d) %s]", __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__); txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f"); } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15777
15778#define $$$( ... ) ( ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n", _txDumpVar ((__VA_ARGS__),"\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ ": ", ", DONE]\n\n") )
15779#define $$$_( ... ) ( ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n", _txDumpVar ((__VA_ARGS__), "[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ ": ", ", DONE]\n\n") )
15780
15781#define $$$$( ... ) { ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n"; _txDumpVarSuffix ("\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ " DONE]\n\n"); { __VA_ARGS__; } }
15782#define $$$$_( ... ) { ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n"; _txDumpVarSuffix ( "[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ " DONE]\n\n"); { __VA_ARGS__; } }
15783#define $do( ... ) ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n"; __VA_ARGS__
15784#define $DO( ... ) ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]...\n"; $p; __VA_ARGS__
15785#define $Do( ... ) ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]...\n"; \
15786 txMessageBox ( "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]...\n", __TX_FUNCTION__); __VA_ARGS__
15787
15788#define $n { ::std::cerr << "\n"; }
15789#define $nn { ::std::cerr << "\n\n"; }
15790#define $t { ::std::cerr << "\t"; }
15791
15792#define _tx$PrefixV( ...) ( *(__VA_ARGS__ "")? ("[" __VA_ARGS__ ": " ) : ("[" ) )
15793#define _tx$Prefix(var, ...) ( *(__VA_ARGS__ "")? ("[" __VA_ARGS__ ": " var " = ") : ("[" var " = ") )
15794
15795//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15796
15797// This will never be documented, he-he. Read the source, Luke.
15798
15799#if defined (_DEBUG)
15800 #define $debug if (1)
15801 #define $printf if (1)
15802 #define $PRINTF if (1)
15803#else
15804 #define $debug if (0)
15805 #define $printf if (0)
15806 #define $PRINTF if (0)
15807#endif
15808
15809#define $$d $debug
15810#define $$w $$$$
15811#define $$s __TX_FILELINE__
15812#define $$b { txSleep(); DebugBreak(); }
15813#define $$p { txSleep(); if (txMessageBox (__TX_FILELINE__ "\n\n" "[Повтор] - продолжение программы,\n" "[Отмена] - остановка", \
15814 __TX_FUNCTION__, MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_RETRYCANCEL) == IDCANCEL) ::exit (2); }
15815#define $$P ( txSleep(), txMessageBox (__TX_FILELINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__, MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_YESNOCANCEL) )
15816#define $ppp { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s: ""Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", __TX_FILELINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15817#define $pp { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%04d %s: ""Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", __LINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15818#define $p { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s(): Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", __TX_FILELINE__, __func__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15819#define $ppp_ { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s]", __TX_FILELINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15820#define $pp_ { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%04d %s]", __LINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15821#define $p_ { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s()]", __TX_FILELINE__, __func__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15822#define $P ( txSleep(), ((int(*)()) (_getch)) () ) // Avoid "return value not used"
15823
15824//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15825
15826struct _txSaveConsoleAttr
15827 {
15828 unsigned attr_;
15829
15830 _txSaveConsoleAttr() : attr_ (txGetConsoleAttr ()) {}
15831 explicit _txSaveConsoleAttr (WORD attr) : attr_ (txGetConsoleAttr ()) { txSetConsoleAttr (attr); }
15832 ~_txSaveConsoleAttr() { txSetConsoleAttr (attr_); }
15833 };
15834
15835//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15836
15837struct _txDumpVarSuffix
15838 {
15839 typedef _txDumpVarSuffix this_t;
15840
15841 const char* suffix_;
15842
15843 explicit _txDumpVarSuffix (const char suffix[] = "") : suffix_ (suffix) { assert (suffix); }
15844 ~_txDumpVarSuffix() { ::std::cerr << suffix_; }
15845
15846 _txDumpVarSuffix (const this_t&) _tx_delete;
15847 this_t& operator = (const this_t&) _tx_delete;
15848 };
15849
15850//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15851
15852#define ARGS__ const char* prefix, const char* suffix, std::ios_base::fmtflags flags, int deep
15853#define ARGS_ const char* prefix, const char* suffix, std::ios_base::fmtflags flags = std::ios_base::fmtflags(), int deep = 0
15854#define VALS_ prefix, suffix, flags, deep
15855#define ERRPTR_(p) { $sE; stream << "<НЕВЕРНЫЙ АДРЕС " << (const void*) (p) << ">"; }
15856
15857template <typename T, typename StreamT> const T& _txDumpVal (const T& value, StreamT& stream, ARGS_);
15858
15859//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15860
15861template <typename T> inline const T& _txDumpVar (const T& value, ARGS_) { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15862template <typename T> inline T& _txDumpVar ( T& value, ARGS_) { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15863
15864template <int N> inline const char (&_txDumpVar (const char (&value) [N], ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15865template <int N> inline char (&_txDumpVar ( char (&value) [N], ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15866
15867template <int N> inline const wchar_t (&_txDumpVar (const wchar_t (&value) [N], ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15868template <int N> inline wchar_t (&_txDumpVar ( wchar_t (&value) [N], ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15869
15870 inline const wchar_t& _txDumpVar (const wchar_t& value, ARGS_) { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15871 inline wchar_t& _txDumpVar ( wchar_t& value, ARGS_) { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15872
15873 inline const wchar_t*& _txDumpVar (const wchar_t*& value, ARGS_) { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15874 inline wchar_t*& _txDumpVar ( wchar_t*& value, ARGS_) { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15875
15876 inline const std::wstring& _txDumpVar (const std::wstring& value, ARGS_) { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15877 inline std::wstring& _txDumpVar ( std::wstring& value, ARGS_) { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15878
15879//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15880
15881template <typename T, typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const T& value, StreamT& stream) { stream << value; }
15882template <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const char value, StreamT& stream) { stream << "'" << value << "'"; }
15883template <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const wchar_t value, StreamT& stream) { stream << L"'" << value << L"'"; }
15884template <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const std::string& value, StreamT& stream) { stream << '"' << value << '"'; }
15885template <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const std::wstring& value, StreamT& stream) { stream << L'"' << value << L'"'; }
15886
15887template <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const char* value, StreamT& stream)
15888 {
15889 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return;
15890
15891 if (!_txIsBadReadPtr (value)) stream << '"' << value << '"';
15892 else if (!value) stream << "(null)";
15893 else ERRPTR_ (value);
15894 }
15895
15896template <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const wchar_t* value, StreamT& stream)
15897 {
15898 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return;
15899
15900 if (!_txIsBadReadPtr (value)) stream << L'"' << value << L'"';
15901 else if (!value) stream << L"(null)";
15902 else ERRPTR_ (value);
15903 }
15904
15905//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15906
15907template <typename T, typename StreamT>
15908inline const T& _txDumpVal (const T& value, StreamT& stream, ARGS__)
15909 {
15910 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return value; //-V778
15911 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( prefix)) return value;
15912 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( suffix)) return value;
15913
15914 $sc;
15915 if (!deep) stream << prefix;
15916
15917 std::ios_base::fmtflags old = stream.flags ((flags)? flags : stream.flags());
15918
15919 if (!_txIsBadReadPtr (&value))
15920 {
15921 _txDumpVal (value, stream);
15922 }
15923 else
15924 ERRPTR_ (&value);
15925
15926 stream.flags (old);
15927
15928 if (!deep) stream << suffix;
15929
15930 return value;
15931 }
15932
15933//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15934
15935template <typename T, int N>
15936inline T (&_txDumpVar (T (&value) [N], ARGS_)) [N]
15937 {
15938 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( prefix)) return value;
15939 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( suffix)) return value;
15940
15941 std::ostream& stream = std::cerr;
15942
15943 $sc; if (!deep) std::cerr << prefix;
15944 $C; std::cerr << ((deep)? " {" : "{");
15945
15946 if (!_txIsBadReadPtr (value))
15947 {
15948 for (int i = 0; ; i++)
15949 {
15950 { $sC; stream << "[" << i << "]="; }
15951
15952 _txDumpVar (value[i], prefix, suffix, flags, deep+1);
15953
15954 if (i >= N-1) break;
15955
15956 stream << ", ";
15957 }
15958 }
15959 else
15960 ERRPTR_ (&value);
15961
15962 $C; std::cerr << "}";
15963 $c; if (!deep) std::cerr << suffix;
15964
15965 return value;
15966 }
15967
15968//=================================================================================================================
15969
15970inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const POINT& point)
15971 {
15972 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return stream;
15973
15974 if (!_txIsBadReadPtr (&point)) stream << "{ x: " << point.x << ", y: " << point.y << " }"; // NOLINT (clang-diagnostic-undefined-bool-conversion)
15975 else if (!&point) stream << "(null)";
15976 else ERRPTR_ (&point);
15977
15978 return stream;
15979 }
15980
15981inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const SIZE& size)
15982 {
15983 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return stream;
15984
15985 if (&size) stream << "{ cx: " << size.cx << ", cy: " << size.cy << " }"; // NOLINT (clang-diagnostic-undefined-bool-conversion)
15986 else stream << "(null)";
15987
15988 return stream;
15989 }
15990
15991inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const RECT& rect)
15992 {
15993 if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return stream;
15994
15995 if (&rect) stream << "{ left: " << rect.left << ", top: " << rect.top << // NOLINT (clang-diagnostic-undefined-bool-conversion)
15996 ", right: " << rect.right << ", bottom: " << rect.bottom << " }";
15997
15998 else stream << "(null)";
15999
16000 return stream;
16001 }
16002
16003//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16004
16005#undef ARGS__
16006#undef ARGS_
16007#undef VALS_
16008#undef ERRPTR_
16009
16010//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16012
16013#endif
16014
16015//}
16016//=================================================================================================================
16017
16019

16023//=================================================================================================================

16030#endif

16121#define txUnlock(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), txUnlock (__VA_ARGS__) )
16122#define txUpdateWindow(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), txUpdateWindow (__VA_ARGS__) )
16123#define txUseAlpha(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), txUseAlpha (__VA_ARGS__) )
16124#define txVersion(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), txVersion (__VA_ARGS__) )
16125#define txVersionNumber(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), txVersionNumber (__VA_ARGS__) )
16126#define txWindow(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), txWindow (__VA_ARGS__) )
16127#define tx_fpreset(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), tx_fpreset (__VA_ARGS__) )
16128#define tx_glGetError(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), tx_glGetError (__VA_ARGS__) )
16129#define _txDump(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), _txDump (__VA_ARGS__) )
16130#define _txStackBackTrace(...) ( _txLocCurSet(), _txStackBackTrace (__VA_ARGS__) )
16131
16132#endif
16133
16134//}
16135//=================================================================================================================
16136
16138//}
16139//=================================================================================================================
16140
16141//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16142//{ The namespaces
16143//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16144
16147_TX_END_NAMESPACE
16148
16151using namespace TX; // Allow easy usage of TXLib functions
16152
16153using ::std::cin; // Predefined usings to avoid "using namespace std"
16154using ::std::cout;
16155using ::std::cerr;
16156using ::std::string;
16157using ::std::wcin;
16158using ::std::wcout;
16159using ::std::wcerr;
16160using ::std::wstring;
16161
16162//}
16163//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16164
16165//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16166//{ Compiler- and platform-specific
16167// Адаптация к компиляторам и платформам
16168//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16170
16171#if defined (_GCC_VER)
16172
16173 #pragma GCC optimize "strict-aliasing"
16174
16175 #pragma GCC pop_options
16176 #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
16177
16178 #endif
16179
16180#if defined (_CLANG_VER)
16181
16182 #pragma clang diagnostic pop
16183
16184 #endif
16185
16186//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16187
16188#if defined (_MSC_VER)
16189
16190 #pragma warning (pop) // Restoring maximum level
16191
16192 #endif
16193
16194#if defined (__INTEL_COMPILER)
16195
16196 #pragma warning (default: 174) // Remark: expression has no effect
16197 #pragma warning (default: 304) // Remark: access control not specified ("public" by default)
16198 #pragma warning (default: 444) // Remark: destructor for base class "..." is not virtual
16199 #pragma warning (default: 522) // Remark: function redeclared "inline" after being called
16200 #pragma warning (default: 1684) // Conversion from pointer to same-sized integral type (potential portability problem)
16201
16202 #pragma warning (disable: 981) // Remark: operands are evaluated in unspecified order
16203
16204 #endif
16205
16207//}
16208//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
16209
16210#endif // __TXLIB_H_INCLUDED
